name: Varun Beverages Limited
description: We are the second largest franchisee in the world (outside US) of carbonated soft drinks (CSDs) and non-carbonated beverages (NCBs) sold under trademarks owned by PepsiCo and a key player in the beverage industry. We produce and distribute a wide range of CSDs, as well as a large selection of NCBs, including packaged drinking water. PepsiCo CSD brands sold by us include Pepsi, Diet Pepsi, Seven-Up, Mirinda Orange, Mirinda Lemon, Mountain Dew, Seven-Up Nimbooz Masala Soda, Evervess Soda, Duke€™s Soda and Sting. PepsiCo NCB brands sold by us include Tropicana (100%, Essentials & Delight), Tropicana Slice, Tropicana Frutz, Seven-Up Nimbooz, Gatorade and Quaker Oat Milk as well as packaged drinking water under the brand Aquafina. In addition, we have also been granted the franchise for Ole brand of PepsiCo products in Sri Lanka.We have been associated with PepsiCo since the 1990s and have over two and half decades consolidated our business association with PepsiCo, increasing the number of PepsiCo licensed territories and sub-territories covered by us, producing and distributing a wider range of PepsiCo beverages, introducing various SKUs in our portfolio, and expanding our distribution network. We have been granted franchisees for various PepsiCo products spread across 27 States and 7 Union Territories (except Jammu & Kashmir and Andhra Pradesh) in India.Our share of PepsiCo beverages volume sales increased from ~ 26% in Fiscal 2011 to 80%+ now. Although, India is our largest market, we have also been granted the franchise for various PepsiCo products for the territories of Nepal, Sri Lanka, Morocco, Zambia and Zimbabwe.VBL has 30 manufacturing plants in India (Gr. Noida 1, Gr. Noida 2, Kosi, Sathariya 1, Sathariya 2, Bazpur, Jainpur & Hardoi in Uttar Pradesh, Bhiwadi & Jodhpur in Rajasthan, Nuh & Panipat in Haryana, Phillaur and Pathankot in Punjab, Kolkata in West Bengal, Guwahati Unit 1 & 2 in Assam, Goa, Mandideep in Madhya Pradesh, Bargarh & Cuttack in Odisha, Jamshedpur in Jharkhand, Bharuch in Gujarat, Mahul, Roha and Paithan in Maharashtra, Nelamangala in Karnataka, Palakkad in Kerala, Sri City in Andhra Pradesh, Sangareddy in Telangana and Mamandur in Tamil Nadu) and 6 manufacturing plants in international geographies (two in Nepal and one each in Sri Lanka, Morocco, Zambia and Zimbabwe). In addition, we have set up backward integration facilities for production of preforms, crowns, corrugated boxes, plastic crates and shrink-wrap films in certain of our production facilities to ensure operational efficiencies and quality standards.We are part of the RJ Corp group, a diversified business conglomerate with interests in beverages, quick-service restaurants, dairy and healthcare. Our Promoter and Chairman Mr. Ravi Kant Jaipuria has an established reputation as an entrepreneur and business leader and is the only Indian to receive PepsiCo€™s International Bottler of the Year award, which was awarded in 1997.
about_html:
We are the second largest franchisee in the world (outside US) of carbonated soft drinks (CSDs) and non-carbonated beverages (NCBs) sold under trademarks owned by PepsiCo and a key player in the beverage industry. We produce and distribute a wide range of CSDs, as well as a large selection of NCBs, including packaged drinking water. PepsiCo CSD brands sold by us include Pepsi, Diet Pepsi, Seven-Up, Mirinda Orange, Mirinda Lemon, Mountain Dew, Seven-Up Nimbooz Masala Soda, Evervess Soda, Duke€™s Soda and Sting. PepsiCo NCB brands sold by us include Tropicana (100%, Essentials & Delight), Tropicana Slice, Tropicana Frutz, Seven-Up Nimbooz, Gatorade and Quaker Oat Milk as well as packaged drinking water under the brand Aquafina. In addition, we have also been granted the franchise for Ole brand of PepsiCo products in Sri Lanka.
We have been associated with PepsiCo since the 1990s and have over two and half decades consolidated our business association with PepsiCo, increasing the number of PepsiCo licensed territories and sub-territories covered by us, producing and distributing a wider range of PepsiCo beverages, introducing various SKUs in our portfolio, and expanding our distribution network. We have been granted franchisees for various PepsiCo products spread across 27 States and 7 Union Territories (except Jammu & Kashmir and Andhra Pradesh) in India.
Our share of PepsiCo beverages volume sales increased from ~ 26% in Fiscal 2011 to 80%+ now. Although, India is our largest market, we have also been granted the franchise for various PepsiCo products for the territories of Nepal, Sri Lanka, Morocco, Zambia and Zimbabwe.
VBL has 30 manufacturing plants in India (Gr. Noida 1, Gr. Noida 2, Kosi, Sathariya 1, Sathariya 2, Bazpur, Jainpur & Hardoi in Uttar Pradesh, Bhiwadi & Jodhpur in Rajasthan, Nuh & Panipat in Haryana, Phillaur and Pathankot in Punjab, Kolkata in West Bengal, Guwahati Unit 1 & 2 in Assam, Goa, Mandideep in Madhya Pradesh, Bargarh & Cuttack in Odisha, Jamshedpur in Jharkhand, Bharuch in Gujarat, Mahul, Roha and Paithan in Maharashtra, Nelamangala in Karnataka, Palakkad in Kerala, Sri City in Andhra Pradesh, Sangareddy in Telangana and Mamandur in Tamil Nadu) and 6 manufacturing plants in international geographies (two in Nepal and one each in Sri Lanka, Morocco, Zambia and Zimbabwe). In addition, we have set up backward integration facilities for production of preforms, crowns, corrugated boxes, plastic crates and shrink-wrap films in certain of our production facilities to ensure operational efficiencies and quality standards.
We are part of the RJ Corp group, a diversified business conglomerate with interests in beverages, quick-service restaurants, dairy and healthcare. Our Promoter and Chairman Mr. Ravi Kant Jaipuria has an established reputation as an entrepreneur and business leader and is the only Indian to receive PepsiCo€™s International Bottler of the Year award, which was awarded in 1997.
jobDetail_text: Role & responsibilities  1. Assist in managing the equipment availability.2. Collaborate with the sales team to ensure timely Equipment Installation and Service delivery.3. jobDetail_html:
Role & responsibilities

1. Assist in managing the equipment availability.

2. Collaborate with the sales team to ensure timely Equipment Installation and Service delivery.

3. Ensure timely resolution of the customer complaints and minimise escalations.

4. Monitor and report equipment performance metrics.

5. Failure Trend Analysis and Spare consumption consumption and Reporting.

6. Ensure Ideal inventory levels of Service Dealers and Monthly Reconcilliation.

7. Maintain accurate record of equipment inventory and maintenance activities.

8. Assist in cost optimization for equipment management.

description: About the companyTribeca is the largest branded luxury developer in India! Established in 2012, we have grown to become the largest developer of Trump-branded properties in the world (after the Trump Organization). Our current employee strength comprises more than 150 associates across Mumbai, Pune, Delhi-NCR, Kolkata, and Bangalore, and we have a team of incredibly talented, hungry, bright, and passionate folks, including IIT, IIM, Wharton, and SPA toppers and industry stalwarts.At Tribeca, we are focused on creating world-class products and customer experiences. We pioneered the concept of branded residences in India and are developing over 6 million square feet of branded residential projects in India. We are also proud to be developing the world's largest rooftop terrace. Tribeca is a contemporary and vibrant real estate brand that brought the Trump Organization to India and pioneered the concept of branded residences.


Join us in our mission to create world-class real estate and customer experiences. Be a part of the Tribeca team and help us shape the future of luxury real estate in India.


Designation - Executive/ Senior Executive - HR (Recruitment)

Website - https://www.tribecadevelopers.com/

News - https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/industry/services/property-/-cstruction/tribeca-inks-pact-for-prime-project-in-mumbais-parel-secures-hdfc-capital-funding/articleshow/106697586.cms?from=mdr

Location: Peninsula Corporate Park - Lower Parel



JD

  • Sourcing: Sourcing potential candidates through online company career portals, recruitment agencies, job boards / job postings, social platforms, professional networks, employee referrals when required.
  • Job Postings: Posting advertisements on job sites and on social media.
  • Database: Maintain organized databases with candidates data
  • Interviewing: Using standardized screening techniques, Assess the skills, qualifications and experience of potential candidates on interview via calls or emails, as well as facilitating pre-interview assessments and then arrange management interviews by coordinating schedules.
  • Documentation Feedback: Ensure proper onboarding for new hires and the necessary paperwork is completed promptly and accurately. Negotiating terms of hire with potential candidates. Provide feedback to management about details regarding applications.
  • Schedule and coordinate interviews between candidates and hiring managers.
  • Offer Negotiations and closures.

About the company

Tribeca is the largest branded luxury developer in India! Established in 2012, we have grown to become the largest developer of Trump-branded properties in the world (after the Trump Organization). Our current employee strength comprises more than 150 associates across Mumbai, Pune, Delhi-NCR, Kolkata, and Bangalore, and we have a team of incredibly talented, hungry, bright, and passionate folks, including IIT, IIM, Wharton, and SPA toppers and industry stalwarts.

At Tribeca, we are focused on creating world-class products and customer experiences. We pioneered the concept of branded residences in India and are developing over 6 million square feet of branded residential projects in India. We are also proud to be developing the world's largest rooftop terrace. We believe in contributing towards a sustainable environment and are committed to developing responsible homes that are energy efficient and use materials and resources that do not cause a negative impact on the environment.

jobDetail_text: Entity:- Accenture Industry X Practice:- Aerospace Technical Publications. Title:- Engineering Services Associate 12 Role:- AMM-Author Qualifications:- BE- Mechanical/Aero or AME course (Mechanical) Job location:- Bangalore About Industry X:- Industry X combines Accenture's powerful digital capabilities with deep engineering and manufacturing expertise. We use the power of data and digital to help our clients reimagine the products they make, and how they make them. By connecting engineering and manufacturing operations every step of the way - from how products are designed and engineered, sourced and supplied, manufactured, to how they are serviced and renewed, we help them achieve greater productivity, drive growth and meet their sustainability commitments Know more:- www.youtube.com/watch?v=XaLxTEI3atI WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU? Better carrier opportunity Opportunity to upgrade your soft skills through my Learning portal. What you would do in this role Take end-to-end responsibility for timely delivery of work orders. Analyze source data available to create technical documentation, request additional source from clients whenever needed. Quality control for the created/Revised technical documents. Creation and revision of AMM using standards like Ispec2200, S1000D. Preparation of supporting Documents like Lessons learnt, RCA, Enhancement trainings and etc.QualificationWho are we looking for? Fresher from BE in Aerospace, Mechanical or relevant subject like AME Mechanical. Experience in the field of Aircraft maintenance will be an advantage. Should have knowledge of aerospace tech data process. Strong knowledge about aircraft system, aerospace tech data process and airworthiness. Basic knowledge about aircraft manuals like AIPC/AMM/CMM/SRM. Ability to work with illustration team and raise Illustration mock ups with engineering drawings. Tools knowledge GIPSY/GIDOCA/AIRINA/IMS/DACAS, will be an added advantage. Should be able to understand and use ASD-STE Excellent understanding of ATA iSpec 2200 and S1000D standards Analyzing and interpretation of engineering drawings and reports Supporting continuous improvement initiatives to increase team efficiency. Excellent Written and Verbal Communication Skills Should be a strong team player and Proactiveness and willingness to take additional responsibility. Accenture is an equal opportunities employer and welcomes applications from all sections of society and does not discriminate on grounds of race, religion or belief, ethnic or national origin, disability, age, citizenship, marital, domestic or civil partnership status, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any other basis as protected by applicable law.

name: Bajaj Finserv Ltd.
description: Founded in April 2007, Bajaj Finserv is the financial arm of the Bajaj group. We believe in a simple philosophy to never settle for good and go for great. This reflects in our extensive product portfolio that spans across 3 broad categories- lending, insurance and wealth advisory. With 24 products spread across 12 product lines, were one of the fastest growing and most diversified NBFCs in India. Our footprint spans the length and breadth of India.

jobDetail_text: Managing and supporting the effective deployment of team of sales professionals with respect to that geographical area, exploring new markets and in allocating resources to most profitable opportunities.  Develop and manage channel partners effectively   Manage productivity by fixing productivity parameters for ASMs/SM s, monitoring performance against set parameters and weekly review with the ASMs and monthly review with the sales teams.  Achieving & exceeding Business goals.  Creating a strong & compliant sales culture across the channel to drive acquisitions, profitability and employee development.  Identifying the need of sales training, analyzing changing market trends, channel development etc. Also giving feedback & suggestions to the senior management  Ensure implementation of promotional plans & contests and suggesting new and innovating promotion plan for the area of work.  Retaining high performers and replace poor performers   Ensuring highest levels of employee relationship, motivation & engagement to drive results & high levels of employee satisfaction.   Ensuring that Goals, PMP discussions, Development Plan discussions, ongoing coaching and feedback, skip level meetings are done on time and in an effective manner.  Effectively engage Operations & Risk teams to understand and contribute to overall processes & profitability across locations.     Required Qualifications and Experience   " Relevant sales experience in managing large sales channels in multiple market environments  Prior & relevant experience in the Financial Services Industry would be an added advantage.   Demonstrated success & achievement orientation.   Excellent communication skills.  Strong bias for action & driving results in a high performance environment.   Demonstrated ability to lead from the front.   Excellent relationship skills.   Strong analytical skills to drive channel performance and drive profitability.  Exceptionally high motivational levels and needs to be a self starter.  Working knowledge of computers."
jobDetail_html:
Managing and supporting the effective deployment of team of sales professionals with respect to that geographical area, exploring new markets and in allocating resources to most profitable opportunities.
Develop and manage channel partners effectively
Manage productivity by fixing productivity parameters for ASMs/SM s, monitoring performance against set parameters and weekly review with the ASMs and monthly review with the sales teams.
Achieving & exceeding Business goals.
Creating a strong & compliant sales culture across the channel to drive acquisitions, profitability and employee development.
Identifying the need of sales training, analyzing changing market trends, channel development etc. Also giving feedback & suggestions to the senior management
Ensure implementation of promotional plans & contests and suggesting new and innovating promotion plan for the area of work.
Retaining high performers and replace poor performers
Ensuring highest levels of employee relationship, motivation & engagement to drive results & high levels of employee satisfaction.
Ensuring that Goals, PMP discussions, Development Plan discussions, ongoing coaching and feedback, skip level meetings are done on time and in an effective manner.
Effectively engage Operations & Risk teams to understand and contribute to overall processes & profitability across locations.

Required Qualifications and Experience
" Relevant sales experience in managing large sales channels in multiple market environments
Prior & relevant experience in the Financial Services Industry would be an added advantage.
Demonstrated success & achievement orientation.
Excellent communication skills.
Strong bias for action & driving results in a high performance environment.
Demonstrated ability to lead from the front.
Excellent relationship skills.
Strong analytical skills to drive channel performance and drive profitability.
Exceptionally high motivational levels and needs to be a self starter.
Working knowledge of computers."

jobDetail_html:
Project Role :Application Lead


Project Role Description :Lead the effort to design, build and configure applications, acting as the primary point of contact.

Must have skills :Microservices and Light Weight Architecture


Good to have skills :NA
Minimum
3 year(s) of experience is required


Educational Qualification :15 years full time education

Summary:As an Application Lead, you will lead the effort to design, build, and configure applications, acting as the primary point of contact. You will be responsible for overseeing the entire application development process and ensuring its successful implementation. Your role will involve collaborating with cross-functional teams, making key decisions, and providing solutions to problems. With your expertise in Microservices and Light Weight Architecture, you will contribute to the development of innovative and efficient applications.
Roles & Responsibilities:
  • Expected to be an SME, collaborate, and manage the team to perform.
  • Responsible for team decisions.
  • Engage with multiple teams and contribute to key decisions.
  • Provide solutions to problems for their immediate team and across multiple teams.
  • Lead the effort to design, build, and configure applications.
  • Act as the primary point of contact for application-related matters.
  • Oversee the entire application development process.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure successful implementation.
    Professional & Technical Skills:
  • Must To Have Skills:Proficiency in Microservices and Light Weight Architecture.
  • Strong understanding of software engineering principles and practices.
  • Experience in designing and developing scalable and high-performance applications.
  • Hands-on experience with application development frameworks and tools.
  • Solid grasp of cloud technologies and microservices architecture.
  • Good To Have Skills:Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes.
  • Experience with DevOps practices and tools.
  • Knowledge of Agile methodologies and practices.
    Additional Information:
  • The candidate should have a minimum of 7.5 years of experience in Microservices and Light Weight Architecture.
  • This position is based at our Pune office.
  • A 15 years full-time education is required.


    Qualifications
    15 years full time education

name: Capgemini
description: Capgemini is a global leader in partnering with companies to transform and manage their business by harnessing the power of technology. The Group is guided everyday by its purpose of unleashing human energy through technology for an inclusive and sustainable future. It is a responsible and diverse organization of over 300,000 team members in nearly 50 countries. With its strong 50-year heritage and deep industry expertise, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to address the entire breadth of their business needs, from strategy and design to operations, fueled by the fast evolving and innovative world of cloud, data, AI, connectivity, software, digital engineering and platforms. The Group reported in 2020 global revenues of €16 billion.\r\rCapgemini in India comprises over 150,000 team members working across 13 locations: Bangalore, Bhubaneswar, Chennai, Coimbatore, Gandhinagar, Gurugram, Hyderabad, Kolkata, Mumbai, Noida, Pune, Salem and Tiruchirappalli.

jobDetail_text: Embark on a dynamic career in tech support, where your skills contribute to maintaining world-class technology solutions to ensure a seamless user experience.     As a Technology Support I team member in Corporate & Investment Bank, Payments Technology, you will ensure the operational stability, availability, and performance of our production application flows. Be part of the team responsible for troubleshooting, maintaining, identifying, escalating, and resolving production service interruptions for all internally and externally developed systems, ensuring a seamless user experience.      Job responsibilities       Troubleshoot production application flows to ensure end-to-end application or infrastructure service delivery to support business operations     Assist in the improvement of operational stability and availability through participation in problem management     Assist in monitoring production environments for anomalies and address issues using standard observability tools     Identify and document basic issues and potential solutions for business and technology stakeholders     Support the management of incidents, problems, and changes in technology applications or infrastructure, and escalate in compliance with firm policy and processes       Required qualifications, capabilities, and skills       1+ years of experience or equivalent expertise in troubleshooting, resolving, and maintaining information technology services     Familiarity with applications or infrastructure in a large-scale technology environment on-premises or in the public cloud     Strong understanding of SWIFT, FX, Domestic, ISO MX File/Payment formats. Proficiency in automation tools and technologies - Tableau, Alteryx, Selenium, UiPath, Python etc     Experience in payments, with understanding of accounting and money move processes. Knowledge and experience in SWIFT, ISO MX, Cross Border Payments. Proven experience in automation development and implementation       Preferred qualifications, capabilities, and skills       Exposure to one or more general-purpose programming languages or automation scripting     Exposure to Information Technology Infrastructure Library (ITIL) framework     Experience and strong working knowledge of various aspects of cash operations is preferred
jobDetail_html:
Embark on a dynamic career in tech support, where your skills contribute to maintaining world-class technology solutions to ensure a seamless user experience.
As a Technology Support I team member in Corporate & Investment Bank, Payments Technology, you will ensure the operational stability, availability, and performance of our production application flows. Be part of the team responsible for troubleshooting, maintaining, identifying, escalating, and resolving production service interruptions for all internally and externally developed systems, ensuring a seamless user experience.
Job responsibilities
  • Troubleshoot production application flows to ensure end-to-end application or infrastructure service delivery to support business operations
  • Assist in the improvement of operational stability and availability through participation in problem management
  • Assist in monitoring production environments for anomalies and address issues using standard observability tools
  • Identify and document basic issues and potential solutions for business and technology stakeholders
  • Support the management of incidents, problems, and changes in technology applications or infrastructure, and escalate in compliance with firm policy and processes
Required qualifications, capabilities, and skills
  • 1+ years of experience or equivalent expertise in troubleshooting, resolving, and maintaining information technology services
  • Familiarity with applications or infrastructure in a large-scale technology environment on-premises or in the public cloud
  • Strong understanding of SWIFT, FX, Domestic, ISO MX File/Payment formats. Proficiency in automation tools and technologies - Tableau, Alteryx, Selenium, UiPath, Python etc
  • Experience in payments, with understanding of accounting and money move processes. Knowledge and experience in SWIFT, ISO MX, Cross Border Payments. Proven experience in automation development and implementation
Preferred qualifications, capabilities, and skills
  • Exposure to one or more general-purpose programming languages or automation scripting
  • Exposure to Information Technology Infrastructure Library (ITIL) framework
  • Experience and strong working knowledge of various aspects of cash operations is preferred

about_html: OYO
jobDetail_text: Roles : As a Business Development Lead at OYO, I am responsible for strategizing and scaling business operations in new markets. My key responsibilities include:Lead Generation & Market Expansion: Identifying high-potential properties for acquisition and business collaboration.Building Relationships: Engaging with property owners to communicate OYO's vision of providing comfortable stays.Strategic Planning: Developing joint business plans with property owners to ensure profitable partnerships.Stakeholder Collaboration: Working closely with Property Owners, Transformation, and Operations teams to ensure smooth processes from lead generation to property going live.Performance Monitoring: Regularly reviewing signed SLAs and addressing any issues to ensure successful business associations. Here are the key performance indicators (KPIs) in bullet points:Number of Sellable Rooms Signed: Track the number of rooms contracted with property owners each month.Number of Sellable Rooms Made Live: Monitor the number of rooms that go live and are available for booking each month.Gross Margin from Properties Signed: Measure the gross margin generated from the properties signed and operationalized.
jobDetail_html:
Roles :

As a Business Development Lead at OYO, I am responsible for strategizing and scaling business operations in new markets. My key responsibilities include:

  • Lead Generation & Market Expansion: Identifying high-potential properties for acquisition and business collaboration.
  • Building Relationships: Engaging with property owners to communicate OYO's vision of providing comfortable stays.
  • Strategic Planning: Developing joint business plans with property owners to ensure profitable partnerships.
  • Stakeholder Collaboration: Working closely with Property Owners, Transformation, and Operations teams to ensure smooth processes from lead generation to property going live.
  • Performance Monitoring: Regularly reviewing signed SLAs and addressing any issues to ensure successful business associations.

Here are the key performance indicators (KPIs) in bullet points:

  • Number of Sellable Rooms Signed: Track the number of rooms contracted with property owners each month.
  • Number of Sellable Rooms Made Live: Monitor the number of rooms that go live and are available for booking each month.
  • Gross Margin from Properties Signed: Measure the gross margin generated from the properties signed and operationalized.

jobDetail_html:
Role & responsibilities


  • Control testing ,Control assurance, cyber security in cloud space.
  • Good knowledge of auditing IT application controls, e.g., from IT audits or IT risk management.
  • Drive Annual Control Test Plan governance activities.
  • Perform Control Testing in line with Control Testing methodology/minimum standard
  • Identify control deficiencies (findings), risks related to elements of controls, agree findings with stakeholders, escalate potential issues and exception items noted during the testing to senior management for discussion and further investigation, if deemed necessary
  • Prepare Control Testing workpapers, reports for senior management detailing testing results, findings with highest quality
  • Track Control Testing identified findings, perform required follow-up on open findings
  • Participate (and prepare materials) in various Risk & Control governance forums
  • Contribute to the development, collation and execution of annual control assurance plan based on the results of the annual risk assessments, industry risk events etc. in consultation with the Head of Control Testing and other key stakeholders
  • Consider regulatory and internal firm policy requirements as well as established best practices for control testing
  • Support controls assurance activities
  • Drive Annual Control Test Plan governance activities (Identify, discuss, and resolve any scoping conflicts between control testing teams)
  • Monitor Control testing teams adherence to Control Testing methodology/minimum standards
  • Contribute/drive continuous improvement i.e., minimum standard and tooling, automation
  • Support, manage Control Testing vendor resources, where applicable
  • Track testing related effort/budget Plan Vs. Actuals throughout the testing lifecycle
  • Build and maintain solid working relationships with key stakeholders such as within the DCO, IDCO, TSCO, GTI and other Testing Teams including Divisions/sub-divisions, 2 LoD and Group Audit (GA)


Preferred candidate profile


  • Control testing ,Control assurance, cyber security in cloud space.
  • Good knowledge of auditing IT application controls, e.g., from IT audits or IT risk management.
  • Drive Annual Control Test Plan governance activities.
  • University degree preferably in Computer Science, Mathematics, Engineering or a related subject or equivalent qualification in the areas of information security.
  • Professional/industry recognized qualifications e.g., CISA, CISSP, CISM, CRISC are beneficial.
  • Experience in Cloud Security audit/testing, GCP (Google Cloud Platforms) or Professional/industry recognized qualifications e.g., CCSP, CCSK
  • Good knowledge of auditing IT application controls, e.g., from IT audits or IT risk management.
  • Clear understanding of the relationship between IT risk and underlying business process risk.
  • Knowledge of regulations governing financial institutions and of Compliance and AFC topics such as embargo controls or anti-money laundering is beneficial.
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills and the ability to communicate effectively in conflict situations.
  • Good drafting skills, including ability to record and describe complex issues clearly and succinctly, in a way that is easily understandable by any recipient of the relevant reports.  
  • Strong organizational, project management and leadership skills and attention to detail.
  • Ability to work under pressure, multi-task and prioritize workload.
  • Strong analytical, presentation skills and structured thought process with the ability to clearly articulate control deficiencies and related risk
  • Flexible, proactive, and innovative mind set with strong organizational skills to take ownership and responsibility for agreed targets and to meet them within budget to enable a timely and efficient completion of projects.
  • This is an IC (individual contributor) role, but Line management responsibilities may be required to be performed, where necessary.


Perks and benefits

  • Training and development to help you excel in your career
  • Flexible working to assist you balance your personal priorities
  • Coaching and support from experts in your team
  • A culture of continuous learning to aid progression
  • A range of flexible benefits that you can tailor to suit your needs

jobDetail_html:
Role & responsibilities

  • Review, preparation and execution of documentation for NCD, Sub debt, Perpetual Debt, Commercial Paper, Term Loan and other fund raising instruments.
  • Liasoning with various intermediaries, arrangers, stock exchange, investors, etc. for issuances and prompt resolution of issues.
  • Listing of debt securities with the Stock Exchange and compliance with Listing Regulations& updating checklist for specific and routine Debt Listing Compliances.
  • Monthly/Quarterly /Half Yearly/Incidental compliances and submissions to Trustees, Banks, Rating Agencies, RTA, IPA, etc.
  • Tracking updates in RBI/SEBI/Listing/FIMMDA regulations and implementing the same.
  • Maintenance & updation of Treasury MIS
  • Tracking and ensuring interest payment/redemptions on debentures, intimation of record date and co-coordinating with Accounts team for monitoring these payments.
  • Monthly renewals of credit - rating letters
  • Updation of debt related information on the Company website
  • Co-ordination with Banks & updation of ROI /MCLR& loan statement reconciliation
  • Negotiating with banks for reduction of effective ROI charged / pre-closure of loans and obtaining No Dues Certificates.
  • Preparation of loan applications and drawdown requests as per fund requirement
  • Providing required information & resolution of queries from Auditors
  • Processing bills received from Trustees, RTA, Arrangers, etc.

Preferred candidate profile

  • Qualified CA fresher.
  • Knowledge into Treasury, financial reporting would be added advantage.

about_html:
About Maersk

Maersk is a global leader in integrated logistics and have been industry pioneers for over a century. Through innovation and transformation, we are redefining the boundaries of possibility, continuously setting new standards for efficiency, sustainability, and excellence.

At Maersk, we believe in the power of diversity, collaboration, and continuous learning and we work hard to ensure that the people in our organization reflect and understand the customers we exist to serve.

With over 100,000 employees across 130 countries, we work together to shape the future of global trade and logistics.

Join us as we harness cutting-edge technologies and unlock opportunities on a global scale. Together, let's sail towards a brighter, more sustainable future with Maersk.


What we Offer

This is an exciting career opportunity in an international, challenging business setting known for diversity and high paced environment. You will get to focus on creating valuable relations with stakeholders and work with highly professional teams in an environment where you will be valued, recognized and well rewarded.

You will work with amazing and diverse colleagues with a deep sense of commitment to live Our Values and together, go all the way for our customers, society and for each other.
jobDetail_text: Job Description Expert in TAX platform products and responsible for implementation and support of a standardized TAX platform that is scalable to support our Maersk Integrator journey.You could be:A TAX technical consultant who wants to lead an end-to-end implementation of a new TAX technology platform globally, orA chartered accountant or TAX functional consultant with flair for technology and experience with SAP, who wants to get closer to the TAX solution, orA software engineer who has been developing SAP and/or TAX engine solutions, but would like to get closer to the business processes and challenges, orSomeone who is working as a Platform Product Subject Matter Expert today and need some new challenges.Job Purpose: The Platform Product Subject Matter Expert owns Maersks Global TAX technology platform. She/he works closely with our Global Indirect TAX business team and our internal TAX engineers to design, develop and maintain a TAX technology platform, that serves our business’ needs and is scalable to support our Maersk Integrator journey. The Platform Product Subject Matter Expert leads and drives the implementation of the TAX technology platform roadmap and maintain strong relationships with stakeholders within Global TAX as well as across other finance areas. Role Responsibilities:Own the Indirect TAX technology platform, roadmap and backlogUnderstand business and end-user’s needs and translate them into technical requirements/specifications for buildSelect the best solution option and solve platform design challenges in collaboration with engineersUnderstand the current vs the new solution and related business and end-user impactOwn Indirect TAX data and support migration and validation Develop test scenarios and test cases and support end-users with testingSupport test issue resolution Drive business cut-over activities Support hyper care issue resolution Person Specification:You have a personal drive, take ownership and work independentlyYou have an end-to-end process mindset and solid experience with Indirect TAX and Accounts Receivable processes.You have a technical understanding of and can navigate in SAP (ECC/S4) You have either been part of a software delivery organization or been leading software implementation projects, so that you understand the cycle of software deliveryYou can apply agile analysis technics and transforming business requirements into technical specifications.You have experience with test case preparation and test execution.
jobDetail_html:
Job Description

Expert in TAX platform products and responsible for implementation and support of a standardized TAX platform that is scalable to support our Maersk Integrator journey.

You could be:

  • A TAX technical consultant who wants to lead an end-to-end implementation of a new TAX technology platform globally, or
  • A chartered accountant or TAX functional consultant with flair for technology and experience with SAP, who wants to get closer to the TAX solution, or
  • A software engineer who has been developing SAP and/or TAX engine solutions, but would like to get closer to the business processes and challenges, or
  • Someone who is working as a Platform Product Subject Matter Expert today and need some new challenges.

Job Purpose:

The Platform Product Subject Matter Expert owns Maersks Global TAX technology platform. She/he works closely with our Global Indirect TAX business team and our internal TAX engineers to design, develop and maintain a TAX technology platform, that serves our business’ needs and is scalable to support our Maersk Integrator journey. The Platform Product Subject Matter Expert leads and drives the implementation of the TAX technology platform roadmap and maintain strong relationships with stakeholders within Global TAX as well as across other finance areas.

Role Responsibilities:

  • Own the Indirect TAX technology platform, roadmap and backlog
  • Understand business and end-user’s needs and translate them into technical requirements/specifications for build
  • Select the best solution option and solve platform design challenges in collaboration with engineers
  • Understand the current vs the new solution and related business and end-user impact
  • Own Indirect TAX data and support migration and validation
  • Develop test scenarios and test cases and support end-users with testing
  • Support test issue resolution 
  • Drive business cut-over activities
  • Support hyper care issue resolution

Person Specification:

  • You have a personal drive, take ownership and work independently
  • You have an end-to-end process mindset and solid experience with Indirect TAX and Accounts Receivable processes.
  • You have a technical understanding of and can navigate in SAP (ECC/S4)
  • You have either been part of a software delivery organization or been leading software implementation projects, so that you understand the cycle of software delivery
  • You can apply agile analysis technics and transforming business requirements into technical specifications.
  • You have experience with test case preparation and test execution.

jobDetail_html:
Job Title: Voice Process & Contact Center Agent
Company: Vetarasoft Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
Location: Hyderabad, India

About Us:
At Vetarasoft Technologies, we are dedicated to delivering world-class customer support services. We are expanding our team and looking for dynamic individuals with a passion for customer service to join our USA/UK Voice Process team.

Position Overview:
We are hiring experienced Voice Process & Contact Center Agents with excellent communication skills and a customer-first approach. If you thrive in a fast-paced environment and have prior experience in CRM tools and voice-based processes, wed love to hear from you!

Key Responsibilities:

  • Handle inbound and outbound customer calls for USA/UK-based clients.
  • Provide exceptional service by addressing queries, troubleshooting, and resolving issues.
  • Maintain accurate customer records using CRM tools.
  • Follow established communication protocols and processes to meet service standards.
  • Collaborate with team members and supervisors to improve overall customer experience.

Key Requirements:

  • Experience: Minimum 1-4 years in a voice process or contact center role.
  • Skills: Excellent verbal communication skills in English.
  • Tools: Familiarity with CRM tools and related software is required.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and customer orientation.
  • Ability to work in rotational shifts to cater to international time zones.
  • Prior experience in USA/UK-based customer support is a plus.

What We Offer:

  • Competitive salary and performance-based incentives.
  • Comprehensive training and professional development.
  • An inclusive and dynamic work environment.
  • Opportunities for career growth within the organization.

How to Apply:
Interested candidates can send their updated resumes to [hr@vetarasoft.com] with the subject line: Application for Voice Process Vetarasoft Technologies.

Join us at Vetarasoft Technologies and take the next step in your career with a company that values innovation, teamwork, and customer excellence!


Note: Immediate joiners are preferred.

jobDetail_html:
Job Title: Network Engineer (Cisco & FortiGate)
Contract Duration: November 2024 to December 2025 (Potential for Extension)
Location: India-Offshore(Work From Home)
Time Zone: Primarily EMEA (Flexibility Required During Migrations)
Start Date: Immediate (Likely Early 2025 Due to Onboarding Timelines)


We are seeking a highly skilled and proactive Network Engineer with strong expertise in Cisco and FortiGate technologies to support our ongoing projects. In this role, you will be responsible for network configurations, security, and management across various environments. The ideal candidate will also have experience with Ansible automation for network tasks and Azure networking.
If you are a motivated professional with excellent written and spoken English skills and can adapt to a dynamic project environment, we want to hear from you.

Requirements

  • Configure, manage, and optimize Cisco and FortiGate networks.
  • Collaborate with the team on network automation using Ansible (experience with Ansible is advantageous but not mandatory).
  • Support Azure networking infrastructure as needed.
  • Work within the EMEA time zone, with occasional flexibility during migration windows.
  • Contribute to network migrations, ensuring a smooth and secure transition.
  • Work closely with stakeholders, providing clear documentation and communication.
  • Required: At least 3 years of hands-on experience with Cisco and FortiGate technologies.
  • Preferred: Familiarity with Ansible for network automation.
  • Beneficial: Experience in Azure networking.
  • Strong command of both written and spoken English for effective communication.

jobDetail_html:
• Experience Fresh

Job Description

The Operation Executive will oversee and optimize daily operations to ensure that the company functions efficiently. This role requires a proactive individual who can manage various tasks, coordinate with different departments, and implement processes to improve operational efficiency.

Key Responsibilities:
  • Manage Daily Operations: Oversee day-to-day business activities, ensuring that all processes run smoothly and efficiently.
  • Coordinate with Departments: Work closely with different departments (e.g., sales, finance, logistics) to ensure that operations are aligned with company goals.
  • Process Improvement: Identify opportunities for process optimization and implement strategies to improve efficiency and reduce costs.
  • Data Analysis: Collect, analyze, and interpret data to make informed decisions and provide actionable insights to management.
  • Inventory Management: Monitor inventory levels and coordinate with suppliers to ensure that stock levels are maintained.
  • Vendor Management: Liaise with vendors and suppliers to negotiate contracts, manage relationships, and ensure timely delivery of goods and services.
  • Compliance and Risk Management: Ensure that all operations comply with relevant laws, regulations, and company policies. Identify potential risks and develop mitigation strategies.
  • Project Management: Plan and execute projects to improve operational efficiency and achieve business objectives.
  • Reporting: Prepare regular reports for management on operational performance, including metrics such as productivity, quality, and customer satisfaction.
  • Support: Provide administrative support and assist with ad-hoc tasks as needed.
Qualifications:
  • Education: Bachelors degree in Business Administration, Operations Management, or a related field.
  • Skills:
    • Strong organizational and multitasking abilities
    • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
    • Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)
    • Ability to analyze data and provide actionable insights
    • Knowledge of operational management software (e.g., ERP systems)
  • Personal Attributes:
    • Attention to detail and accuracy
    • Problem-solving mindset
    • Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines
    • Team player with a collaborative approach

The role involves inventory management, coordinating shipments, supervising staff, and ensuring compliance with safety and regulatory standards.Key Responsibilities:Inventory Management:Maintain accurate records of all incoming and outgoing shipments.Conduct regular inventory checks to ensure stock accuracy.Manage stock levels, reorder points, and restock inventory as required.Order Fulfillment:Process orders, package goods, and prepare them for dispatch.Coordinate with transport teams to ensure timely deliveries.Handle customer queries related to shipment and stock availability.Warehouse Operations:Ensure smooth operation of the warehouse, from receiving goods to dispatching orders.Implement best practices in organizing and storing goods efficiently.Ensure all equipment is maintained and used safely.Team Supervision:Oversee a team of warehouse staff, including scheduling shifts and assigning tasks.Train, guide, and monitor team performance, ensuring all activities are aligned with company goals.Safety and Compliance:Enforce strict adherence to safety standards in the warehouse.Ensure all operations comply with company policies and local regulations.Conduct safety audits and implement corrective measures where necessary.Documentation and Reporting:Maintain accurate documentation related to stock, shipments, and daily operations.Generate periodic reports on inventory, orders, and team performance for management review.Required Qualifications:Bachelors degree in logistics, supply chain management, or a related field (preferred).Proven experience in warehouse or inventory management.Knowledge of warehouse management software and systems (e.g., SAP, WMS).Skills and Competencies:Strong organizational and time management skills.Excellent problem-solving abilities and attention to detail.Proficient in MS Office, especially Excel.Good communication and leadership skills.
jobDetail_html:
• Career Level Executive
  • Experience Less Than 1 Year
  • Gender Male
  • Qualifications Degree Bachelor

Job Description

The Warehouse Executive plays a crucial role in managing the day-to-day operations of the warehouse, ensuring efficient and timely storage, distribution, and handling of goods. The role involves inventory management, coordinating shipments, supervising staff, and ensuring compliance with safety and regulatory standards.

Key Responsibilities:
  • Inventory Management:
    • Maintain accurate records of all incoming and outgoing shipments.
    • Conduct regular inventory checks to ensure stock accuracy.
    • Manage stock levels, reorder points, and restock inventory as required.
  • Order Fulfillment:
    • Process orders, package goods, and prepare them for dispatch.
    • Coordinate with transport teams to ensure timely deliveries.
    • Handle customer queries related to shipment and stock availability.
  • Warehouse Operations:
    • Ensure smooth operation of the warehouse, from receiving goods to dispatching orders.
    • Implement best practices in organizing and storing goods efficiently.
    • Ensure all equipment is maintained and used safely.
  • Team Supervision:
    • Oversee a team of warehouse staff, including scheduling shifts and assigning tasks.
    • Train, guide, and monitor team performance, ensuring all activities are aligned with company goals.
  • Safety and Compliance:
    • Enforce strict adherence to safety standards in the warehouse.
    • Ensure all operations comply with company policies and local regulations.
    • Conduct safety audits and implement corrective measures where necessary.
  • Documentation and Reporting:
    • Maintain accurate documentation related to stock, shipments, and daily operations.
    • Generate periodic reports on inventory, orders, and team performance for management review.
Required Qualifications:
  • Bachelors degree in logistics, supply chain management, or a related field (preferred).
  • Proven experience in warehouse or inventory management.
  • Knowledge of warehouse management software and systems (e.g., SAP, WMS).
Skills and Competencies:
  • Strong organizational and time management skills.
  • Excellent problem-solving abilities and attention to detail.
  • Proficient in MS Office, especially Excel.
  • Good communication and leadership skills.

jobDetail_html:
• Career Level Manager
  • Experience Less Than 1 Year
  • Gender Male
  • Qualifications Degree Bachelor

Job Description

We are looking for a customer relationship manager to be responsible for engaging with key customers by building and preserving trusting relationships. The customer relationship manager will constantly identify opportunities to grow the customer base and build positive relationships with new clients. You should also be strategic and analytical when finding solutions to problems to ensure maximum client satisfaction.

To be successful as a customer relationship manager, you should possess excellent communication skills and maintain the core values of the organization. You will conduct quality assurance surveys to determine customer satisfaction and use the findings to improve on areas of complaint. Ultimately, an outstanding customer relationship manager will work closely with sales and accounts managers to ensure that all staff preserves relationships with clients.

Customer Relationship Manager Responsibilities:
  • Building and maintaining profitable relationships with key customers.
  • Overseeing the relationship with customers handled by your team.
  • Resolving customer complaints quickly and efficiently.
  • Keeping customers updated on the latest products in order to increase sales.
  • Meeting with managers in the organization to plan strategically.
  • Expanding the customer base by upselling and cross-selling.
  • Understanding key customer individual needs and addressing these.
  • Conducting business reviews using CRM programs.
  • Knowing your competition and strategizing accordingly.
Customer Relationship Manager Requirements:
  • A bachelors degree in administration or a related field.
  • Excellent interpersonal and communication skills.
  • Proficient in all Microsoft applications.
  • Superior product knowledge.

• Career Level Executive

Job Description

We are seeking a talented and creative Graphic Designer to join our team. The Graphic Designer will be responsible for creating visually appealing designs that align with our brand and meet marketing objectives. The ideal candidate will have a strong portfolio, proficiency in design software, and the ability to translate concepts into effective visual solutions.

Key Responsibilities:
  • Design Creation: Develop creative designs for various media, including digital, print, social media, and web assets.
  • Brand Consistency: Ensure that all designs adhere to brand guidelines and maintain a consistent look and feel across all platforms.
  • Project Collaboration: Work closely with the marketing team, copywriters, and other stakeholders to understand project requirements and deliver effective design solutions.
  • Concept Development: Generate design ideas and concepts that meet the goals of the project, from brainstorming through to final execution.
  • Revisions: Implement feedback and revisions as required, ensuring the final product meets project goals and standards.
  • File Preparation: Prepare final artwork for digital or print production, ensuring all files are correct and ready for use.
  • Time Management: Manage multiple projects simultaneously, ensuring that all deadlines are met.
  • Trend Awareness: Stay up-to-date with industry trends, new tools, and design best practices to continuously improve design work.
Qualifications:
  • Education: Bachelors degree in Graphic Design, Visual Arts, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
  • Skills:
    • Proficiency in graphic design software (e.g., Adobe Creative Suite: Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign).
    • Knowledge of design principles, typography, and color theory.
    • Strong visual storytelling and creativity.
    • Ability to interpret and work with creative briefs.
    • Strong attention to detail and a high level of accuracy.
    • Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and meet deadlines.
  • Other: Basic knowledge of web design, video editing, or animation is a plus.

Job Description

We are looking for a motivated and results-driven Field Sales Executive to join our growing team. As a Field Sales Executive, you will be responsible for identifying new business opportunities, generating leads, and meeting sales targets. You will be working in the field, visiting prospective clients, and building long-term relationships to drive sales growth.

Key Responsibilities:
  • Business Development: Identify and pursue new business opportunities by prospecting, cold calling, and networking within the assigned territory.
  • Client Visits: Conduct regular visits to potential and existing clients to present products and services, negotiate contracts, and close sales.
  • Relationship Building: Develop and maintain strong, long-term relationships with key decision-makers in target companies.
  • Sales Presentations: Prepare and deliver compelling sales presentations to prospective clients, tailoring pitches to the clients needs.
  • Market Research: Conduct market research to identify customer needs, industry trends, and competitors activities.
  • Sales Planning: Develop and implement effective sales strategies and plans to achieve or exceed sales targets.
  • Reporting: Maintain accurate records of sales activities, customer interactions, and sales pipeline. Prepare regular reports on sales performance and market feedback.
  • Customer Support: Provide post-sales support to ensure customer satisfaction and retention, handling any issues or complaints promptly.
  • Collaboration: Work closely with the marketing, product development, and customer service teams to ensure consistent messaging and customer experience.
Qualifications:
  • Education:
    • Bachelors degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field is preferred.
  • Skills:
    • Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
    • Strong organizational and time management skills.
    • Ability to work independently and manage multiple client accounts.
    • Proficient in using CRM software and Microsoft Office Suite.

jobDetail_html:
• Experience Fresh

Job Description

The Front Office Executive serves as the face of the company, providing a warm, courteous, and professional first impression to all visitors and callers. This role involves managing the front desk, handling day-to-day administrative tasks, and ensuring the smooth operation of the office. The ideal candidate is organized, detail-oriented, and has excellent communication skills.

Key Responsibilities:
  • Reception Duties:
    • Greet and welcome visitors as soon as they arrive at the office.
    • Direct visitors to the appropriate person and office.
    • Answer, screen, and forward incoming phone calls.
    • Ensure the reception area is tidy and presentable, with all necessary stationery and materials.
  • Administrative Support:
    • Receive, sort, and distribute daily mail/deliveries.
    • Maintain office security by following safety procedures and controlling access via the reception desk (monitor logbook, issue visitor badges).
    • Manage calendars, schedule meetings, and arrange appointments.
    • Assist in the preparation of regularly scheduled reports.
  • Office Management:
    • Order front office supplies and keep inventory of stock.
    • Coordinate with the IT department on all office equipment.
    • Manage and maintain office filing systems and databases.
    • Assist in the organization of company events or meetings.
  • Customer Service:
    • Address customer inquiries in a timely and professional manner.
    • Provide basic and accurate information in person and via phone/email.
    • Assist with customer service tasks as needed.
Qualifications and Skills:
  • Education:
    • High school diploma or equivalent; additional qualifications as a Front Office Executive or relevant experience is a plus.
  • Skills:
    • Professional attitude and appearance.
    • Solid written and verbal communication skills.
    • Ability to be resourceful and proactive when issues arise.
    • Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail.
    • Multitasking and time-management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks.
    • Customer service attitude.

Job Description

The HR Executive is responsible for managing various HR functions, including recruitment, employee relations, performance management, and compliance with labor laws. This role is essential in supporting the organizations HR strategy and fostering a positive work environment.

Key Responsibilities:
  1. Recruitment and Onboarding:
    • Manage the end-to-end recruitment process, from job posting to candidate selection.
    • Conduct new hire orientation and ensure a smooth onboarding process.
  2. Employee Relations:
    • Act as the main point of contact for employee concerns and inquiries.
    • Mediate and resolve employee conflicts and grievances.
    • Promote a positive workplace culture through engagement initiatives.
  3. Performance Management:
    • Support the implementation of performance appraisal systems.
    • Provide feedback and coaching to employees, and assist in performance improvement plans.
  4. Compliance:
    • Ensure compliance with labor laws and company policies.
    • Maintain employee records and manage HR documentation.
    • Assist in handling disciplinary actions and terminations.
  5. HR Administration:
    • Manage employee benefits, leave, and payroll processing.
    • Prepare HR reports and metrics for management review.
  6. Policy Development:
    • Assist in the development and implementation of HR policies and procedures.
    • Communicate HR policies and updates to employees.
Qualifications:
  • Education: Bachelors degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or related field.
  • Skills:
    • Strong knowledge of HR practices and labor laws.
    • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
    • Ability to manage confidential information with discretion.
    • Proficient in HR software and Microsoft Office Suite.

• Career Level Executive
  • Experience Fresh

Job Description

The Back Office Executive is responsible for managing a range of administrative and support functions that are critical to the smooth operation of the organization. This role requires attention to detail, strong organizational skills, and the ability to handle multiple tasks efficiently. The ideal candidate will work behind the scenes to ensure that all backend processes are running smoothly and that internal operations are well-coordinated.

Key Responsibilities:
  • Data Management:
    • Enter and update accurate data in the companys systems and databases.
    • Maintain and manage data integrity and security.
    • Generate reports and perform data analysis as required.
  • Documentation and Record-Keeping:
    • Prepare and process documentation, including contracts, invoices, and other official records.
    • Maintain organized filing systems, both physical and electronic.
    • Ensure compliance with company policies and legal regulations in record-keeping.
  • Administrative Support:
    • Assist with scheduling meetings, coordinating appointments, and managing calendars.
    • Provide support for the preparation of presentations and other business documents.
    • Handle internal communications and coordinate with other departments as needed.
  • Inventory and Resource Management:
    • Monitor and manage office supplies and inventory.
    • Coordinate with vendors and suppliers for office needs.
    • Assist in managing company assets and resources.
  • Customer and Client Support:
    • Handle customer inquiries and resolve issues via phone, email, or other communication channels.
    • Process orders, applications, or requests received from clients.
    • Support the front office in managing client relationships and service delivery.
  • Financial Support:
    • Assist with basic bookkeeping tasks, including processing invoices and payments.
    • Support the finance department in managing budgets and financial records.
Qualifications and Skills:
  • Education:
    • High school diploma or equivalent; a degree in Business Administration or a related field is preferred.
  • Experience:
    • Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and familiarity with office management software.
    • Experience with data management and record-keeping.
  • Skills:
    • Strong organizational and multitasking abilities.
    • Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
    • High attention to detail and problem-solving skills.
    • Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
    • Knowledge of office management procedures and basic accounting principles.

name: Firealps Distribution
description: FireAlps is a dynamic company specializing in the design, development, and distribution of a wide range of electronic components and systems for various industries. It offers solutions for medical devices, automotive, aerospace, telecommunications, industrial automation, consumer electronics, energy, and defense sectors. The company focuses on high-quality, innovative products, including integrated circuits, PCBs (printed circuit boards), sensors, microcontrollers, capacitors, and industrial automation systems.  Notable expertise includes designing advanced PCBs for demanding applications, such as automotive electronics, which require durability in extreme environments, and aerospace systems, which demand robust designs resistant to vibration and radiation. FireAlps also supports renewable energy projects and modernizes manufacturing with industrial automation solutions
about_html:
FireAlps is a dynamic company specializing in the design, development, and distribution of a wide range of electronic components and systems for various industries. It offers solutions for medical devices, automotive, aerospace, telecommunications, industrial automation, consumer electronics, energy, and defense sectors. The company focuses on high-quality, innovative products, including integrated circuits, PCBs (printed circuit boards), sensors, microcontrollers, capacitors, and industrial automation systems.

Notable expertise includes designing advanced PCBs for demanding applications, such as automotive electronics, which require durability in extreme environments, and aerospace systems, which demand robust designs resistant to vibration and radiation. FireAlps also supports renewable energy projects and modernizes manufacturing with industrial automation solutions

jobDetail_html:
What we offer?


Opportunity for freshers & young IT professional to learn/specialize through structured paid internship program across following IT roles & technologies while working on internal and client projects.


  • UI/UX Designer - Figma, Canva, Adobe XP
  • Web/Mobile developer - HTML, JavaScript, CSS, React, Angular, Flutter
  • Backend/DB Developer - Java, C#, Python, JavaScript, Golang, MySQL, Postgres
  • BI & Analytics - SQL, PowerBI, Superset
  • DevOps - Python, Ansible, Docker, Maven, AWS, Azure
  • QA Engineering & Automation - Selenium, JMeter, UiPath, Playwright
  • General Mgmt., Sales & Marketing - Agile, Jira, CRM, Project Mgmt

Internship Model


A program that pays for learning. Our structured internship program takes candidate from a newbie to an expert over selected specialization stream across 3 phases spanning 6 months to a year depending on candidate proficiency.


Phase 1 - Class room sessions & project work with real IT professional (no trainers)

Phase 2 - Internal IT project work under aligned stream mentor and then independent contributions

Phase 3 - Real client projects under aligned mentor to independent contributions


What we need?


Smart hard workers. Young energetic freshers & IT professionals willing to learn & explore latest SW development technologies & delivery/management methodologies. Candidates aspiring to explore this opportunity with us should possess


  • Basic logical problem solving & mathematical ability
  • Strong work ethics
  • Good interpersonal skills & willingness to work in team setup
  • BE/BTech is nice to have but not mandatory
  • Previous job experience if any is nice to have not mandatory
  • Any school, college or job experience in any of the following programming language (Java, C#, JavaScript, Python or similar language) would really boost your chances to get selected in the program for technical stream

Perks and benefits


  • Mentorship and guidance of IT professionals
  • Experience on working in real projects
  • Get paid for learning on job
  • Chance to offered a full time employment in-house and with our IT clients
  • Help with placements with our clients

jobDetail_html:
Job Opportunity for Trainers at GTTC (Government Tool Room and Training Centers)

Job Opportunity Details:

Position:

  • Junior - Technical Engineer
  • Senior - Senior Technical Engineer

Locations:
Our trainers will be deployed across the following cities in Karnataka:

  • Magadi, Devanahalli, Kanakapura
  • Hubballi
  • Belgaum
  • Harihara
  • Hassan
  • Kudalasangama
  • Tumkur
  • Humnabad
  • Dharwad
  • Koppal
  • Chitradurga
  • Shimoga
  • Gulbarga

Domains:

  • Electrical and Electronics Engineering
  • Electronics and Communication Engineering
  • Information Science and Technology Engineering
  • Computer Science Engineering
  • Mechatronics
  • Mechanical Engineering

Job Roles & Responsibilities:

  • Junior - Technical Engineer:
    As a Junior Technical Engineer, you will be responsible for conducting training sessions in your respective domain, assisting senior trainers, and supporting students with their learning processes. You will be expected to learn and adapt the training curriculum, ensuring that students receive high-quality technical education.
  • Senior - Senior Technical Engineer:
    As a Senior Technical Engineer, you will be leading the training initiatives at various GTTc centers, designing training modules, and guiding junior engineers. You will be responsible for enhancing the curriculum, conducting advanced technical training, and assessing the performance of the trainees. In addition, you will collaborate with other departments and mentors to create a positive learning environment.


Desired Qualifications & Skills:

  • Junior - Technical Engineer:
    • Bachelor's degree in Engineering or related field.
    • Strong technical knowledge in your respective domain.
    • Good communication and presentation skills.
    • Fresh graduates or 1-2 years of experience in the technical field.
  • Senior - Senior Technical Engineer:
    • Bachelor's or Masters degree in Engineering or related field.
    • Minimum 3+ years of experience in technical training or relevant industry experience.
    • Proven leadership skills and the ability to manage and mentor junior engineers.
    • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.


Why Join Us:

  • Gain hands-on experience in training and development.
  • Opportunity to work at GTTc centers across Karnataka.
  • Competitive salary and career growth.
  • Exposure to a dynamic and innovative environment.


How to Apply:

Interested candidates can apply by sending their resumes to hr@techvoc.in .For more information, please feel free to contact us at 7022877247

We look forward to welcoming passionate individuals who are eager to contribute to the growth of technical education in Karnataka.

Contact Information:

Prajakta Bijapure
Senior HR Executive
Mobile: 7022877247


Supriya V G

Head-Academics

Mobile: 9480690830

jobDetail_text: Role & responsibilities  Circuit Design & Analysis:Assist in designing and analyzing analog and digital circuits for various applications.Create and modify schematics using tools like KiCad, Eagle, or Altium.PCB Design & Prototyping:Work on PCB layout design and fabrication for prototypes.Test and validate PCB functionality using industry-standard tools.Embedded System Development:Program microcontrollers (e.g., Arduino, ESP32, STM32) for project requirements.Debug and optimize embedded code for performance and reliability.Testing & Troubleshooting:Perform functional testing of electronic components and devices.Use diagnostic tools like oscilloscopes, logic analyzers, and multimeters for troubleshooting.Research & Development:Conduct research on new technologies, components, and methods for electronics applications. Document findings and provide innovative solutions to improve system performance.IoT Integration:Assist in developing IoT-based systems with wireless communication protocols (e.g., LoRa, Wi-Fi, MQTT). Work on data transmission, cloud integration, and remote monitoring solutions.Preferred candidate profile Enthusiastic and detail-oriented junior electronics engineer with a strong foundation in electronic circuit design, microcontrollers, and embedded systems. Skilled in troubleshooting, testing, and implementing innovative solutions for real-world problems. Eager to gain hands-on experience in the electronics and IoT industry while contributing to impactful projects.
jobDetail_html:
Role & responsibilities

  • Circuit Design & Analysis:
    Assist in designing and analyzing analog and digital circuits for various applications.Create and modify schematics using tools like KiCad, Eagle, or Altium.
  • PCB Design & Prototyping:
    Work on PCB layout design and fabrication for prototypes.Test and validate PCB functionality using industry-standard tools.
  • Embedded System Development:
    Program microcontrollers (e.g., Arduino, ESP32, STM32) for project requirements.Debug and optimize embedded code for performance and reliability.
  • Testing & Troubleshooting:
    Perform functional testing of electronic components and devices.Use diagnostic tools like oscilloscopes, logic analyzers, and multimeters for troubleshooting.
  • Research & Development:
    Conduct research on new technologies, components, and methods for electronics applications. Document findings and provide innovative solutions to improve system performance.
  • IoT Integration:
    Assist in developing IoT-based systems with wireless communication protocols (e.g., LoRa, Wi-Fi, MQTT). Work on data transmission, cloud integration, and remote monitoring solutions.

Preferred candidate profile


Enthusiastic and detail-oriented junior electronics engineer with a strong foundation in electronic circuit design, microcontrollers, and embedded systems. Skilled in troubleshooting, testing, and implementing innovative solutions for real-world problems. Eager to gain hands-on experience in the electronics and IoT industry while contributing to impactful projects.

jobDetail_html:
Role & responsibilities


1. Optimization Problem-Solving:

Develop and implement mathematical models/ Genetic Computational

Models/ Reinforcement Algorithms for space optimization problems.

Apply optimization techniques to maximise space utilisation while

adhering to specific constraints (e.g., weight, dimension, arrangement

rules).

2. Constraint Management:

Identify and incorporate constraints such as safety standards, weight

distribution, and accessibility into optimization solutions.

Design solutions to minimize risks (e.g., damage, inefficiencies) while

adhering to constraints.

3. Mathematical Modelling:

Use advanced mathematical techniques to design, test, and refine

optimization algorithms.

Analyse problem statements and propose efficient, scalable solutions.

4. Data-Driven Insights:

Analyse spatial data to identify optimization opportunities.

Generate meaningful insights from simulations and real-world tests.

5. Collaboration and Reporting:

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and deliver

optimised layouts and plans.

Prepare clear and concise reports or visualizations to communicate results

and methodologies to stakeholders.


Preferred candidate profile


Required:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, or a related field.
  • Strong understanding of optimization techniques such as heuristic algorithms,

Genetic Algorithms, or Reinforcement Algorithms.

  • Proficiency in mathematical tools Python.
  • Solid grasp of spatial reasoning and geometric principles.
  • Ability to solve complex problems using structured and logical approaches.

Preferred:

  • Basic knowledge of data science concepts such as data preprocessing, statistical

analysis., Machine Learning Algorithms, Deep-learning, Reinforcement Learning

  • Experience with tools like Pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn, or TensorFlow.
  • Familiarity with container packing, or related optimization scenarios.
  • Strong communication skills to articulate technical solutions to non-technical

stakeholders.


Perks and benefits


  • Competitive salary and benefits package.
  • Opportunities for professional growth and technical mentorship.
  • Flexibility in working arrangements and the chance to impact real-world AI solutions.
