jobDetail_html:
We are seeking a RPA developer to strengthen our technical team. The ideal candidate will have 2 to 5 years of experience in RPA development using Agile Methodology. Start-up experience is highly valued.


We believe in being hands-on with a mindset of continuous improvement and the ability to drive ahead with curiosity and collaboration. Our start-up environment provides great opportunities to work directly with the management team and to grow along with the company.


The roles and responsibilities of an RPA Developer includes designing, developing and implementing innovative RPA systems. RPA refers to an advanced automation technology which is designed to enhance business productivity and maximise efficiency. RPA is extremely versatile and has already begun transforming business models across industries around the globe, including in healthcare, banking and supply chain.


Role & Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, and implement RPA solutions using leading RPA tools (e.g., UiPath, Automation Anywhere, Blue Prism).
  • Analyze business processes to identify automation opportunities, and work with stakeholders to define project requirements.
  • Develop and maintain RPA workflows, bots, and automation scripts.
  • Troubleshoot and debug automation solutions to resolve issues and optimize performance.
  • Collaborate with business analysts and project managers to ensure automation solutions meet business needs and project deadlines.
  • Conduct unit and integration testing to ensure RPA solutions meet quality standards.
  • Provide ongoing support and maintenance for deployed RPA bots, including monitoring performance, error handling, and troubleshooting.
  • Ensure RPA solutions adhere to industry standards, best practices, and security guidelines.
  • Document RPA solutions, workflows, and processes for future reference and knowledge transfer.
  • Stay up-to-date with RPA trends, technologies, and industry best practices.

Required Skills & Qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Engineering, or a related field.
  • Proven experience as an RPA Developer, with hands-on experience using RPA tools like UiPath, Automation Anywhere, or Blue Prism.
  • Strong programming skills in languages such as C#, VB.NET, Python, or Java.
  • Experience with process automation, system integration, and enterprise systems.
  • Familiarity with data handling, SQL, APIs, and web services.
  • Ability to work with stakeholders to understand business requirements and translate them into effective automation solutions.
  • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills, with attention to detail.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work in a collaborative team environment.
  • Experience with version control tools (e.g., Git) and Agile development methodologies is a plus.
  • Knowledge of advanced RPA techniques like AI/ML integration, OCR, and cognitive automation is a plus.

Qualifications & Skills


RPA Developers are required to demonstrate a variety of both soft and hard skills. Some of the key abilities required for this role include:

  • B.E, B. Tech, ME, M.Tech in Computer Science or equivalent
  • Problem-solving skills
  • Excellent written and verbal communication
  • Understanding of workflow-based logic and RE Framework Mastery of Automation tools, such as UIPath and/or Blue Prism
  • Proficiency in programming languages, such as C, C++, Java, Python or .NET
  • Basic knowledge of Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI)
  • Experience with Databases, such as SQL and NoSQL.

Why Join Us:

  • Opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies in RPA and automation.
  • Collaborative, innovative, and supportive team environment.
  • Professional growth opportunities and career development.

About Company:


At TECH-INTELLEON Digital Solutions, we focused on delivering robust and scalable product solutions that are designed with rich user experience and deep technologies. 

We collaborate with global startups and businesses of all sizes to build, enhance, digitalize and scale products across all platforms, leveraging disruptive technologies in mobile, web, cloud, blockchain, AI, and analytics. 


To engage business globally, we embrace the digital revolution with our end-to-end scalable digital solutions. We build competitive strategies using deep technology to integrate digital elements that ultimately transform your business. 

We pride ourselves on developing and engaging an unconventional mix of talent that enables us to think differently, act differently and deliver differently. 

We are a team of young and well-experienced teams working together to break through the boundaries of technology. 


Of course, we offer you a great career, but were about more than that. TECH-INTELLEON is a place where you can craft your own path to greatness. Whether you think in pictures or words, 

Are you ready to make a difference with us? 


Find your future at TECH-INTELLEON.

www.techintelleon.com

jobDetail_html:
Job Overview

We are seeking a skilled and motivated Backend Developer with expertise in Node.js to join our development team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining server-side applications, ensuring performance and scalability, and collaborating with cross-functional teams.


Key Responsibilities

  • Develop and maintain server-side logic using Node.js and associated frameworks.
  • Build and integrate RESTful APIs and third-party services.
  • Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.
  • Work with databases like MongoDB, MySQL, or PostgreSQL to store and retrieve data
    efficiently.
  • Debug and troubleshoot issues in production and non-production environments.
  • Collaborate with front-end developers to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic.
  • Implement security and data protection measures.
  • Stay updated with emerging trends and technologies in backend development.

Requirements

  • Bachelors degree in Computer Science, IT, or a related field.
  • 2+ years of experience in backend development with a strong focus on Node.js.
  • Proficiency with database systems such as MongoDB, MySQL, or PostgreSQL.
  • Familiarity with version control tools like Git.
  • Experience with cloud services (AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud) is a plus.
  • Knowledge of microservices architecture is a plus.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Strong communication and teamwork abilities.

description: Codeswipers is a cutting-edge startup focused on transforming IT development and operations through specialized DevOps solutions. We help organizations build, scale, and enhance their DevOps teams to drive faster, more efficient, and reliable software development lifecycles.Key focus areas:DevOps Talent Acquisition: Identifying and onboarding skilled DevOps engineers and developers tailored to project needs.Team Building: Structuring DevOps teams to optimize collaboration between developers, QA, and IT operations.CI/CD Implementation: Setting up and managing continuous integration and deployment pipelines for faster and more reliable software delivery.Cloud Integration: Assisting in cloud infrastructure setup and management with platforms like AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud.Automation Expertise: Implementing automation tools for development, testing, and deployment processes to enhance efficiency.DevSecOps: Integrating security best practices into the development and operations workflow for secure software delivery.Monitoring and Optimization: Helping teams deploy monitoring solutions to improve system performance and uptime.At Codeswipers, we’re passionate about enabling IT teams to embrace DevOps principles and achieve their goals with cutting-edge tools, strategies, and practices.
about_html:
Codeswipers is a cutting-edge startup focused on transforming IT development and operations through specialized DevOps solutions. We help organizations build, scale, and enhance their DevOps teams to drive faster, more efficient, and reliable software development lifecycles.

Key focus areas:

DevOps Talent Acquisition: Identifying and onboarding skilled DevOps engineers and developers tailored to project needs.

Team Building: Structuring DevOps teams to optimize collaboration between developers, QA, and IT operations.

CI/CD Implementation: Setting up and managing continuous integration and deployment pipelines for faster and more reliable software delivery.

Cloud Integration: Assisting in cloud infrastructure setup and management with platforms like AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud.

Automation Expertise: Implementing automation tools for development, testing, and deployment processes to enhance efficiency.

DevSecOps: Integrating security best practices into the development and operations workflow for secure software delivery.

Monitoring and Optimization: Helping teams deploy monitoring solutions to improve system performance and uptime.


At Codeswipers, we’re passionate about enabling IT teams to embrace DevOps principles and achieve their goals with cutting-edge tools, strategies, and practices.
jobDetail_text: Responsibilities:Design and implement CI/CD pipelines.Automate infrastructure provisioning and management.Monitor and optimize system performance.Collaborate with development, QA, and operations teams.Ensure security and compliance in deployment processes.Manage cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, etc.).Maintain and develop process documentation.Utilize tools like Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, and Ansible.Troubleshoot deployment and performance issues.Support agile development methodologies and DevOps culture.
jobDetail_html:
Responsibilities:

  • Design and implement CI/CD pipelines.
  • Automate infrastructure provisioning and management.
  • Monitor and optimize system performance.
  • Collaborate with development, QA, and operations teams.
  • Ensure security and compliance in deployment processes.
  • Manage cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, etc.).
  • Maintain and develop process documentation.
  • Utilize tools like Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, and Ansible.

jobDetail_html:
Role & responsibilities


  • Design, develop, and optimize NLP models for applications like chatbots, virtual

assistants, and text analytics.

  • Develop and implement Generative AI models and algorithms using advanced

techniques such as GPT, Variational Autoencoders (VAE), and Generative

Adversarial Networks (GANs).

  • Conduct research to stay current with the latest advancements in Generative AI,

Machine Learning (ML), and Deep Learning (DL) and identify opportunities to

integrate them into our products and services.

  • Fine-tune and deploy pre-trained models (e.g., GPT, BERT, T5) for specific tasks.
  • Build and maintain data pipelines for preprocessing, feature extraction, and model

evaluation.

  • Develop clear and concise documentation, including technical specifications, user

guides, and presentations, to communicate complex AI concepts to both technical

and non-technical stakeholders.

  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design AI-driven solutions that meet

business objectives.

  • Contribute to the establishment of best practices and standards for generative AI

development within the organisation.

  • Provide technical mentorship and guidance to junior team members.
  • Ensure scalability and robustness of deployed models in production environments.

Preferred candidate profile

Technical Skills

  • Expertise in Machine Learning (ML), Deep Learning (DL), and Natural Language

Processing (NLP).

  • Proficiency in developing and implementing Generative AI techniques such as

RAGs, GPT, VAE, and GANs.

  • Strong programming skills in Python, with experience in frameworks like PyTorch or

TensorFlow.

  • Familiarity with NLP libraries (Hugging Face, SpaCy, NLTK) and GenAI tools.
  • Knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) and MLOps practices.
  • Experience with vector databases like FAISS or Pinecone.
  • Strong understanding of algorithms, data structures, and optimization techniques.

Soft Skills

  • Excellent research and analytical skills.
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills to explain complex AI concepts

effectively.

  • Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.

Educational Background

  • Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Data

Science, or a related field.


Preferred Qualifications

  • Hands-on experience with large-scale language models, fine-tuning, and prompt

engineering.

  • Familiarity with MLOps tools such as Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines.
  • Exposure to real-time NLP applications like voice assistants and TTS systems.
  • Proven track record of developing innovative AI solutions in production environments.

Perks and benefits


  • Be part of a team at the forefront of NLP and Generative AI innovation.
  • Competitive salary and benefits package.
  • Opportunities for professional growth and technical mentorship.
  • Flexibility in working arrangements and the chance to impact real-world AI solutions.

jobDetail_html:
Job Summary

We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Production Manager to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a solid background in production management, excellent organizational skills, and a passion for delivering high-quality products. In this role, you will oversee the production process, manage the production team, and ensure that our products meet the highest standards of quality and efficiency. You will also be responsible for implementing 5S in the organization. Your specific duties will include, but are not limited to the following:


Key Responsibilities

  • Overseeing the entire production process from planning to final output.
  • Coordinating with different departments to ensure seamless workflow and communication.
  • Managing and mentoring production staff, including hiring, training, and performance evaluations.
  • Developing and implementing production schedules and ensuring that deadlines are met.
  • Monitoring production costs and implementing cost-saving measures where possible.
  • Ensuring that all production activities comply with safety and quality standards.
  • Identifying and troubleshooting production issues and implementing effective solutions.
  • Maintaining accurate production records and preparing regular reports for senior management.
  • Collaborating with the R&D department to improve production processes and product quality.

Qualifications

  • Relevant education in production management
  • Minimum of 8 years of experience in Production Management in the manufacturing industry, preferably within label stock manufacturing.
  • Strong leadership and team management skills.
  • Strong understanding of the 5S methodology.
  • Excellent problem-solving and decision-making abilities.
  • Proficient in production management software and tools.
  • Strong understanding of safety and quality standards in production.
  • Excellent organizational and time management skills.
  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills.

Benefits

  • Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses.
  • Paid time off, holidays and other incentives.
  • Supportive and inclusive work environment.

We look forward to receiving your application and exploring the possibility of you joining our team.

jobDetail_html:
About Us

At Tequity, we specialize in end-to-end product development, delivering insightful research, user-centric design, and scalable engineering solutions. Our dedicated team of product managers, designers, and engineers work collaboratively to ensure your business achieves its goals.

Job Description

Mission

Lead the quality assurance efforts to deliver outstanding software products, improve testing processes, and ensure robust, high-quality releases. Over the next 6 months, focus on implementing efficient QA strategies, integrating automation, and supporting the development of a high-performance QA team.

Key Outcomes

  1. Product Quality and Reliability
    • Achieve a 90% defect reduction rate in major project releases over the next 6 months.
    • Implement robust QA processes and testing standards to ensure product reliability, meeting all project quality benchmarks and exceeding client expectations.

2. Team Development and Scaling

    • Identify, recruit, and onboard 2-3 junior QA engineers within the next 6 months.
    • Develop a comprehensive training and mentorship program that enables junior QA engineers to become fully productive within 3 months.
    • Foster a high-performance team culture that values continuous improvement and professional growth.

3. Automation and Process Optimization

    • Increase automated test coverage to 80% across core applications, reducing manual testing efforts by 60%.
    • Streamline the QA process by integrating CI/CD pipelines, automated regression suites, and efficient bug-tracking tools.
    • Collaborate with the engineering team to integrate Large Language Models (LLMs) for QA automation, aiming to improve productivity per engineer by 20% within 6 months.

Responsibilities

  • Review Requirements and Specifications
    Analyze requirements, specifications, and technical design documents to provide timely and insightful feedback to developers and product managers.
  • Create and Manage Test Plans
    Develop detailed, comprehensive, and well-structured test plans and test cases that align with project requirements and ensure thorough testing.
  • Automation Development
    Design, develop, and execute automation scripts using open-source tools, aiming to increase testing efficiency and coverage.
  • Bug Tracking and Resolution
    Identify, record, and thoroughly document bugs, collaborating with developers to address and resolve issues. Perform thorough regression testing to confirm successful bug fixes.
  • Collaboration with Internal Teams
    Work closely with development teams, product managers, and other stakeholders to align on system requirements and enhance product quality.
  • Monitor and Analyze Quality Metrics
    Track and monitor quality assurance metrics, including defect densities, open defect counts, and testing coverage, to continually improve the QA process.
  • Continuous Improvement and Innovation
    Stay updated on new testing tools, strategies, and technologies, implementing them to improve QA practices and drive productivity.

Key Competencies

  • Technical QA Expertise
    In-depth knowledge of QA methodologies, tools, and best practices, with practical experience in white-box and black-box testing. Proficient in automation tools and frameworks, as well as SQL and scripting.
  • Process Improvement and Innovation
    Proven track record in implementing QA strategies that enhance testing efficiency and defect prevention. Experience with CI/CD integration, automated testing, and tools for streamlined QA workflows.
  • Mentorship and Team Development
    Demonstrated ability to identify and mentor junior QA engineers, fostering a collaborative and high-performance team environment.
  • Communication and Collaboration
    Excellent communication skills with the ability to convey complex information clearly and collaborate effectively across teams.
  • Problem-Solving and Analytical Skills
    Strong troubleshooting abilities with a proactive approach to identifying and resolving complex issues

Requirements

  • Education
    Bachelors degree in Computer Science or a related field, or equivalent experience.
  • Experience
    • Minimum of 3 years in QA engineering with a proven record of improving product quality.
    • Practical experience in Agile/Scrum environments.
    • Demonstrated ability in leading or mentoring junior team members.
  • Technical Skills
    • Proficiency in test automation frameworks and tools, including Selenium and Appium.
    • Strong SQL and scripting skills.
    • Familiarity with CI/CD and testing tools.
    • Knowledge of Large Language Models (LLMs) is a plus.

Benefits

  • Competitive salary and benefits.
  • Opportunities for professional growth and development.
  • A dynamic and inclusive work environment.

about_html:
About Sragvin Data Technologies LLP

Sragvin Data Technologies LLP is a forward-thinking technology company dedicated to delivering innovative and scalable solutions to meet the evolving needs of businesses in todays digital age. Founded with a commitment to excellence and a customer-centric approach, we specialize in harnessing the power of cutting-edge technologies to drive transformation, efficiency, and growth.

Our Mission

At Sragvin Data Technologies, our mission is to empower organizations by providing comprehensive, reliable, and cost-effective technology solutions that enhance business performance and foster innovation.

Our Services

We offer a wide range of IT and data-driven solutions tailored to suit diverse industry requirements, including:

  • Software Development: Custom application development to meet specific business goals.
  • Data Analytics: Turning data into actionable insights for better decision-making.
  • Cloud Solutions: Scalable cloud architecture and migration services for seamless operations.
  • DevOps Services: Streamlining development and operational workflows for faster delivery.
  • IT Consulting: Strategic IT advisory to optimize your technology investments.

Why Choose Us?

  • Expertise: A team of skilled professionals with experience across multiple domains and technologies.
  • Innovation: Leveraging modern tools and frameworks to deliver future-ready solutions.
  • Customer Focus: Tailored solutions designed to address the unique needs of each client.
  • Quality Assurance: Ensuring robust, secure, and high-performance deliverables.

Our Vision

We aim to be a trusted technology partner for businesses worldwide, driving digital transformation and fostering growth through innovative solutions and exceptional service.

Contact Us

For more information about our services or to discuss how we can help your business, please visit www.sragvindatatechnology.com or reach out to us at hr@sragvindatatechnology.com.

jobDetail_text: Job Description: Electronics & Instrumentation EngineerJob Title: Electronics & Instrumentation EngineerLocation: Pune, IndiaExperience: For B.Tech ( 2-3 Years), For M.Tech and PhD: 1-2 Years Required Qualifications:B.Tech/M.Tech/PhD in Electronics & Instrumentation EngineeringHands-on experience with hardware development and integrationDemonstrated involvement in relevant projectsRole and Responsibilities:Identify electronic hardware based on project requirements and specifications, ensuring compatibility and performance.Identify and contact vendors to obtain quotes for required components and hardware.Integrate and develop hardware systems tailored to project needs, ensuring seamless functionality.Design and develop custom electronic systems involving Sensors, Analog to Digital Converters, and onboard computers based on platforms such as Raspberry Pi and LattePanda.Assist in projects involving Servo Motors and its control.Document and maintain detailed records of designs, processes, and vendor communications for future reference and compliance.Technical Skills:Proficiency in electronic hardware design and development.Knowledge of servo motor and controlsExperience with data acquisition systems and interfacing.Knowledge of relevant design software (e.g., MATLAB, LabVIEW).Soft Skills:Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.Excellent communication and teamwork skills.Attention to detail and a proactive approach to challenges.Career Development Opportunities:Guardinger Advanced Technologies values professional growth and offers opportunities for skill enhancement, mentorship, and career advancement within the organization.
jobDetail_html:
Job Description: Electronics & Instrumentation Engineer

Job Title: Electronics & Instrumentation Engineer

Location: Pune, India

Experience: For B.Tech ( 2-3 Years), For M.Tech and PhD: 1-2 Years

Required Qualifications:

  • B.Tech/M.Tech/PhD in Electronics & Instrumentation Engineering
  • Hands-on experience with hardware development and integration
  • Demonstrated involvement in relevant projects

Role and Responsibilities:

  • Identify electronic hardware based on project requirements and specifications, ensuring compatibility and performance.
  • Identify and contact vendors to obtain quotes for required components and hardware.
  • Integrate and develop hardware systems tailored to project needs, ensuring seamless functionality.
  • Design and develop custom electronic systems involving Sensors, Analog to Digital Converters, and onboard computers based on platforms such as Raspberry Pi and LattePanda.
  • Assist in projects involving Servo Motors and its control.
  • Document and maintain detailed records of designs, processes, and vendor communications for future reference and compliance.

Technical Skills:

  • Proficiency in electronic hardware design and development.
  • Knowledge of servo motor and controls
  • Experience with data acquisition systems and interfacing.
  • Knowledge of relevant design software (e.g., MATLAB, LabVIEW).

Soft Skills:

  • Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
  • Excellent communication and teamwork skills.
  • Attention to detail and a proactive approach to challenges.

Career Development Opportunities:
Guardinger Advanced Technologies values professional growth and offers opportunities for skill enhancement, mentorship, and career advancement within the organization.
qualification: B.Tech/B.E. in Instrumentation, M.Tech in Instrumentation, Ph.D in Instrumentation
qualification_html: B.Tech/B.E. in Instrumentation, M.Tech in Instrumentation, Ph.D in Instrumentation

jobDetail_html:
Job Title: Design Engineer - Plastic Interiors Trims

Location: Pune, Maharashtra (India)

Experience: 4 to 6 years

Notice Period: 0 to 30 days (Immediate joiners preferred)

Salary: 5 to 7 Lakhs per annum

Benefits: Canteen facility available

Job Description:

We are looking for a skilled Design Engineer with expertise in Automotive Interior Plastics, specifically in areas such as Instrument Panels, Door Panels, and Center Consoles. The ideal candidate should have a solid understanding of plastic part design, tooling, and assembly processes.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Design and develop plastic parts for automotive interiors (e.g., instrument panels, door panels, and centre consoles).
  • Proficient in plastic part design and tooling, with the ability to assess tooling feasibility, including tool direction, parting lines, and slider/lifter construction.
  • Knowledge of assembly processes such as welding, metal clipping, and snap-fit designs.
  • Familiarity with RPS/Part Location system requirements.
  • Proficient in CATIA V5 (Surface Design, Part Design, Assembly, etc.).
  • Ability to troubleshoot CAD-related issues and resolve technical challenges.
  • Capable of evaluating assembly and packaging constraints involving adjacent parts.
  • Strong understanding of section views, sketches, conceptual design, and master sections.
  • Ensure adherence to customer-specific CAD methodology and requirements.
  • Participation in design review meetings and provide solutions.
  • Knowledge in benchmarking.
  • Working knowledge of design documents such as DFMEA, DVP, Reliability Matrix, etc.
  • Target setting for parts strength, gap-flush, weight, BSR, and regulatory requirements.
  • Exposure to interface checks, DMU, manufacturing, and service requirements.
  • Understanding of GD&T (Geometric Dimensioning and Tolerancing).
  • Ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously.
  • Knowledge in MS-Office tools.

Qualifications & Skills:

Bachelor of Engineering - Mechanical/Automobile/Production.

Minimum 4 years of experience in automotive plastic part design.

Strong knowledge of plastic design and tooling.

Experience with assembly processes (welding, clippings, snap-fit).

Expertise in CATIA and CAD problem-solving.

Strong communication and problem-solving skills.

Ability to manage customer requirements effectively.

Application Instructions:

If you are interested in applying for this position, please include the following details in your application:

Full Name:

Total Experience:

Relevant Experience:

Contact Number:

Expected Take-home Salary per Year:

Current Employment Status (Currently Working/Not Working/Serving Notice Period):

Current Company:

Employment Type (Permanent/Contract):

If Contract, please specify your primary company details:

Required Time to Join:

Current Location:

Offers Status (Please indicate if you hold any other offers):

To Apply:

Send your updated CV to tapan.spintatech@gmail.com with the subject line: "CV_YOUR NAME_DESIGN_PUNE".

Note- Freshers please do not apply
qualification: B.Des. in Any Specialization, B.Tech/B.E. in Plastics, Automobile, Production/Industrial, Mechanical

jobDetail_html:
That's basic is hiring a dedicated and detail-oriented Order Fulfillment and Inventory Manager to join our team in Secunderabad, Hyderabad. This full-time, offline role is crucial to our operations, ensuring seamless order management, packaging, reporting, and content creation. If youre passionate about operational excellence and have a knack for logistics and creativity, we want you on board!

Website: That's basic - Jewelry brand

Job Title: Order Fulfillment and Inventory Manager
Location: Secunderabad, Hyderabad
Job Type: Full-Time Work type: Offline

Timings: You have the flexibility to choose your working hoursyou can work from 8AM - 4PM, 9AM - 5PM or 10AM -6PM

Key Responsibilities:

1. Order Processing & Fulfillment:
- Manage the end-to-end order fulfillment process, from receiving orders to packaging and shipping.
- Ensure timely and accurate delivery coordination to meet customer satisfaction.

2. Inventory Management:
- Monitor stock levels and organize storage areas to maintain optimal inventory conditions.
- Update inventory records regularly and report stock availability to avoid shortages or overstocking.

3. Order Booking & Delivery Coordination:
- Schedule and confirm deliveries, ensuring efficient logistics management.
- Handle booking details and coordinate with delivery teams to ensure accurate and timely shipments.

4. E-commerce Product Management:
- Add new products to the e-commerce portal with accurate descriptions, pricing, and high-quality images.
- Ensure the product listing is up-to-date and engaging for customers.

5. Social Media Content Creation:
- Support the marketing team by creating compelling social media content that highlights products and drives engagement.
- Capture creative visuals and draft posts to showcase the brands offerings.

6. Reporting & Documentation:
- Maintain clear, organized records for orders, inventory levels, and deliveries.
- Prepare detailed reports for management to track operational performance.

Qualifications & Skills:

  • Experience: No prior experience is required as we provide in-depth training to help you succeed in this role.
  • Skills: Strong organizational and multitasking abilities are essential. A creative flair for social media content is a bonus but not mandatory.
  • Mindset: We are looking for hardworking, disciplined, and proactive candidates with a growth-oriented attitude.

Cultural Fit:
At That's basic we value individuals who are:
- Hardworking and disciplined, with a proactive approach to their responsibilities.
- Committed to excellence and detail-oriented in their work.
- Team players with a positive attitude and strong communication skills.
- Open to learning, adaptable to new challenges, and driven by a growth mindset.

If youre ready to contribute to our teams success and grow with us, apply today

jobDetail_html:
Roles and Responsibilities

  • Manage air ticketing operations, ensuring efficient processing of bookings, cancellations, and amendments.
  • Coordinate with airlines to resolve passenger queries and issues related to flight schedules, baggage, and other services.
  • Handle emergency situations effectively by providing timely assistance to customers during crises or delays.
  • Supervise ground staff at the airport terminals, ensuring smooth operation of check-in counters, gates, and boarding processes.
  • Maintain accurate records of transactions, tickets sales data analysis reports.

Preferred candidate profile

  • 0-1 year of experience in aviation industry or related field (freshers welcome).
  • Excellent communication skills with ability to handle diverse passenger groups effectively.
  • Strong attention to detail with excellent problem-solving abilities.
  • Basic computer literacy with proficiency in MS Office applications.
  • Ability to work well under pressure, multitasking multiple tasks simultaneously.


Perks and benefits

  • Attractive salary along with performance-based incentives.
  • Discounted or free flight tickets for staff and their families.
  • Comprehensive health coverage, including medical and dental benefits.
  • Access to provident funds and pension schemes.
  • Opportunities for training and professional development.
  • Shift flexibility to balance personal and professional life.
  • Provision of uniforms and necessary equipment.
  • Discounts on various services and products.
  • Sense of job security due to continuous demand for air travel.
  • Fast-paced, vibrant work setting with diverse interactions.

jobDetail_html:
Roles and Responsibilities

Call 9988350971 01725000971 7508062612 9988353971

Customer Sales and Service representatives provide front line sales and service to customers via inbound telephone calls. These agents are responsible for maintaining high standards of performance, sales, and service levels.

Essential Duties and Responsibilities:

- Ability to handle inbound customer sales and service telephone calls.

- Ability to work in a fast-paced, multi-skill work environment.

- Ability to process continual workload for extended periods in assigned area.

- Ability to provide a consistently high level of quality customer service.

- Ability to process customer sales orders.

- Ability to maximize sales opportunities by offering customer upsells

- Timeliness and ability to adhere to assigned schedule segments.

- Ability to meet and sustain minimum performance, attendance, and behavioral standards.

- Ability to navigate, lookup, and enter orders into the customer order entry system (via computer).

- Ability to remain current with new customer sales and service procedures.

- Ability to work flexible hours / overtime as required (including weekends).

- Ability to perform other duties such as outbound telephone, inbound email and white-mail services (when/if assigned).

- Respond to customer inquires through inbound eMail contact from current and prospective customers.

Knowledge, Skills and Abilities:

- Graduate or Non-Graduate with very good english speaking skills

- Minimum of 25 words per minute typing speed

- Oral Communication Skills Rate and clarity of speech, tone and inflection and grammar

- Written Communications Spelling Skills, grammar and legible handwriting

- PC Skills Prior experience with computers and/or data entry

- Composure Ability to work in high paced environment and competently service customers

- Adaptability Ability to handle change in routine or work rules and available to accommodate flexible work hours

- Customer Focus Oriented to serving the customer

- Ability to work independently as well as being a team player

- Multi-task oriented

- Sales Skills Prior experience preferred

- Problem Solving Skills

- Positive attitude



Desired Candidate Profile

Hindi, Punjabi and English Domestic and International call Center



Perks and Benefits

Hurry Voice - Non Voice Call Center Jobs, salary 15k.35k,No Fees Chandigarh Mohali

jobDetail_html:
Roles and Responsibilities


Dear Candidate,


We have an excellent opportunity for Job Sourcing Specialist / Data Entry Specialist, if interested please apply. Your responsibilities are


  • Search and enter data provided to you
  • Attend team meetings
  • Manage multiple customers at a time
  • Communicate clearly to the management team, customer support and backend team.


FRESHERS are Welcome!!!


Candidates from Tamil medium back ground are welcome as well. English is just a language, we will train you.


Desired Candidate Profile

  • You will have a functional laptop or PC.
  • You are passionate to work for American & Canadian clients.
  • You will have knowledge about job boards like Indeed, LinkedIn, Glassdoor, etc.. .
  • You graduated from a college or in the final year of your college.
  • You must be from Tamil Nadu.
  • Must know to read and write Tamil
  • Must be humble and easy to work with.
  • Basic Computer Knowledge
  • You are a team player.
  • Basic Typing speed.
  • We encourage candidates from Tamil medium schooling.

Training:

  • Selected candidates must attend 45 - 60 days training.


Job Benefits & Perks


  • Completely work from home work culture.
  • Starting salary - In hand Salary of 15k per month after tax + Incentives.
  • Salary hike every year.
  • Monthly incentives up to 3k based on performance.
  • Annual Bonus based on performance. You must complete one year at Jack Meow to be eligible for this bonus.
  • Holiday for all festivals and national holiday.
  • 12 days paid time off (PTO)
  • Every Sunday and Monday is a company holiday

Schedule:

  • Tuesday - Saturday
  • 9:00 A.M - 5:00 P.M

We value our employees as a family. If you are looking for a short term employment please DO NOT apply.

jobDetail_text: Roles and Responsibilities:Manage air ticketing operations, including both domestic and international ticketing processes.Address customer inquiries, resolve concerns, and deliver outstanding customer service.Process flight bookings, cancellations, and modifications efficiently using the Amadeus system.Ensure the accurate processing of passenger check-ins, baggage handling, and smooth boarding procedures.Stay updated on industry trends, regulations, and aviation policies to maintain high standards.Desired Candidate Profile:0-1 years of experience in air hostess or ground staff activities preferred, though not mandatory.Strong understanding of IATA standards for international ticketing, including BSP & EMD.Proficiency in cabin crew activities such as passenger handling and reservation systems.Excellent communication skills with the ability to perform effectively under pressure.Perks and Benefits:Salary and Incentives: Competitive base salary with performance-driven incentives and bonuses.Travel Benefits: Enjoy free or discounted air tickets for yourself and your family, depending on the airline or agency.Health Insurance: Medical coverage for yourself and, in some cases, for your family.Provident Fund (PF): Contribution to the Employees' Provident Fund (EPF) for your future savings.Work-Life Balance: Flexibility in working hours or shift-based schedules, depending on the role.Career Growth: Ample opportunities for career advancement within the travel and aviation industry.Employee Discounts: Exclusive discounts on travel, hotel bookings, and holiday packages.Recognition and Awards: Acknowledgment for outstanding performance with Employee of the Month/Year awards and recognition programs.For more information, feel free to contact:HR Kashif: 7003969943HR Jayee: 6291000563
jobDetail_html:
Roles and Responsibilities:

  • Manage air ticketing operations, including both domestic and international ticketing processes.
  • Address customer inquiries, resolve concerns, and deliver outstanding customer service.
  • Process flight bookings, cancellations, and modifications efficiently using the Amadeus system.
  • Ensure the accurate processing of passenger check-ins, baggage handling, and smooth boarding procedures.
  • Stay updated on industry trends, regulations, and aviation policies to maintain high standards.

Desired Candidate Profile:

  • 0-1 years of experience in air hostess or ground staff activities preferred, though not mandatory.
  • Strong understanding of IATA standards for international ticketing, including BSP & EMD.
  • Proficiency in cabin crew activities such as passenger handling and reservation systems.
  • Excellent communication skills with the ability to perform effectively under pressure.

Perks and Benefits:

  • Salary and Incentives: Competitive base salary with performance-driven incentives and bonuses.
  • Travel Benefits: Enjoy free or discounted air tickets for yourself and your family, depending on the airline or agency.
  • Health Insurance: Medical coverage for yourself and, in some cases, for your family.
  • Provident Fund (PF): Contribution to the Employees' Provident Fund (EPF) for your future savings.
  • Work-Life Balance: Flexibility in working hours or shift-based schedules, depending on the role.
  • Career Growth: Ample opportunities for career advancement within the travel and aviation industry.
  • Employee Discounts: Exclusive discounts on travel, hotel bookings, and holiday packages.
  • Recognition and Awards: Acknowledgment for outstanding performance with Employee of the Month/Year awards and recognition programs.

For more information, feel free to contact:

  • HR Kashif: 7003969943
  • HR Jayee: 6291000563

jobDetail_text: Job Title: Data Scientist InternJob Type: Internship (Remote)Duration: 3 monthsOpenings: 5 positionsCompensation: Performance-based payLocation: RemoteCertificate: Internship completion certificate providedOpportunity for Full-time Position: High potential for permanent job offer upon successful completionJob Description:We are looking for highly motivated and passionate Data Scientist Interns to join our dynamic team for a 3-month remote internship. As a Data Scientist Intern, you will have the opportunity to work on real-world data problems, develop data-driven models, and contribute to various ongoing projects. You will gain hands-on experience with advanced analytics techniques, machine learning, and data visualization, while working remotely with a collaborative team of professionals.Responsibilities:Assist in collecting, cleaning, and preprocessing large datasets for analysis.Develop and implement machine learning models and algorithms to derive insights from complex data sets.Conduct exploratory data analysis (EDA) to identify trends and patterns.Use statistical methods to interpret data and generate actionable insights.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and solve data-related business problems.Present findings, insights, and recommendations to stakeholders.Continuously improve data science models and pipelines.Requirements:Currently enrolled in a Bachelors or Master’s degree program in Data Science, Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or a related field.Basic knowledge of programming languages such as Python or R.Familiarity with machine learning algorithms and libraries (e.g., scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch).Strong understanding of data analysis techniques and statistical methods.Ability to work independently and manage time effectively in a remote work environment.Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.Good communication skills to present complex data insights clearly and concisely.A passion for learning and growing in the field of data science.Compensation and Benefits:Performance-based pay: Compensation will be based on the candidate’s performance and contributions during the internship.Internship certificate: Upon successful completion of the internship, candidates will receive a formal internship certificate.Permanent job opportunity: Based on performance, top candidates will have the chance to transition into a full-time, permanent role after the internship period.
jobDetail_html:
Job Title: Data Scientist Intern

Job Type: Internship (Remote)
Duration: 3 months
Openings: 5 positions
Compensation: Performance-based pay
Location: Remote
Certificate: Internship completion certificate provided
Opportunity for Full-time Position: High potential for permanent job offer upon successful completion

Job Description:

We are looking for highly motivated and passionate Data Scientist Interns to join our dynamic team for a 3-month remote internship. As a Data Scientist Intern, you will have the opportunity to work on real-world data problems, develop data-driven models, and contribute to various ongoing projects. You will gain hands-on experience with advanced analytics techniques, machine learning, and data visualization, while working remotely with a collaborative team of professionals.

Responsibilities:

  • Assist in collecting, cleaning, and preprocessing large datasets for analysis.
  • Develop and implement machine learning models and algorithms to derive insights from complex data sets.
  • Conduct exploratory data analysis (EDA) to identify trends and patterns.
  • Use statistical methods to interpret data and generate actionable insights.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and solve data-related business problems.
  • Present findings, insights, and recommendations to stakeholders.
  • Continuously improve data science models and pipelines.

Requirements:

  • Currently enrolled in a Bachelors or Master’s degree program in Data Science, Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or a related field.
  • Basic knowledge of programming languages such as Python or R.
  • Familiarity with machine learning algorithms and libraries (e.g., scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch).
  • Strong understanding of data analysis techniques and statistical methods.
  • Ability to work independently and manage time effectively in a remote work environment.
  • Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
  • Good communication skills to present complex data insights clearly and concisely.
  • A passion for learning and growing in the field of data science.

Compensation and Benefits:

  • Performance-based pay: Compensation will be based on the candidate’s performance and contributions during the internship.
  • Internship certificate: Upon successful completion of the internship, candidates will receive a formal internship certificate.
  • Permanent job opportunity: Based on performance, top candidates will have the chance to transition into a full-time, permanent role after the internship period.

about_html: We are a dynamic and fast-growing company looking for a proactive and creative individual to join our team.
jobDetail_text: Role & responsibilities Social Media Campaigns:Design and execute paid campaigns on platforms like Facebook, Instagram, and others to drive app downloads.Monitor campaign performance and optimize for the best results.Content Creation:Develop engaging video and graphic content to promote the app across social media channels.Collaborate with the team to ensure alignment with the brands tone and goals.Social Media Management:Maintain social media platforms by regularly posting engaging and high-quality content.Respond to comments and messages to foster a strong community and increase user engagement.Monitor trends and adapt content strategies to stay relevant and appealing to the target audience.Performance Reporting:Generate weekly progress reports detailing campaign performance and content effectiveness.Present insights and recommendations to the management team.Creative Ideation:Brainstorm innovative strategies and campaigns to boost app downloads and user engagement.Stay updated with digital marketing trends and leverage them to enhance marketing efforts.Preferred candidate profile 1-2 years of experience in digital marketing and content creation.Hands-on experience with social media advertising platforms like Facebook Ads Manager and Instagram Ads.Proficiency in video editing tools and graphic design software (e.g., Adobe Photoshop, Canva).Strong analytical skills to interpret data and generate actionable insights.Exceptional creativity and the ability to ideate unique and compelling marketing campaigns.Demonstrated experience in managing and growing social media platforms.
jobDetail_html:
Role & responsibilities


  • Social Media Campaigns:
  • Design and execute paid campaigns on platforms like Facebook, Instagram, and others to drive app downloads.
  • Monitor campaign performance and optimize for the best results.

  • Content Creation:
  • Develop engaging video and graphic content to promote the app across social media channels.
  • Collaborate with the team to ensure alignment with the brands tone and goals.

  • Social Media Management:
  • Maintain social media platforms by regularly posting engaging and high-quality content.
  • Respond to comments and messages to foster a strong community and increase user engagement.
  • Monitor trends and adapt content strategies to stay relevant and appealing to the target audience.

  • Performance Reporting:
  • Generate weekly progress reports detailing campaign performance and content effectiveness.
  • Present insights and recommendations to the management team.

  • Creative Ideation:
  • Brainstorm innovative strategies and campaigns to boost app downloads and user engagement.
  • Stay updated with digital marketing trends and leverage them to enhance marketing efforts.

Preferred candidate profile


  • 1-2 years of experience in digital marketing and content creation.
  • Hands-on experience with social media advertising platforms like Facebook Ads Manager and Instagram Ads.
  • Proficiency in video editing tools and graphic design software (e.g., Adobe Photoshop, Canva).
  • Strong analytical skills to interpret data and generate actionable insights.
  • Exceptional creativity and the ability to ideate unique and compelling marketing campaigns.
  • Demonstrated experience in managing and growing social media platforms.

jobDetail_text: Role Overview:We are looking for a dedicated Warehouse & Operations Executive to ensure the smooth running of our warehouseand operations. The ideal candidate will have at least 1 year of experience in operations or warehouse management,strong problem-solving abilities, and a passion for creating exceptional customer experiences. Freshers with acommitment to hard work and long-term growth are welcome to apply.Key Responsibilities: Order Management: Oversee daily orders from the website, third-party platforms, and B2B clients, ensuringtimely delivery. Order Processing: Generate shipping documents such as dockets, e-way bills, and delivery challans forvarious courier partners. Quality Control (QC) & Stock Management: Manage quality checks and oversee the inward supply ofgoods. Inventory Management: Supervise inventory levels, conduct regular stock checks, and implement measuresto minimize discrepancies or shortages. Operational Efficiency: Optimize warehouse layout and workflow for maximum efficiency. Issue Resolution: Collaborate with the customer care team to address inquiries and resolve delivery issueswith courier partners. Vendor Management: Coordinate with vendors for production updates and ensure timely inward deliveries. Reporting: Prepare regular reports on warehouse performance, inventory status, and key operational metrics.Qualifications: Graduate (any stream). Basic knowledge of logistics, inventory control, and warehouse operations best practices. Strong problem-solving and teamwork skills. Excellent communication skills. Freshers are welcome to apply if they are eager to learn and commit to the role for the long term.
jobDetail_html:
Role Overview:

We are looking for a dedicated Warehouse & Operations Executive to ensure the smooth running of our warehouse

and operations. The ideal candidate will have at least 1 year of experience in operations or warehouse management,

strong problem-solving abilities, and a passion for creating exceptional customer experiences. Freshers with a

commitment to hard work and long-term growth are welcome to apply.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Order Management: Oversee daily orders from the website, third-party platforms, and B2B clients, ensuring

timely delivery.

  • Order Processing: Generate shipping documents such as dockets, e-way bills, and delivery challans for

various courier partners.

  • Quality Control (QC) & Stock Management: Manage quality checks and oversee the inward supply of

goods.

  • Inventory Management: Supervise inventory levels, conduct regular stock checks, and implement measures

to minimize discrepancies or shortages.

  • Operational Efficiency: Optimize warehouse layout and workflow for maximum efficiency.
  • Issue Resolution: Collaborate with the customer care team to address inquiries and resolve delivery issues

with courier partners.

  • Vendor Management: Coordinate with vendors for production updates and ensure timely inward deliveries.
  • Reporting: Prepare regular reports on warehouse performance, inventory status, and key operational metrics.

Qualifications:

  • Graduate (any stream).
  • Basic knowledge of logistics, inventory control, and warehouse operations best practices.
  • Strong problem-solving and teamwork skills.
  • Excellent communication skills.
  • Freshers are welcome to apply if they are eager to learn and commit to the role for the long term.

jobDetail_html:
Job Description: Python Developer (3-5 Years of Experience)


Position Title: Python Developer

Experience Level: 3-5 Years

Employment Type: Full-Time


Job Summary:

We are looking for a skilled Python Developer with 3-5 years of experience to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate should be proficient in Python programming, SQL and possess strong analytical and problem-solving skills. You will be responsible for developing, optimizing, and maintaining high-quality applications and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative solutions.


Key Responsibilities:


Design, develop, and maintain scalable Python applications.


Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders to analyze user requirements and define technical solutions.


Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code following best practices and coding standards.


Implement software testing and debugging for new and existing applications.



Required Skills:


3-5 years of proven experience as a Python Developer.


Understanding of any Python frameworks such as Django or Flask etc.



Educational Requirements:


Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience)

jobDetail_html:
• Career Level Manager
  • Experience 2 Years
  • Gender Male
  • Qualifications Degree Bachelor

Job Description

We are seeking an experienced Area Sales Manager to lead and oversee sales activities within a designated area. The ideal candidate will drive revenue growth, establish strong relationships with clients, and manage a team of sales representatives. This role requires a highly motivated individual with a deep understanding of sales principles and a proven track record of achieving targets.

Key Responsibilities
  • Develop and Implement Sales Strategies: Identify business growth opportunities and implement strategies to drive revenue and market share within the assigned area.
  • Team Management: Recruit, train, mentor, and supervise sales representatives, ensuring they meet individual and team targets.
  • Achieve Sales Targets: Meet or exceed monthly, quarterly, and annual sales goals by managing the sales pipeline and forecasting accurately.
  • Build and Maintain Client Relationships: Develop and maintain strong relationships with key clients, addressing their needs and ensuring a high level of satisfaction.
  • Market Analysis: Analyze market trends and customer needs, reporting insights to management and adjusting strategies accordingly.
  • Monitor Sales Performance: Track individual and team performance metrics, providing coaching and feedback to improve productivity.
  • Coordinate with Internal Teams: Work closely with marketing, product, and customer service teams to ensure alignment and drive customer satisfaction.
  • Compliance and Reporting: Ensure all sales activities comply with company policies and industry regulations, and prepare regular sales reports for management.
Qualifications
  • Education: Bachelors degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field. MBA or relevant certification is a plus.
  • Experience: Minimum of 2-3 years of experience in sales, with at least 1-2 years in a managerial role.
  • Skills:
    • Strong leadership and people management skills
    • Proven track record of achieving sales targets
    • Excellent communication and negotiation abilities
    • Analytical mindset with proficiency in sales and CRM software
    • Ability to work independently and as part of a team
qualification: Any Graduate in Any Specialization, B.B.A / B.M.S in Any Specialization, MBA/PGDM in Any Specialization, Any Postgraduate in Any Specialization

jobDetail_text: Job description 1.   Preparation, Compilation and Review of dossiers in CTD/country specific format for CIS/ASIA/MENA /LATAM / Any other  Regions.2.   Co-ordinating with cross functional departments like API, R&D, QC, QA, PDD, Micro for documents required for dossier compilation for initial submission, query responses or other submission like tender activities.3.   Manufacturing Site GMP Inspection supports with Customers & Cross Functional Departments.4.   Communicating with agents/partners for submission of Dossiers and further updates or requirements if any on product registration.5.   Participating in calls with agents/partners for submission of Dossiers and further updates or requirements if any on product registration.6.   Responding to queries with in the time lines received from client/agency.7.   Preparation of check list as per country specific requirements.8.   Review of documents like Specifications/MFC/BMR/PV/Stability/PDR/DMF/CoA’s/Artworks and other quality related documents for their suitability for registration.9.   Co-ordinating for CoPP, GMP, License and other required documents/certificates legalization activity required for dossier compilation and registration.10. Archiving/Maintenance of the dossiers, renewal files and variation approvals along with supporting documents in regulatory data base.11. Identifying gaps in approved dossier compiled and submit the post approval changes (Minor variations) to agent/agency.12. Filing of variations if any and registration renewals.13. Compilation and circulation of product approval package up on receipt of product approval/Minor variation approvals to concern departments.14. Maintaining the product status (Registered and under registration) in excel sheet.
jobDetail_html:
• Job description
  • 1.   Preparation, Compilation and Review of dossiers in CTD/country specific format for CIS/ASIA/MENA /LATAM / Any other Regions.
  • 2.   Co-ordinating with cross functional departments like API, R&D, QC, QA, PDD, Micro for documents required for dossier compilation for initial submission, query responses or other submission like tender activities.
  • 3.   Manufacturing Site GMP Inspection supports with Customers & Cross Functional Departments.
  • 4.   Communicating with agents/partners for submission of Dossiers and further updates or requirements if any on product registration.
  • 5.   Participating in calls with agents/partners for submission of Dossiers and further updates or requirements if any on product registration.
  • 6.   Responding to queries with in the time lines received from client/agency.
  • 7.   Preparation of check list as per country specific requirements.
  • 8.   Review of documents like Specifications/MFC/BMR/PV/Stability/PDR/DMF/CoA’s/Artworks and other quality related documents for their suitability for registration.
  • 9.   Co-ordinating for CoPP, GMP, License and other required documents/certificates legalization activity required for dossier compilation and registration.
  • 10. Archiving/Maintenance of the dossiers, renewal files and variation approvals along with supporting documents in regulatory data base.
  • 11. Identifying gaps in approved dossier compiled and submit the post approval changes (Minor variations) to agent/agency.
  • 12. Filing of variations if any and registration renewals.
  • 13. Compilation and circulation of product approval package up on receipt of product approval/Minor variation approvals to concern departments.
  • 14. Maintaining the product status (Registered and under registration) in excel sheet.

jobDetail_html:
We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Social Media Content Creator with a deep understanding of the hospitality industry and a proven track record of crafting engaging content.


Key Responsibilities:

  • As Manager of Social Media Content, you will manage our overall social media presence and create several eloquent writing pieces.
  • You will be responsible for developing content, managing social media marketing campaigns, optimizing social media platforms, and implementing effective communication strategies.
  • Create compelling and informative content across digital platforms
  • Drive traffic to website and increase social media followers, along with high engagement
  • Collaborate with influencers and affiliate marketers, which not only drive traffic but also create a network for the company
  • Stay updated on the latest trends, news, and developments in the hospitality industries to help keep the content relevant and insightful
  • Creative thinking and the ability to generate original, insightful, and engaging content, including articles, infographics, videos, and social media posts, that resonate with the target audience
  • Utilize video editing skills to produce engaging videos for various platforms, incorporating graphics and animations.
  • Actively participate on several important digital forums and websites
  • Utilize digital analytics tools to track and report on key metrics
  • Provide regular reports on digital performance, insights, and recommendations for improvement and use data-driven insights to optimize content strategies for better engagement and reach
  • Work closely with the marketing team and collaborate with them to craft artistic content.

Desired Skills:

  • Bachelors degree or higher in journalism/arts/or other English intensive major with a strong command of English
  • Minimum 1 year of experience as a digital content creator with expertise in content writing, basic designing, and video editing, preferably in the travel industry.
  • In-depth knowledge of various digital platforms, trends, and best practices
  • Strong content creation and copywriting skills
  • Creative thinking

jobDetail_text: Administration Officer (Australian Institute of Digital Technology)ABOUT USAustralian Institute of Digital Technology (AIDT) is a Melbourne based reputed Registered Training Organisation (RTO) and Commonwealth Register of Institutions and Courses for Overseas Students (CRICOS). We deliver high-quality nationally recognized qualifications for International and domestic students in Australia. At AIDT, we pride ourselves on delivering outstanding education service and maintaining an excellent reputation among our students, business partners, and industry peers.We are looking for a warm, friendly, and proactive professional to join our team as an Administration Ocer. If you have a passion for all things administration and nancial, thrive in a team environment, and excel at building client relationships, this role is for you. For the right candidate, this position oers opportunities for growth and career progression within our business.Key Responsibilities:• Provide professional, friendly customer service via email and over the phone. • Process incoming and outgoing mail, maintain electronic ling systems. • Maintain and develop relationships with the authorized agents • Assist with student orientation on intake dates• Provide student counselling services• At end sta meeting and keep updated knowledge in following the RTO's policies andprocedures• Process student les, issue Let er of Oer, Conrmation of Enrolment (CoE), etc. • Create timetable, basic marketing materials using Canva or similar platforms. • Liaise with trainers, students, stakeholders and CEO. • Manage Student Management System (SMS) and Learning Management System (LMS).• Help with the AIDT learning resources as indicated by CEO. • Maintain student assessment records.• Process agent commission and payment. • Liaise with the Accountant, including managing electronic lodgements of BAS and tax returns.• Prepare and issue invoices, manage receipts, and oversee basic banking tasks. • Other AIDT tasks as required and notied by the CEO.• Oer PA support to the CEO as required.Essential skills: • Minimum of 2+ years of experience in as an admin or accountant role is essential.• Exposure to Xero accounting software is highly desirable. • Strong computer skills, including prociency in Microsoft Oce programs.• Excellent phone, email, and in-person communication etiquette. Essential Skills: • Previous experience in a client-facing administrative role within a professional service. environment (e.g., accounting, education, or similar industries).• A positive attitude, keen at attention to detail, and a willingness to learn. • Autonomous self-starter, using your marketing and networking skills to increase student enrolments.• Proven experience working with International Students. • Outstanding communication skills, organization skills and problem-solving skills. • Punctual, reliable and self-motivated.• Ability to pick up new systems quickly.What We Oer  Perks & Benets:• Flexibility in work schedules and an accommodating, supportive team environment. • Future possibility of visiting Australia (if approved by DoHA)Why Join AIDT? At AIDT, we value our people and invest in their development. Youll be joining a supportive team that values excellence, professionalism, and a positive workplace culture. What Should You Do Next? If this sounds like the perfect role for you, wed love to hear from you! Please submit your application, including your resume and a cover letter, to hr@aidt.edu.au. We look forward  to welcoming you to the team.
jobDetail_html:
Administration Officer (Australian Institute of Digital Technology)
ABOUT US
Australian Institute of Digital Technology (AIDT) is a Melbourne based reputed Registered Training Organisation (RTO) and Commonwealth Register of Institutions and Courses for Overseas Students (CRICOS). We deliver high-quality nationally recognized qualifications for International and domestic students in Australia. At AIDT, we pride ourselves on delivering outstanding education service and maintaining an excellent reputation among our students, business partners, and industry peers.

We are looking for a warm, friendly, and proactive professional to join our team as an Administration Ocer. If you have a passion for all things administration and nancial, thrive in a team environment, and excel at building client relationships, this role is for you. For the right candidate, this position oers opportunities for growth and career progression within our business.


Key Responsibilities:


• Provide professional, friendly customer service via email and over the phone.
• Process incoming and outgoing mail, maintain electronic ling systems.
• Maintain and develop relationships with the authorized agents
• Assist with student orientation on intake dates
• Provide student counselling services
• At end sta meeting and keep updated knowledge in following the RTO's policies and
procedures
• Process student les, issue Let er of Oer, Conrmation of Enrolment (CoE), etc.
• Create timetable, basic marketing materials using Canva or similar platforms.
• Liaise with trainers, students, stakeholders and CEO.
• Manage Student Management System (SMS) and Learning Management System (LMS).
• Help with the AIDT learning resources as indicated by CEO.
• Maintain student assessment records.
• Process agent commission and payment.
• Liaise with the Accountant, including managing electronic lodgements of BAS and tax returns.
• Prepare and issue invoices, manage receipts, and oversee basic banking tasks.
• Other AIDT tasks as required and notied by the CEO.
• Oer PA support to the CEO as required.
Essential skills:
• Minimum of 2+ years of experience in as an admin or accountant role is essential.
• Exposure to Xero accounting software is highly desirable.
• Strong computer skills, including prociency in Microsoft Oce programs.
• Excellent phone, email, and in-person communication etiquette.

Essential Skills:


• Previous experience in a client-facing administrative role within a professional service.

name: Nexus Quant Partners
description: Company Profile:   Nexus Quant Partners is a leading quantitative hedge fund specializing in algorithmic trading and data-driven investment strategies. Our team leverages cutting-edge technology and advanced quantitative models to achieve superior returns in the financial markets. We are seeking a talented Full Stack Developer to join our dynamic team and contribute to the development of our internal and client-facing web applications.
about_html:
Company Profile:

Nexus Quant Partners is a leading quantitative hedge fund specializing in algorithmic trading and data-driven investment strategies. Our team leverages cutting-edge technology and advanced quantitative models to achieve superior returns in the financial markets. We are seeking a talented Full Stack Developer to join our dynamic team and contribute to the development of our internal and client-facing web applications.
jobDetail_text: As a Full Stack Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining web applications that support our trading operations and data analysis tools. You will work closely with our quantitative analysts, data scientists, and traders to build intuitive and efficient platforms that enhance our investment strategies and operational efficiency.Role & responsibilities Backend Development:Design and implement robust backend systems using Python and related frameworks (e.g., Django, Flask).Develop APIs and microservices to facilitate data exchange between different systems.Integrate third-party services and APIs for data retrieval and processing.Frontend Development:Build responsive and interactive user interfaces using modern frontend libraries such as React, Angular, or Vue.js.Collaborate with UI/UX designers to implement user-friendly web applications.Optimize frontend performance for speed and scalability.Database Management:Design and maintain relational and non-relational databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB).Ensure data integrity and implement efficient data storage solutions.DevOps and Deployment:Manage application deployment processes using containerization tools like Docker.Implement CI/CD pipelines for automated testing and deployment.Monitor application performance and troubleshoot issues in production environments.Collaboration and Communication:Work closely with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and translate them into technical solutions.Participate in code reviews and contribute to team knowledge sharing.Preferred candidate profile Education:Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.Experience:3+ years of professional experience as a Full Stack Developer or similar role.Proven experience in backend development using Python and frameworks like Django or Flask.Strong frontend development skills with experience in React (preferred), Angular, or Vue.js.Perks and benefits Candidates with good experience will offers a competitive compensation and benefits.
jobDetail_html:
As a Full Stack Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining web applications that support our trading operations and data analysis tools. You will work closely with our quantitative analysts, data scientists, and traders to build intuitive and efficient platforms that enhance our investment strategies and operational efficiency.


Role & responsibilities


  • Backend Development:
    • Design and implement robust backend systems using Python and related frameworks (e.g., Django, Flask).
    • Develop APIs and microservices to facilitate data exchange between different systems.
    • Integrate third-party services and APIs for data retrieval and processing.
  • Frontend Development:
    • Build responsive and interactive user interfaces using modern frontend libraries such as React, Angular, or Vue.js.
    • Collaborate with UI/UX designers to implement user-friendly web applications.
    • Optimize frontend performance for speed and scalability.
  • Database Management:
    • Design and maintain relational and non-relational databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB).
    • Ensure data integrity and implement efficient data storage solutions.
  • DevOps and Deployment:
    • Manage application deployment processes using containerization tools like Docker.
    • Implement CI/CD pipelines for automated testing and deployment.
    • Monitor application performance and troubleshoot issues in production environments.
  • Collaboration and Communication:
    • Work closely with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and translate them into technical solutions.
    • Participate in code reviews and contribute to team knowledge sharing.

Preferred candidate profile


  • Education:
    • Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
  • Experience:
    • 3+ years of professional experience as a Full Stack Developer or similar role.
    • Proven experience in backend development using Python and frameworks like Django or Flask.
    • Strong frontend development skills with experience in React (preferred), Angular, or Vue.js.

Perks and benefits


Candidates with good experience will offers a competitive compensation and benefits.
qualification: B.Tech/B.E. in Computers, M.Tech in Any Specialization, MS/M.Sc(Science) in Computers

For Delhi/NCR residents only.About the opportunity:Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence modelsThis freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for youYou may contribute your expertise byCrafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI modelsEvaluating and ranking code generated by AI modelsExamples of desirable expertise:Currently enrolled in or completed a bachelor's degree or higher in computer science at a selective institutionProficiency working with one or more of the the following languages: Java, Python, JavaScript / TypeScript, C++Ability to articulate complex concepts fluently in EnglishExcellent attention to detail, including grammar, punctuation, and style guidelinesPayment:Currently, pay rates for core project work by Tier 1 coding experts in India ranges from $13.25/hr up to $27.5/hr USDNext Steps: - Complete a 15-Minute Prescreening Assessment: https://www.scaler.com/test/a/outlier-ai-python- Onboarding: If successful, you'll receive onboarding details to start working on our platform.
jobDetail_html:
Coding Expertise for AI Training - (India Based)


Outlier helps the worlds most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?


We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.


For Delhi/NCR residents only.


About the opportunity:

  • Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
  • This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you

You may contribute your expertise by

  • Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
  • Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models

Examples of desirable expertise:

  • Currently enrolled in or completed a bachelor's degree or higher in computer science at a selective institution
  • Proficiency working with one or more of the the following languages: Java, Python, JavaScript / TypeScript, C++
  • Ability to articulate complex concepts fluently in English
  • Excellent attention to detail, including grammar, punctuation, and style guidelines

Payment:

  • Currently, pay rates for core project work by Tier 1 coding experts in India ranges from $13.25/hr up to $27.5/hr USD

Next Steps:

- Complete a 15-Minute Prescreening Assessment: https://www.scaler.com/test/a/outlier-ai-python

- Onboarding: If successful, you'll receive onboarding details to start working on our platform.

jobDetail_html:
Role & responsibilities

  • Design, build, and maintain scalable cloud infrastructure to support AI models and applications.
  • Implement and manage CI/CD pipelines to automate deployment processes.
  • Monitor system performance and troubleshoot issues to maintain a high level of system reliability.
  • Collaborate with development teams to optimize application performance and scalability.
  • Work on and Manage infrastructure as code (IaC) using tools like Terraform or CloudFormation.
  • Ensure the security and compliance of infrastructure through proactive measures and best practices.
  • Optimize resource allocation and cost management within cloud environments.
  • Automate routine operational tasks to enhance development productivity.
  • Stay up-to-date with emerging DevOps practices and tools to keep our processes at the forefront of technology.

Preferred candidate profile

  • Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent practical experience).
  • 3-5 years of experience as a DevOps Engineer or in a similar role.
  • Strong experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud).
  • Proficiency in CI/CD tools (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD, GitHub Actions).
  • Solid scripting and automation skills (e.g., Python, Bash).
  • Experience with containerization and orchestration (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes).
  • Familiarity with configuration management tools (e.g., Ansible, Puppet, Chef).
  • Knowledge of monitoring and logging tools (e.g., Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack).
  • Understanding of best practices for security, scalability, and disaster recovery.

Preferred Skills:


  • Experience working in AI/ML environments.
  • Exposure to MLOps tools and workflows.
  • Familiarity with data pipeline orchestration tools (e.g., Apache Airflow).
  • Knowledge of version control systems and collaborative development (e.g., Git).

Perks and benefits

  • Competitive salary and benefits package.
  • Opportunities to work with state-of-the-art AI technology and contribute to impactful projects.
  • A collaborative and supportive team environment.
  • Professional growth and career advancement opportunities.

Join us at uCube.ai and be part of a team thats driving innovation in AI solutions. If you’re passionate about leveraging DevOps practices to solve complex challenges, we’d love to hear from you.
