name: Antwalk
description: About AntWalk AntWalk (www.antwalk.com) is an industry-focused SaaS platform. AntWalk was founded by McKinsey alumni and invested in by marquee investors like GSV, Y Combinator, and Matrix Partners, and at heart, we exist to make Humans succeed in the age of AI. We believe that Humans and Human Capabilities will not only matter but will be the Organization's core competitive advantage in AI-augmented workplaces.   We have a proprietary AI tool - ARCH (AI-led role-specific Capability and Human potential) that helps Organizations get a scientific and holistic view of their people's capability at an individual, team, and organization level.    It helps organizations Design, Measure, and Build human capabilities in line with their business goals in the "age of AI".Who we are? AntWalk was founded by a team of Mckinsey/ISB alums and life-long passionate teachers, who believe that Knowledge acquired by Professionals through years of hard work is a treasure chest, that can help professionals shape their careers and help companies create rockstars from their existing workforce.  We are a Series A funded startup backed by Amazing Investors like Y Combinator, GSV Ventures, and Matrix Partners
about_html:
About AntWalk

AntWalk (www.antwalk.com) is an industry-focused SaaS platform. AntWalk was founded by McKinsey alumni and invested in by marquee investors like GSV, Y Combinator, and Matrix Partners, and at heart, we exist to make Humans succeed in the age of AI. We believe that Humans and Human Capabilities will not only matter but will be the Organization's core competitive advantage in AI-augmented workplaces.  

We have a proprietary AI tool - ARCH (AI-led role-specific Capability and Human potential) that helps Organizations get a scientific and holistic view of their people's capability at an individual, team, and organization level.  

It helps organizations Design, Measure, and Build human capabilities in line with their business goals in the "age of AI".


Who we are?

AntWalk was founded by a team of Mckinsey/ISB alums and life-long passionate teachers, who believe that Knowledge acquired by Professionals through years of hard work is a treasure chest, that can help professionals shape their careers and help companies create rockstars from their existing workforce.

We are a Series A funded startup backed by Amazing Investors like Y Combinator, GSV Ventures, and Matrix Partners
jobDetail_text: Role & responsibilities: Identify and Target Enterprise Clients: Strategize and identify enterprises within the Technology, Media, and Telecom sectors seeking capability building in their workforce. Conduct market research and networking to identify potential clients and understand their specific needs. Pipeline Management: Collaborate closely with the marketing team to cultivate Marketing Qualified Leads  Guide the Growth Team members to generate, maintain, and advance a robust pipeline of enterprise clients. Employ effective lead-generation techniques to ensure a steady flow of qualified prospects. Industry Understanding: Develop a comprehensive understanding of the assigned industry, including market dynamics, competitive landscape, and key industry players.   Strategic Planning and Travel: Strategically plan and prioritize travel schedules to maximize face-to-face interactions with C-level executives of target enterprises. Conduct in-depth discussions and presentations to showcase the value proposition of our L&D courses and solutions. Lead Follow-Up and Conversion: Implement rigorous follow-up strategies to convert leads into successful business engagements. Take ownership of every lead from identification to closure stage, ensuring timely and effective communication throughout the sales process. Account Management: Act as a trusted advisor, understanding client needs and providing tailored solutions to meet their objectives. Cultivate and nurture long-term relationships with enterprise clients to drive repeat business and increase overall wallet size. Manage all aspects of the assigned industry, overseeing inside sales processes, ownership of vertical P/L, and collaborating with internal stakeholders.   Preferred candidate profile: Master's degree in business administration, Marketing, or a related field; MBA preferred from tier 1,2 Institutes. 7-10 years of proven track record of success in enterprise sales, preferably within the SaaS or training industry. Strong understanding of the Technology sectors, with a focus on identifying opportunities for capability building. You are expected to have a track record of autonomously closing deals valued at over 15 lakhs The ability to communicate and engage with global clients (High Growth Startup experience would be great) Demonstrated ability to manage a complex sales cycle and drive results in a target-driven environment. Willingness to travel extensively across the country  Strategic thinking and planning skills, with a focus on delivering value-added solutions to clients. Enthusiasm for the startup space and open to learning and adapting to changes in the startup ecosystem.  Why would you love to work with us? Unlock opportunities for continuous professional development and advancement in your career trajectory. Enjoy a competitive salary with stock options, promoting long-term commitment and stability. Thrive in our dynamic and collaborative work environment, where innovation and growth are at the forefront. Collaborate with an exceptionally talented team comprising professionals from prestigious institutions such as ISB, IIT, and IIM.    Join us in driving the rapid growth of our EdTech startup and experience accelerated career development firsthand.
jobDetail_html:
Role & responsibilities:

Identify and Target Enterprise Clients:

  • Strategize and identify enterprises within the Technology, Media, and Telecom sectors seeking capability building in their workforce.
  • Conduct market research and networking to identify potential clients and understand their specific needs.

Pipeline Management:

  • Collaborate closely with the marketing team to cultivate Marketing Qualified Leads 
  • Guide the Growth Team members to generate, maintain, and advance a robust pipeline of enterprise clients.
  • Employ effective lead-generation techniques to ensure a steady flow of qualified prospects.

Industry Understanding:

  • Develop a comprehensive understanding of the assigned industry, including market dynamics, competitive landscape, and key industry players.

Strategic Planning and Travel:

  • Strategically plan and prioritize travel schedules to maximize face-to-face interactions with C-level executives of target enterprises.
  • Conduct in-depth discussions and presentations to showcase the value proposition of our L&D courses and solutions.

Lead Follow-Up and Conversion:

  • Implement rigorous follow-up strategies to convert leads into successful business engagements.
  • Take ownership of every lead from identification to closure stage, ensuring timely and effective communication throughout the sales process.

Account Management:

  • Act as a trusted advisor, understanding client needs and providing tailored solutions to meet their objectives.
  • Cultivate and nurture long-term relationships with enterprise clients to drive repeat business and increase overall wallet size.
  • Manage all aspects of the assigned industry, overseeing inside sales processes, ownership of vertical P/L, and collaborating with internal stakeholders.

Preferred candidate profile:

  • Master's degree in business administration, Marketing, or a related field; MBA preferred from tier 1,2 Institutes.
  • 7-10 years of proven track record of success in enterprise sales, preferably within the SaaS or training industry.
  • Strong understanding of the Technology sectors, with a focus on identifying opportunities for capability building.
  • You are expected to have a track record of autonomously closing deals valued at over 15 lakhs
  • The ability to communicate and engage with global clients (High Growth Startup experience would be great)
  • Demonstrated ability to manage a complex sales cycle and drive results in a target-driven environment.
  • Willingness to travel extensively across the country 
  • Strategic thinking and planning skills, with a focus on delivering value-added solutions to clients.
  • Enthusiasm for the startup space and open to learning and adapting to changes in the startup ecosystem.

Why would you love to work with us?

  • Unlock opportunities for continuous professional development and advancement in your career trajectory.
  • Enjoy a competitive salary with stock options, promoting long-term commitment and stability.
  • Thrive in our dynamic and collaborative work environment, where innovation and growth are at the forefront.
  • Collaborate with an exceptionally talented team comprising professionals from prestigious institutions such as ISB, IIT, and IIM.

Join us in driving the rapid growth of our EdTech startup and experience accelerated career development firsthand.

Develop and implement new features using Core Java and J2EE components    Utilize JBoss and the Spring framework for application development and maintenance.    Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code.    Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.    Perform code reviews and provide constructive feedback to peers.    Troubleshoot and resolve issues in a timely manner.    Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.    Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.    Work with MySQL databases to ensure data integrity and optimize queries.Required Skills:     Very strong in Java and J2EE Technologies. It includes EJB, JSP, Servlet, Java Scripting, XML, XSLT, JMS.    Good knowledge of   application server Jboss, Spring framework and working with MySQL.    Good knowledge Java Multithreading and Socket Programming along with knowledge of protocols such as HTTP, HTTPS, SMTP  is preferred.    A good knowledge of widely used open source tools such as CVS, Log4J,  XDoclet, Ant, Struts, Eclipse etc.     A good insight in J2EE design patterns.     Should have good working knowledge on both Windows and Linux Operating systems.    Hands-on experience with JBoss and WildFly.    Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., CVS,Git).    Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.    Ability to work independently and as part of a team.    Excellent communication skills.Educational Qualifications:    Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.Preferred Qualifications:    Experience in using cloud-based deployment solutions    Experience with RESTful APIs and web services.    Knowledge of front-end technologies is a plus.    Familiarity with Agile development methodologies. jobDetail_html:
Key Responsibilities:

Maintain, enhance, and support existing Java applications.
Develop and implement new features using Core Java and J2EE components
Utilize JBoss and the Spring framework for application development and maintenance.
Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
Perform code reviews and provide constructive feedback to peers.
Troubleshoot and resolve issues in a timely manner.
Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.
Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.
Work with MySQL databases to ensure data integrity and optimize queries.

Required Skills:

Very strong in Java and J2EE Technologies. It includes EJB, JSP, Servlet, Java Scripting, XML, XSLT, JMS.
Good knowledge of application server Jboss, Spring framework and working with MySQL.
Good knowledge Java Multithreading and Socket Programming along with knowledge of protocols such as HTTP, HTTPS, SMTP is preferred.
A good knowledge of widely used open source tools such as CVS, Log4J, XDoclet, Ant, Struts, Eclipse etc.
A good insight in J2EE design patterns.
Should have good working knowledge on both Windows and Linux Operating systems.
Hands-on experience with JBoss and WildFly.
Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., CVS,Git).
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Excellent communication skills.

Educational Qualifications:

Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.

Preferred Qualifications:

Experience in using cloud-based deployment solutions
Experience with RESTful APIs and web services.
Knowledge of front-end technologies is a plus.
Familiarity with Agile development methodologies.
Experience with VoiceXML based application development.

Benefits:

Competitive Compensation
Professional development opportunities
Flexible working hours
Friendly and supportive work environment

jobDetail_html:
JOB TITLE: Head of Finance & Accounts

LOCATION: Bengaluru

EXPERIENCE:10+ years


Company Description

Printo is India's largest print and brand merchandise retail chain founded in2006. We have 28 retail stores across 6 cities and have serviced over 1 million customers across India. We are a board managed company with Infoedge and Blume Ventures as our investors. We are growing profitably with an aim to IPO in 3 years.


Role Description

We are hiring dynamic Women Leaders in Finance, This is a full-time on-site role for a Head of Finance & Accounts at Printo in Bengaluru. The role involves overseeing financial statements, accounting function, financial reporting, budgeting, and utilizing analytical skills to drive financial decisions and strategies. We are looking for a CA who is a business person first and has a dhandha mindset. The opportunity is to grow into a CFO role of a company that is going to IPO in 3 years.


Qualifications

  • Strong understanding of Financial Statements, Financial Reporting, and Budgeting skills and Analytical Skills.
  • Ability to look at a Balance Sheet and P&L and link it to the business model and ground realities
  • Experience in Cashflow management
  • Strong understanding of Budgeting and Controls
  • Ability to work effectively in a team environment
  • Bachelors degree in Finance, Accounting, or related field
  • Professional certification (e.g., CA, ICWA,CFA) is a plus.

Industry

  • Consumer Services

Employment Type

Full-time
qualification: ICWA (CMA) in ICWA (CMA), CA in Second Attempt, First Attempt

about_html:
Aditya Arora is a SEBI registered stock market research analyst with an industry experience of 10+ years and multiple educational qualifications including CFP, CFTe, CMT and PGDIFA to his credit which are international gold standard in finance, investments and technical analysis.

Aditya Arora is an expert panellist on top Indian business news channels ET Now Swadesh(Hindi), ET Now(English) and NDTV Profit and features in Indias number 1 business newspaper The Economic Times with his stock recommendations, analysis and prediction of securities, indices and markets.

His other media and social media affiliations include popular streaming platforms and apps like Spotify, Trinkerr and PayTm Money.

Adlytick Stock Market Research & Analytics is the brainchild of Aditya Arora born out of his passion for the stock markets.

With a clientele pan India and abroad, Adlytick aims at providing investors with the best market outlook and guidance, enabling them to optimize their capital and seize market opportunities to become rich in stock market and grow their wealth. Adlytick specializes in stock option derivatives, Index Options Derivatives , cash market, commodities and currencies!

Reach out to us to multiply your wealth and lessen your financial stress.

As an intern, you will be working on a cutting-edge project to develop a web or mobile application that utilizes advanced technologies to transform the way people experience hairstyles.ResponsibilitiesDesign and develop front-end using either Flutter or React.Implement Firebase or Supabase or similar BaaS platformIntegrate APIs and third-party services to enhance the app's functionality.Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in the field.Test and debug the application to ensure optimal performance and user experience.Contribute to the overall improvement of the app's design and functionality.Required Skills and ExperienceStrong proficiency in at least one front-end framework (Flutter or React).Experience with Firebase or Supabase or similar BaaS platformKnowledge of API integration and data handling techniques.A solid understanding of software development principles and best practices.A passion for learning and staying updated with the latest technologies.A portfolio showcasing previous projects or apps developed using relevant technologies.Preferred SkillsExperience with machine learning or computer vision techniques.Knowledge of image processing and manipulation tools.What We OfferA challenging and rewarding opportunity to work on a cutting-edge project.A flexible work environment and competitive compensation.A chance to contribute to a product that will impact the lives of many.If you are passionate about technology and eager to make a significant contribution, we encourage you to apply.
jobDetail_html:
About the Role

We are seeking a talented and motivated Software Developer Intern to join our team. As an intern, you will be working on a cutting-edge project to develop a web or mobile application that utilizes advanced technologies to transform the way people experience hairstyles.


Responsibilities

  • Design and develop front-end using either Flutter or React.
  • Implement Firebase or Supabase or similar BaaS platform
  • Integrate APIs and third-party services to enhance the app's functionality.
  • Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in the field.
  • Test and debug the application to ensure optimal performance and user experience.
  • Contribute to the overall improvement of the app's design and functionality.

Required Skills and Experience

  • Strong proficiency in at least one front-end framework (Flutter or React).
  • Experience with Firebase or Supabase or similar BaaS platform
  • Knowledge of API integration and data handling techniques.
  • A solid understanding of software development principles and best practices.
  • A passion for learning and staying updated with the latest technologies.
  • A portfolio showcasing previous projects or apps developed using relevant technologies.

Preferred Skills

  • Experience with machine learning or computer vision techniques.
  • Knowledge of image processing and manipulation tools.

What We Offer

  • A challenging and rewarding opportunity to work on a cutting-edge project.
  • A flexible work environment and competitive compensation.
  • A chance to contribute to a product that will impact the lives of many.

If you are passionate about technology and eager to make a significant contribution, we encourage you to apply.

Roles and Responsibilities

  • Manage a team of sales professionals to achieve targets through effective target planning, execution, and monitoring.
  • Develop and maintain strong relationships with clients to drive business growth and client satisfaction.
  • Identify new business opportunities by acquiring new clients and expanding existing ones.

  • Excellent communication skills for building strong relationships with clients at all levels.
  • Ability to work independently as well as part of a team towards common goals.

name: ITL India
description: ITL  USA, Inc. is a diversified international logistics company  headquartered in Reno, NV with established offices in Los Angeles, CA and Gurugram, India. The company's services include ocean and air freight, domestic transport, Customs brokerage, and warehousing & fulfillment provided globally through a network of world-class partners.  ITL's mission is to provide exceptional service and customized  logistics and supply chain solutions for small- and mid-sized companies at a competitive price. ITL USA is a part of All Square Logistics which includes Dart Logistics Express, NatSun Transportation & Logistics, and Prime Warehouse.

jobDetail_html:
Summary


We are seeking a motivated and results-driven Inside Sales Manager to join our team. The ideal candidate will have excellent communication skills, a passion for sales, and the ability to build strong relationships with potential customers.

Proven experience in international logistics and supply chain management (NVOCC and US-trade exposure a major bonus)

The ability to work a permanent night shift.

Comfortable commuting distance from Gurgaon.




Key Responsibilities


Engage with potential clients via phone, email, and online channels to generate leads and close sales.

Understand customer needs and provide tailored solutions.

Maintain a high level of product knowledge to confidently address customer inquiries.

Follow up on leads generated by marketing campaigns and other sources.

Meet or exceed monthly and quarterly sales targets.

Update and maintain CRM systems with accurate customer information and sales activities.


Qualifications


Bachelors degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field (preferred).

Proven experience in sales or customer service (inside sales experience is a plus).

Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

Strong negotiation and interpersonal skills.

Proficiency in CRM tools and Microsoft Office Suite.

Ability to work independently and as part of a team.



Relevant skills include Inside Sales experience in logistics and supply chain management. The ability to work in a fast-paced environment, prioritize tasks effectively, and work collaboratively in a team setting are highly beneficial.

Required Skills:
Candidate Sourcing, Resume Screening, Interview Coordination, Job Postings, Offer Letter Preparation, Pre-Employment Documentation, Office Management, Record Keeping, HR Policies and Procedures, Onboarding, Employee Relations, Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook).

https://forms.gle/C5fntFhBqH7bQrYa8


Job Summary:
We are looking for an HR executive with at least 1 year of experience in recruitment and office administration to support our HR team. The ideal candidate will manage the recruitment process, including sourcing candidates and scheduling interviews while assisting in various office administration activities to ensure smooth and efficient daily operations.
Responsibilities:
• Assist in recruitment by posting job openings, sourcing candidates, and shortlisting resumes.
• Coordinate interviews between candidates and hiring managers, ensuring efficient scheduling and communication.
• Maintain candidate records and ensure data is updated in the applicant tracking system or relevant databases.
• Help draft and send offer letters and assist in pre-employment, including reference checks and document collection.
• Assist in managing office supplies and inventory, ensuring adequate stock levels.
• Organize and coordinate meetings, conferences, and company events.
• Support the onboarding process for new hires, including preparing welcome materials and ensuring that all necessary documents are completed.
• Maintain and update employee records, ensuring compliance with company policies and legal requirements.
• Act as a point of contact for employee inquiries related to HR policies, benefits, and office-related matters.
• Assist in implementing employee engagement programs and initiatives to foster a positive workplace environment.
Job Requirements:
• At least 1 year of experience in HR recruitment and office administration.
• Ready to learn new technologies.
• Familiarity with recruitment tools, candidate sourcing techniques, and interview coordination.
• Strong organizational skills with the ability to manage multiple tasks and prioritize effectively.
• Good communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to interact professionally with employees and candidates.
• Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and familiarity with HR software are advantageous.
Qualification:
• A bachelor's degree in human resources, related field, or equivalent work experience is required.
• Completing a relevant course is preferred.

UX/UI designers to transform wireframes and mockups into high-quality, responsive interfaces.- Architect and develop reusable, modular components in React JS.- Integrate with RESTful APIs and GraphQL At least 3 years of professional experience as a React JS Developer or in a similar front-end development role.- Experience working with Python in a back end or data engineering environment.- Developing REST APIs using Python (preferably Flask or FastAPI)- Strong expertise in React JS and its ecosystem (React Hooks, functional components, lifecycle methods).- Extensive experience with JavaScript (ES6+) and TypeScript.- Solid understanding of state management libraries like Redux, MobX, or Context API.- Proficiency in front-end technologies, including HTML5, CSS3, and CSS pre-processors (e.g., SASS, LESS).- Strong knowledge of RESTful APIs and GraphQL for efficient data handling.- Experience with modern front-end build tools like Webpack, Babel, and task runners like Gulp or Grunt.- Familiarity with version control systems like Git.- Expertise in optimizing web applications for performance and scalability.- Experience with testing libraries like Jest, Mocha, Enzyme, or React Testing Library.- Strong problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and a passion for writing clean, efficient code.- Excellent communication skills and experience working in a collaborative, agile development environment.- Prior experience working in an agile development setup, and familiarity with CI/CD pipelines.Bonus Skills:- Experience with Next.js, React Native, or jobDetail_html:
Role & responsibilities:


- Lead the design and development of complex React JS applications with a focus on performance, scalability, and user experience.

- Collaborate closely with UX/UI designers to transform wireframes and mockups into high-quality, responsive interfaces.

- Architect and develop reusable, modular components in React JS.

- Integrate with RESTful APIs and GraphQL to enable dynamic, data-driven functionality.

- Mentor and guide junior developers, providing technical leadership and fostering a culture of learning.

- Optimize web applications for maximum speed, scalability, and performance across all devices and browsers.

- Write clean, maintainable code and conduct thorough code reviews to ensure high-quality output.

- Implement state management solutions like Redux, Context API, or similar technologies.

- Work with back-end teams to ensure smooth integration and efficient data flow between front-end and back-end systems.

- Troubleshoot and debug complex issues in production and development environments.

- Keep up to date with the latest React trends, best practices, and technologies, and suggest improvements.

- Prepare and maintain comprehensive technical documentation for internal and external stakeholders.

- Participate in agile development cycles, contributing to sprint planning, stand-ups, and retrospectives.



Preferred candidate profile:


At least 3 years of professional experience as a React JS Developer or in a similar front-end development role.

- Experience working with Python in a back end or data engineering environment.

- Developing REST APIs using Python (preferably Flask or FastAPI)

- Strong expertise in React JS and its ecosystem (React Hooks, functional components, lifecycle methods).

- Extensive experience with JavaScript (ES6+) and TypeScript.

- Solid understanding of state management libraries like Redux, MobX, or Context API.

- Proficiency in front-end technologies, including HTML5, CSS3, and CSS pre-processors (e.g., SASS, LESS).

- Strong knowledge of RESTful APIs and GraphQL for efficient data handling.

- Experience with modern front-end build tools like Webpack, Babel, and task runners like Gulp or Grunt.

- Familiarity with version control systems like Git.

- Expertise in optimizing web applications for performance and scalability.

- Experience with testing libraries like Jest, Mocha, Enzyme, or React Testing Library.

- Strong problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and a passion for writing clean, efficient code.

- Excellent communication skills and experience working in a collaborative, agile development environment.

- Prior experience working in an agile development setup, and familiarity with CI/CD pipelines.

Bonus Skills:

- Experience with Next.js, React Native, or Server-Side Rendering (SSR) is a plus.

- Familiarity with Node.js for back-end integration is advantageous.

- Experience with cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud is a plus.

- Knowledge of Docker, containerization, or microservices architecture is a plus.

If you're looking for an exciting opportunity to make an impact, lead technical initiatives, and contribute to building innovative applications, we encourage you to apply.




Perks and benefits:


As Per Industry Standard


Note: Preferred Immediate Joiners or 15 Days Notice Period.

jobDetail_html:
Job Descriptions:


We are looking for One skilled and detail-oriented Junior Accountant and One Senior Accountant to join our team . The ideal candidate will manage financial transactions, maintain accurate records, and ensure compliance with financial regulations.



The detailed job description for Junior Accountant would be as follows:


  • Prepare and maintain financial statements.
  • Manage accounts payable and receivable.
  • Perform bank reconciliations and financial analysis.
  • Ensure compliance with GST, TDS, and other statutory requirements.
  • Filling of GST Returns
  • Assist in audits and budget preparations.
  • Provide regular financial updates to management.
  • Maintaining daily books of Accounts
  • Sound knowledge of Income Tax and Returns
  • Handling Cash
  • Assist Audit Team in preparation for finalization of accounts.

The role of Senior Accountant would be as follows:


  • Financial Statements: Prepare balance sheets, P&L Accounts
  • ROC Compliance: Coordinate ROC filings and update and fill up online forms if required. Sound knowledge in ROC Compliance matters.
  • Income Tax: File returns, manage scrutiny, and handle assessments.
  • Tax Payments & Returns: Handle TDS and professional tax payments and filings.
  • GST: Oversee GST working, filing, and payments.
  • ITR: Provide documents for reassessment if needed..
  • Accounting Processes: Plan and implement accounting and documentation processes.
  • Entry Verification: Verify and authorize subordinate entries.
  • Financial Reports: Produce monthly reports for management.
  • Ledger Reconciliation: Reconcile and confirm ledgers with vendors.
  • Account Scrutiny: Review accounts receivable/payable, duties, taxes, investments, loans, and inter-company transactions.
  • Advance Tax: Calculate and manage advance tax payments.
  • Bank Reconciliation: Verify daily and monthly bank reconciliations.
  • Documentation: Ensure smooth filing and documentation.
  • Must be self starter and able to handle accounts independently.

Requirements:


  • Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field. Only B.Com graduated or related commerce graduates or Post Graduates (M.Com ) with good academic records need only apply.
  • For Senior Accountant role minimum 6 years of relevant experience is required.
  • Proficiency in Tally / Tally Prime
  • Good academic records with strong theoretical and practical knowledge
  • Excellent analytical and organizational skills.
  • Both male and female can apply.
  • Interview would be at our Central Kolkata Office. Shortlisted candidate need to appear in face to face interview.
  • Urgent Joiners with limited notice period preferred.
  • Salary is negotiable for suitable candidate.
  • Candidates from any industry can apply.
  • Please check Salary Bracket offered , Company Profile , place of posting before offering.
  • Outstation candidates who can immediately relocate to kolkata and appear for interview need only apply.

Please Note:

1) candidates who are handling office assistant / data entry and accounts job can apply provided they are also expert in independently handling accounts job.


2) This is a full time job.


3) All applications must have an attached CV/ Resume.
qualification: B.Com in Any Specialization, M.Com in Any Specialization
qualification_html: B.Com in Any Specialization, M.Com in Any Specialization

The ideal candidate will have a strong foundation in UI development, reusable design principles, and a passion for delivering high-quality code in fast-paced environments.Key Responsibilities:Develop user interfaces and front-end logic for e-commerce and real estate platforms.Collaborate with backend developers, designers, and product managers to implement robust solutions.Optimize browser performance to enhance user experience.Ensure responsiveness and cross-browser compatibility.Required Skills:ReactJS: 56 years of professional experience in UI development with at least 3+ years in ReactJS.JavaScript: Strong proficiency, including DOM manipulation and event handling.React Libraries: Hands-on experience with redux-toolkit, redux-saga, and other state management solutions.API Integration: Solid experience with REST APIs and Fetch API.Performance Optimization: Expertise in optimizing browser performance and UI rendering.HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript: Strong skills in developing pixel-perfect layouts.Job Title: React Front-End DeveloperEmployment Type: Full Time, PermanentNice-to-Have Skills:CI/CD Tools: Experience with Jenkins and SonarQube.Containerization: Familiarity with Docker.Testing Frameworks: Knowledge of testing tools like Jest, Enzyme, or Cypress.TypeScript: Experience in adding type safety to JavaScript projects.Version Control: Proficiency in Git and working with branching strategies.GraphQL: Experience working with GraphQL APIs is a plus.Why Join Us?Work on a cutting-edge SaaS platform in a high-growth industry.Opportunity to innovate and shape products used by real estate professionals and signage companies.Collaborative and growth-oriented team culture.
jobDetail_html:
Job Description:

We are looking for a strong React JS developer with a proven track record of building scalable and user-friendly front-end applications. The ideal candidate will have a strong foundation in UI development, reusable design principles, and a passion for delivering high-quality code in fast-paced environments.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Develop user interfaces and front-end logic for e-commerce and real estate platforms.
  • Collaborate with backend developers, designers, and product managers to implement robust solutions.
  • Optimize browser performance to enhance user experience.
  • Ensure responsiveness and cross-browser compatibility.

Required Skills:

  • ReactJS: 56 years of professional experience in UI development with at least 3+ years in ReactJS.
  • JavaScript: Strong proficiency, including DOM manipulation and event handling.
  • React Libraries: Hands-on experience with redux-toolkit, redux-saga, and other state management solutions.
  • API Integration: Solid experience with REST APIs and Fetch API.
  • Performance Optimization: Expertise in optimizing browser performance and UI rendering.
  • HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript: Strong skills in developing pixel-perfect layouts.

Job Title: React Front-End Developer

Employment Type: Full Time, Permanent

Nice-to-Have Skills:

  • CI/CD Tools: Experience with Jenkins and SonarQube.
  • Containerization: Familiarity with Docker.
  • Testing Frameworks: Knowledge of testing tools like Jest, Enzyme, or Cypress.
  • TypeScript: Experience in adding type safety to JavaScript projects.
  • Version Control: Proficiency in Git and working with branching strategies.
  • GraphQL: Experience working with GraphQL APIs is a plus.

Why Join Us?

  • Work on a cutting-edge SaaS platform in a high-growth industry.
  • Opportunity to innovate and shape products used by real estate professionals and signage companies.
  • Collaborative and growth-oriented team culture.

Technical Skills:Proficient in PHP: Strong understanding of core PHP and object-oriented programming (OOP).Framework Experience: Proficient in popular PHP frameworks such as Laravel, Symfony, CodeIgniter, or Zend Framework.Database Management: Solid experience with MySQL, PostgreSQL, or other relational databases, including writing efficient SQL queries, optimizing database performance, and ensuring data integrity.Version Control Systems: Familiarity with version control tools like Git (GitHub, GitLab, or Bitbucket) for collaborative development.Front-End Knowledge: Basic understanding of front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and experience integrating front-end code with back-end functionality.API Development & Integration: Experience with developing and consuming RESTful APIs, Web Services, or other API protocols.Security Best Practices: Understanding of web application security issues (e.g., SQL injection, XSS, CSRF) and the ability to write secure PHP code.Testing: Knowledge of PHP testing frameworks (e.g., PHPUnit) and experience writing unit tests or conducting integration testing.Cloud and Hosting Platforms (optional): Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure) or hosting environments (Linux-based, Apache, Nginx).3. Soft Skills:Problem-Solving: Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to think critically to troubleshoot issues and find efficient solutions.Attention to Detail: High attention to detail and commitment to delivering high-quality, well-tested code.Communication: Strong verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to explain complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical team members.Team Collaboration: Ability to collaborate effectively in a cross-functional team, including front-end developers, designers, project managers, and other stakeholders.Adaptability: Willingness to learn new technologies, tools, and best practices, and adapt to evolving project requirements.Time Management: Ability to manage time effectively, prioritize tasks, and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.Perks and benefits
jobDetail_html:
Skills & Qualifications:

  • Proficiency in PHP: Strong knowledge of PHP and its frameworks (e.g., Laravel, Symfony, Zend).
  • Web Technologies: Experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, AJAX, and RESTful APIs.
  • Database Management: Experience with databases like MySQL, PostgreSQL, and SQL.
  • Version Control: Experience using Git or other version control systems.
  • Problem-Solving: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Communication: Ability to clearly explain technical issues and solutions.
  • Attention to Detail: Ability to write clean, maintainable code.


2. Technical Skills:

  • Proficient in PHP: Strong understanding of core PHP and object-oriented programming (OOP).
  • Framework Experience: Proficient in popular PHP frameworks such as Laravel, Symfony, CodeIgniter, or Zend Framework.
  • Database Management: Solid experience with MySQL, PostgreSQL, or other relational databases, including writing efficient SQL queries, optimizing database performance, and ensuring data integrity.
  • Version Control Systems: Familiarity with version control tools like Git (GitHub, GitLab, or Bitbucket) for collaborative development.
  • Front-End Knowledge: Basic understanding of front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and experience integrating front-end code with back-end functionality.
  • API Development & Integration: Experience with developing and consuming RESTful APIs, Web Services, or other API protocols.
  • Security Best Practices: Understanding of web application security issues (e.g., SQL injection, XSS, CSRF) and the ability to write secure PHP code.
  • Testing: Knowledge of PHP testing frameworks (e.g., PHPUnit) and experience writing unit tests or conducting integration testing.
  • Cloud and Hosting Platforms (optional): Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure) or hosting environments (Linux-based, Apache, Nginx).

3. Soft Skills:

  • Problem-Solving: Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to think critically to troubleshoot issues and find efficient solutions.
  • Attention to Detail: High attention to detail and commitment to delivering high-quality, well-tested code.
  • Communication: Strong verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to explain complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical team members.
  • Team Collaboration: Ability to collaborate effectively in a cross-functional team, including front-end developers, designers, project managers, and other stakeholders.
  • Adaptability: Willingness to learn new technologies, tools, and best practices, and adapt to evolving project requirements.
  • Time Management: Ability to manage time effectively, prioritize tasks, and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.


Perks and benefits

Oversee quality analysis and ensuring maintenance of quality of manufactured products.Research, design, develop production processes to improve efficiency and decrease consumptionAnalyse data to develop conclusions.Communicate results of analysis and research.Overseeing and conducting R&DEvaluate current processes and develop improvements to safety, quality, and efficiency.Create standards and specifications for processes, facilities, products and tests.Assist in the establishment of timelines and budgets.Install, maintain, and inspect equipment and facilities.Perform routine calibration and troubleshooting of instruments.Provide training and mentorship to technical staff.Preferred candidate profile : Applied knowledge of analytical chemistry techniquesDemonstrated ability to solve highly technical problemsStrong technical writing abilityDirect experience with the use of spreadsheet and database software to compile, analyze, and present dataFamiliarity with process improvement methodologies (Six Sigma, lean manufacturing)Ability to execute tasks with minimal oversightExcellent presentation and verbal communication skills Education and Experience Requirements  Bachelors degree in chemical engineering or a related fieldMasters degree in chemical engineering or a related field desirableTen years experience in a production environmentProficiency with Microsoft Office (Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Project)Project management experience a plusPerks and benefits :PFYearly Bonus
jobDetail_html:
Role & responsibilities :


We are seeking a Chemical Engineer to join our team in Kharagpur. This role involves overseeing the construction of a new chemical plant and assisting in operational activities for an existing unit.

  • Oversee quality analysis and ensuring maintenance of quality of manufactured products.
  • Research, design, develop production processes to improve efficiency and decrease consumption
  • Analyse data to develop conclusions.
  • Communicate results of analysis and research.
  • Overseeing and conducting R&D
  • Evaluate current processes and develop improvements to safety, quality, and efficiency.
  • Create standards and specifications for processes, facilities, products and tests.
  • Assist in the establishment of timelines and budgets.
  • Install, maintain, and inspect equipment and facilities.
  • Perform routine calibration and troubleshooting of instruments.
  • Provide training and mentorship to technical staff.


Preferred candidate profile :

  • Applied knowledge of analytical chemistry techniques
  • Demonstrated ability to solve highly technical problems
  • Strong technical writing ability
  • Direct experience with the use of spreadsheet and database software to compile, analyze, and present data
  • Familiarity with process improvement methodologies (Six Sigma, lean manufacturing)
  • Ability to execute tasks with minimal oversight
  • Excellent presentation and verbal communication skills

Education and Experience Requirements

  • Bachelors degree in chemical engineering or a related field
  • Masters degree in chemical engineering or a related field desirable
  • Ten years experience in a production environment
  • Proficiency with Microsoft Office (Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Project)
  • Project management experience a plus

Perks and benefits :


  • PF
  • Yearly Bonus

jobDetail_text: We are seeking an experienced Infrastructure/DevOps Engineer to support, manage, and enhance our infrastructure and connectivity solutions. The ideal candidate will have a strong foundation in networking, system administration, and cloud services. Experience with Azure is a plus. This role requires a blend of technical skills and the ability to manage complex infrastructure projects with minimal supervision. This position requires full-time, in-office work in Indore. Key Responsibilities:  Design, deploy, and maintain network infrastructure, including LAN, public/private IP configurations, DNS, and Active Directory.  Manage on-premises and cloud infrastructure.  Configure, manage, and troubleshoot storage solutions.  Collaborate with IT, security, and development teams to ensure seamless integration and performance across systems.  Monitor and troubleshoot network connectivity, ensuring high availability and performance. Automate and streamline processes using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) and DevOps practices. Required Skills and Qualifications:  Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. 4-6 years of experience in infrastructure, network management, or DevOps engineering. Proficient in networking fundamentals, including LAN, IP configurations, DNS, and Active Directory.  Hands-on experience with operating systems (Windows and Linux) and network security protocols.  Strong coding/programming skills, with proficiency in languages such as Python, PowerShell, or Bash. • Experience with setting up and managing virtual networks and storage solutions.  Familiarity with scripting and automation tools (e.g., Terraform, Ansible). Strong communication, collaboration, and interpersonal skills.  Proven ability to work effectively as part of a team. Ability to troubleshoot complex connectivity issues and optimize network performance.  Preferred Skills:  Experience with Azure cloud services is a plus.  Certifications in Azure (e.g., Microsoft Certified: Azure Administrator Associate) are highly desirable.  Experience working in or supporting environments within the financial sector.  Familiarity with other cloud providers (AWS, GCP) and hybrid cloud solutions  The final offer being determined based on the candidate's skills, qualifications, and relevant experience.*CTC includes Fixed salary, Variable salary and other benefits (EPF, Gratuity,  Group Term insurance and Group Mediclaim)
jobDetail_html:
We are seeking an experienced Infrastructure/DevOps Engineer to support, manage, and enhance our infrastructure and connectivity solutions. The ideal candidate will have a strong foundation in networking, system administration, and cloud services. Experience with Azure is a plus. This role requires a blend of technical skills and the ability to manage complex infrastructure projects with minimal supervision. This position requires full-time, in-office work in Indore.


Key Responsibilities:


  • Design, deploy, and maintain network infrastructure, including LAN, public/private IP configurations, DNS, and Active Directory.
  • Manage on-premises and cloud infrastructure.
  • Configure, manage, and troubleshoot storage solutions.
  • Collaborate with IT, security, and development teams to ensure seamless integration and performance across systems.
  • Monitor and troubleshoot network connectivity, ensuring high availability and performance.
  • Automate and streamline processes using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) and DevOps practices.

Required Skills and Qualifications:


  • Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
  • 4-6 years of experience in infrastructure, network management, or DevOps engineering.
  • Proficient in networking fundamentals, including LAN, IP configurations, DNS, and Active Directory.
  • Hands-on experience with operating systems (Windows and Linux) and network security protocols.
  • Strong coding/programming skills, with proficiency in languages such as Python, PowerShell, or Bash. • Experience with setting up and managing virtual networks and storage solutions.
  • Familiarity with scripting and automation tools (e.g., Terraform, Ansible).
  • Strong communication, collaboration, and interpersonal skills.
  • Proven ability to work effectively as part of a team.
  • Ability to troubleshoot complex connectivity issues and optimize network performance.

Preferred Skills:


  • Experience with Azure cloud services is a plus.
  • Certifications in Azure (e.g., Microsoft Certified: Azure Administrator Associate) are highly desirable.
  • Experience working in or supporting environments within the financial sector.
  • Familiarity with other cloud providers (AWS, GCP) and hybrid cloud solutions

The final offer being determined based on the candidate's skills, qualifications, and relevant experience.

*CTC includes Fixed salary, Variable salary and other benefits (EPF, Gratuity,  Group Term insurance and Group Mediclaim)

KPR Global is a certification body that assesses and awards certifications to organizations that commit and conform to the applied standard requirements.
Our objective is to provide a reliable auditing and certification process for organizations to achieve International Organization for Standardization (ISO) certification and continual improvement.

Job Description


Job Title: Digital Marketing Executive

Location: Remote/ Work from Home

Experienced get first preference


Responsibilities:

  • Develop and execute digital marketing campaigns across various channels, including social media, email, YouTube and display advertising.
  • Manage and optimize social media accounts to increase engagement and brand awareness.
  • Create, curate, and manage high-quality content for websites, and social media platforms.

  • Familiar with video editing softwares and tools
  • Knowledge of email marketing.
  • Familiarity with content management systems (e.g., WordPress).

Salary Range: Based on experience and qualifications.

jobDetail_html:
Experience: 5+ years, preferably in PMKVY, DDU-GKY, NAPS or Skill India Mission


About the Role

We are seeking an experienced Functional Specialist with a proven track record in the social sector. The ideal candidate will bring their expertise to manage and streamline data-driven processes, collaborate with stakeholders, and ensure the successful implementation of critical programs.


Key Responsibilities

  • Oversee and manage data analysis and reporting for social sector projects.
  • Collaborate with Child Development Project Officers (CDPOs) across district centers to collect, verify, and analyze data.
  • Develop detailed reports, dashboards, and insights using MS Excel and other tools.
  • Work closely with cross-functional teams to align data processes with organizational goals.
  • Identify process gaps and recommend improvements to enhance program efficiency.
  • Ensure the accuracy and integrity of program-related databases.
  • Provide guidance and mentorship to team members on best practices in data management and reporting.

Qualifications and Skills

  • Experience:
  • A minimum of 5 years of relevant experience, preferably in the social sector or NGO-related roles (volunteer or full-time).
  • Strong experience in data management, reporting, and stakeholder coordination.
  • Understanding/Experience of various government schemes is a plus:
  • Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana (PMKVY)
  • Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Grameen Kaushalya Yojana (DDU-GKY)
  • National Apprenticeship Promotion Scheme (NAPS)
  • Skill India Mission

  • Technical Skills:
  • Proficiency in MS Excel (pivot tables, VLOOKUP, advanced formulas, and data visualization).
  • Familiarity with data management and reporting tools is advantageous.
  • Soft Skills:
  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills for effective stakeholder engagement.
  • Ability to work collaboratively within cross-functional teams.
  • Detail-oriented with a proactive problem-solving mindset.

Who Were Looking For

  • A dedicated professional looking for a stable, long-term role in the social sector.
  • Someone who thrives in a dynamic environment and is passionate about creating meaningful change.

What We Offer

  • A supportive and collaborative work culture.
  • Opportunities for professional growth and leadership.
  • The chance to contribute to impactful social initiatives.

How to Apply

Send your updated resume and a brief cover letter highlighting your experience to aastha@skillveda.ai


Join us in driving change and making a difference!

Industry

  • Education

Employment Type

Full-time

description: About AuxiaAuxia is pioneering the next era of marketing and growth, redefining how enterprises engage, activate, and retain customers through AI-driven automation. Todays companies spend millions on rigid, rule-based marketing and ad hoc experiments with limited ROI. Auxia’s platform replaces these manual processes with a fully autonomous, data-powered growth engine, continuously optimizing every customer interaction to deliver measurable impact. Join us as we transform the marketing landscape, empowering businesses to unlock their full potential through intelligent growth automation.

jobDetail_html:
About the role

We are seeking a highly motivated recruiter to join our fast-growing team as the first member of the recruitment team. The ideal candidate will have a knack for identifying and attracting top tech talent and will be comfortable orchestrating the end-to-end recruitment process.


Responsibilities

  • Source, screen, and interview candidates for various technical positions.
  • Develop and maintain a pipeline of potential candidates through proactive market research and ongoing relationship management.
  • Coordinate and manage the recruitment process, including job postings, application reviews, and interview scheduling.
  • Collaborate with hiring managers to understand their staffing needs and provide timely solutions.

Qualifications

  • 3+ years of experience in tech recruitment, ideally within a startup or fast-paced environment.
  • Strong understanding of various tech roles and the ability to identify suitable candidates.
  • Excellent organizational and multitasking abilities.
  • Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Proactive, self-motivated, and able to work independently.
  • MBA in Human Resources or a related field is preferred.

This role is required to be on-site at our office located at Marathahalli - Sarjapur Outer Ring Rd, Green Glen Layout, Bellandur, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560103.

jobDetail_html:
About the role

Auxia's first dedicated Business Operations specialist will set the foundation for our next phase of growth. You will be responsible for implementing processes to support hyperscaling across HR, finance, IT, and legal / compliance. You will also play a critical role in strategic planning as Auxia expands.


This dynamic role is ideal for candidates who want to gain exposure to a wide range of business-critical functions. It is a perfect opportunity for someone looking to build a breadth of experience at a high-growth startup.


Responsibilities

  • Develop and own scalable processes across back-office functions (HR, finance, legal, IT) to streamline operations
  • Coordinate company events, meetings, and team-building activities to foster a collaborative company culture
  • Monitor and manage vendor relationships, office supplies, and other administrative needs
  • Provide support for special projects, helping to develop and implement process improvements as Auxia scales
  • Act as a key point of contact for employees regarding HR and operational questions, ensuring a supportive and well-organized work environment
  • Work closely with the Chief of Staff, Finance Manager, Recruiter, and Office Administrator to prioritize and execute critical initiatives

Qualifications

  • 3+ years of experience in management consulting or business operations, preferably within a high-growth technology company; MBA is a plus
  • Excellent communication and organizational skills, with the ability to communicate to executive-level audiences
  • Detail-oriented and self-motivated, with a proven track record of designing and implementing new processes across functions
  • Strong organizational skills, with a proven ability to manage multiple priorities and meet deadlines

This role is required to be on-site at our office located at Marathahalli - Sarjapur Outer Ring Rd, Green Glen Layout, Bellandur, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560103.

designation: Web Developer (MERN Full Stack with TypeScript)
description: www.scgroup.globalwww.1source.global
about_html:
www.scgroup.global

www.1source.global
jobDetail_text: Job   Summary We are seeking a talented and motivated MERN Full Stack Developer with expertise in TypeScript to join our young team. The ideal candidate will have a passion for developing robust web applications and a solid understanding of modern web technologies. This role involves collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions that meet client and business needs.            Key Responsibilities      1. Full-Stack Development: Develop, test, and deploy scalable web applications using the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js,   Node.js) stack.   Write clean, maintainable, and reusable code in TypeScript for both front-end and back-end.      2. Front-End Development: Build dynamic user interfaces with React.js and TypeScript.   Ensure responsiveness and cross-browser compatibility.   Optimize front-end code for performance and scalability.     3. Back-End Development: Design and implement RESTful   APIs and server-side logic using Node.js and Express.js.   Manage databases effectively,   primarily MongoDB, ensuring optimal query performance.      4. Code Quality and Testing: Write unit and integration tests to ensure code reliability using tools like Jest, Mocha,   or similar.   Participate in code reviews to maintain high coding standards and best practices.      5. Collaboration and   Communication: Work closely with product managers, designers, and other developers to understand project requirements and deliverables.   Troubleshoot and debug application issues promptly.      6. Version Control and CI/CD: Use Git for version control and collaborate through pull requests.   Deploy and manage applications on cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or Heroku using CI/CD pipelines.            Required Skills and  Qualifications Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (or equivalent experience).   1-4 years of hands-on experience with MERN stack development.   Strong proficiency in TypeScript for both client-side and server-side development.   Solid understanding of front-end frameworks like React.js and its state management tools (e.g., Redux, Context API).   Proficiency in back-end frameworks like Express.js.   Experience with NoSQL databases, particularly MongoDB.   Familiarity with GraphQL is a plus.   Knowledge of web security best practices, authentication, and authorization techniques (e.g., OAuth, JWT).   Experience in using containerization tools like Docker is an advantage.   Familiarity with cloud platforms such as AWS, GCP, or Azure.            Soft Skills Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.   Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.   A proactive attitude with the ability to work independently and in a team.            Preferred Qualifications      Experience with serverless architectures or microservices.   Knowledge of additional front-end frameworks or libraries (e.g., Angular, Vue.js).   Familiarity with Agile development methodologies.
jobDetail_html:
Job Summary

We are seeking a talented and motivated MERN Full Stack Developer with expertise in TypeScript to join our young team. The ideal candidate will have a passion for developing robust web applications and a solid understanding of modern web technologies. This role involves collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions that meet client and business needs.


Key Responsibilities

1. Full-Stack Development: Develop, test, and deploy scalable web applications using the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) stack. Write clean, maintainable, and reusable code in TypeScript for both front-end and back-end.

2. Front-End Development: Build dynamic user interfaces with React.js and TypeScript. Ensure responsiveness and cross-browser compatibility. Optimize front-end code for performance and scalability.

3. Back-End Development: Design and implement RESTful APIs and server-side logic using Node.js and Express.js. Manage databases effectively, primarily MongoDB, ensuring optimal query performance.

4. Code Quality and Testing: Write unit and integration tests to ensure code reliability using tools like Jest, Mocha, or similar. Participate in code reviews to maintain high coding standards and best practices.

5. Collaboration and Communication: Work closely with product managers, designers, and other developers to understand project requirements and deliverables. Troubleshoot and debug application issues promptly.

6. Version Control and CI/CD: Use Git for version control and collaborate through pull requests. Deploy and manage applications on cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or Heroku using CI/CD pipelines.


Required Skills and Qualifications

Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (or equivalent experience). 1-4 years of hands-on experience with MERN stack development.

Strong proficiency in TypeScript for both client-side and server-side development.

Solid understanding of front-end frameworks like React.js and its state management tools (e.g., Redux, Context API).

Proficiency in back-end frameworks like Express.js. Experience with NoSQL databases, particularly MongoDB.

Familiarity with GraphQL is a plus. Knowledge of web security best practices, authentication, and authorization techniques (e.g., OAuth, JWT).

Experience in using containerization tools like Docker is an advantage. Familiarity with cloud platforms such as AWS, GCP, or Azure.


Soft Skills

Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.

Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.

A proactive attitude with the ability to work independently and in a team.


Preferred Qualifications

Experience with serverless architectures or microservices.

Knowledge of additional front-end frameworks or libraries (e.g., Angular, Vue.js).

Familiarity with Agile development methodologies.

jobDetail_text: Job Overview:We seek a dynamic and proactive ServiceNow Discovery Administrator to join our team. In this role, you will assume responsibility for the management and optimization of ServiceNow Discovery, ensuring the health of the CMDB and supporting platform users within a fast-paced, Agile environment. The ideal candidate will possess robust technical skills, experience with the Common Service Data Model (CSDM), and the ability to thrive in a high-demand, rapidly changing environment. We foster a collaborative and innovative environment where continuous learning and growth are encouraged. Key Responsibilities:ServiceNow Discovery Administration:Mature and expand the ServiceNow Discovery module to enhance data quality and improve CMDB accuracy.Administer and maintain MID Servers, ensuring reliable and efficient operation for ServiceNow Discovery and integrations.Manage updates, configurations, and enhancements for the Discovery process to align with business needs.Proactively identify opportunities to improve discovery and CMDB automation to enhance data completeness, correctness, and compliance.CMDB Health and Data Quality:Ensure the overall health of the CMDB utilizing tools such as the CMDB Health Dashboard, Data Certification, and the Identification and Reconciliation Engine (IRE).Enforce adherence to the Common Service Data Model (CSDM) to maintain standardized data practices.Oversee the creation and maintenance of relationships between IT services, applications, and infrastructure components within the CMDB.Development, Integrations, and Automation:Design, develop, and maintain scripts, scheduled jobs, business rules, and UI actions to support business requirements.Collaborate with team members to implement and maintain integrations utilizing APIs, Service Graph Connectors, and Integration Hub for streamlined data flow.Automate processes using ServiceNow's scripting tools to enhance efficiency and reduce manual effort.Agile Development and jobDetail_html:
Job Overview:
We seek a dynamic and proactive ServiceNow Discovery Administrator to join our team. In this role, you will assume responsibility for the management and optimization of ServiceNow Discovery, ensuring the health of the CMDB and supporting platform users within a fast-paced, Agile environment. The ideal candidate will possess robust technical skills, experience with the Common Service Data Model (CSDM), and the ability to thrive in a high-demand, rapidly changing environment. We foster a collaborative and innovative environment where continuous learning and growth are encouraged.

Key Responsibilities:

  • ServiceNow Discovery Administration:
    • Mature and expand the ServiceNow Discovery module to enhance data quality and improve CMDB accuracy.
    • Administer and maintain MID Servers, ensuring reliable and efficient operation for ServiceNow Discovery and integrations.
    • Manage updates, configurations, and enhancements for the Discovery process to align with business needs.
    • Proactively identify opportunities to improve discovery and CMDB automation to enhance data completeness, correctness, and compliance.
  • CMDB Health and Data Quality:
    • Ensure the overall health of the CMDB utilizing tools such as the CMDB Health Dashboard, Data Certification, and the Identification and Reconciliation Engine (IRE).
    • Enforce adherence to the Common Service Data Model (CSDM) to maintain standardized data practices.
    • Oversee the creation and maintenance of relationships between IT services, applications, and infrastructure components within the CMDB.
  • Development, Integrations, and Automation:
    • Design, develop, and maintain scripts, scheduled jobs, business rules, and UI actions to support business requirements.
    • Collaborate with team members to implement and maintain integrations utilizing APIs, Service Graph Connectors, and Integration Hub for streamlined data flow.
    • Automate processes using ServiceNow's scripting tools to enhance efficiency and reduce manual effort.
  • Agile Development and Platform Support:
    • Actively participate in Agile development processes, including sprint planning, user story creation, and backlog grooming.
    • Provide Level 2 & 3 support for the ServiceNow platform, resolving Discovery incidents and handling service requests in a fast-paced environment.
    • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop and deploy new features, custom applications, and enhancements.
  • Data Management and Reporting:
    • Load, manipulate, and maintain data within ServiceNow, ensuring high data integrity and reliability.
    • Utilize reporting tools to monitor platform performance and provide insights on CMDB health metrics and Discovery coverage.

Skills and Qualifications:

Experience:

  • Minimum of 2 years of hands-on experience administering ServiceNow Discovery in a fast-paced, Agile environment.
  • Proven experience with API integrations and Service Graph Connectors.
  • Experience with ServiceNow in a cloud environment (e.g., Azure, AWS).
  • Strong understanding of Agile methodologies and experience working in an Agile development lifecycle.

Technical Skills:

  • Proficient in JavaScript, PowerShell, and JSON.
  • Expertise in ServiceNow scripting and automation, including business rules, client scripts, and UI policies.
  • Solid understanding of Windows and Linux operating systems, including troubleshooting common issues.
  • Working knowledge of network concepts and protocols (TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP).
  • Familiarity with CSS and UI customization is a plus.

Certifications:

  • ITIL Foundation certification (preferred).
  • ServiceNow Certified System Administrator (CSA) (required).
  • ServiceNow Certified Application Developer (CAD) or Certified Implementation Specialist (CIS) (required).

Key Competencies:

  • Exceptional problem-solving skills with a proven ability to identify root causes, analyze complex situations, and implement effective solutions within ServiceNow Discovery.
  • Outstanding written and verbal communication skills with the ability to clearly explain technical concepts to both technical and non-technical audiences.
  • Adaptable and able to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
  • Detail-oriented with a focus on data quality and accuracy.

jobDetail_html:
Key Responsibilities

  • Design, develop, and optimize GUI applications for Linux and Ubuntu environments.
  • Integrate DSM (Data Structure Management) and Google Earth Maps API into applications.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to create user-friendly interfaces for aerospace and drone-related systems.
  • Implement real-time data visualization tools and controls tailored to system requirements.
  • Troubleshoot and enhance GUI performance, ensuring responsiveness and reliability.
  • Maintain and update software documentation related to GUI components.

Required Skills and Qualifications

  • Professional Experience: 2+ years of experience in developing GUIs for Linux-based systems.
  • Programming Languages: Proficiency in C++, Python, or JavaScript.
  • Frameworks/Tools: Experience with Qt, GTK, or similar GUI development frameworks.
  • Mapping Technologies: Hands-on experience with Google Earth Maps API and spatial data visualization.
  • Familiarity with DSM principles and implementation.
  • Strong understanding of Linux/Ubuntu operating systems.
  • Experience in real-time data handling and display.
  • Ability to write clean, modular, and well-documented code.
  • Familiarity with version control systems like Git.

Preferred Qualifications

  • Experience in drone-related projects.
  • Knowledge of OpenGL, Vulkan, or other graphics rendering technologies.
  • Background in developing GUIs for hardware systems or embedded devices.
  • Familiarity with communication protocols like MQTT, WebSocket, or HTTP & MAVLINK.

jobDetail_text: Job Overview:We are seeking an experienced React Front-End Architect to lead the design and development of modern, scalable, and high-performance web applications. The ideal candidate will have deep expertise in React.js, GraphQL, and testing frameworks, along with a strong understanding of front-end architecture and best practices. This role will also focus on performance optimization, accessibility, and team leadership, ensuring the delivery of world-class user experiences.Key Responsibilities:- Architecture and Development: Define and implement scalable and maintainable front-end architecture using React.js and modern technologies. Lead the development of reusable and modular components that align with product requirements. Optimize code for performance, scalability, and maintainability, leveraging tools like Web Vitals and React Profiler.- GraphQL and API Integration: Design efficient data integration strategies with GraphQL and RESTful APIs. Optimize GraphQL queries, caching, and error handling using tools like Apollo Client or Relay.- Testing and Quality Assurance: Implement comprehensive testing strategies using Playwright, Cypress, Jest, and React Testing Library. Establish CI/CD pipelines for automated testing and deployment workflows.- Team Leadership: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including backend engineers, designers, and product managers. Mentor and guide developers on front-end best practices, coding standards, and design patterns. Conduct code reviews to maintain high-quality standards and ensure consistency.- Performance and Accessibility: Optimize application performance, including rendering speed, bundle size, and resource management. Ensure compliance with WCAG standards and implement accessibility best practices using tools like axe-core.- Emerging Technologies and Best Practices: Stay updated with the latest trends in React, GraphQL, testing frameworks, and front-end tools. Evaluate and recommend new technologies and methodologies to enhance the development process.Required Qualifications:Technical Skills:- 8+ years of front-end development experience, with at least 3 years in a lead or architect role.- Advanced proficiency in React.js, TypeScript, and modern JavaScript (ES6+).- Strong expertise in GraphQL, including queries, mutations, and subscriptions.- Proficiency in testing tools like Playwright, Jest, Cypress, and React Testing Library.- Experience with modern state management libraries (e.g., Redux, Recoil, Zustand).- Expertise in front-end build tools like Webpack, Vite, or esbuild.- Solid understanding of Progressive Web Apps (PWAs), Service Workers, and offline-first designs.Soft Skills:- Strong problem-solving abilities with a focus on user-centric solutions.- Excellent communication and collaboration skills.- Proven ability to mentor and lead technical teams.Preferred Qualifications:- Experience with Next.js or other React frameworks.- Knowledge of micro-frontend architecture and monorepo management tools like Nx or Lerna.- Familiarity with CSS-in-JS libraries (Styled Components, Emotion) or Tailwind CSS.- Exposure to containerization and deployment tools like Docker and Kubernetes.- Experience in performance monitoring tools such as Lighthouse or New Relic.- Proficiency in multilingual application support with tools like i18next or react-intl.What We Offer:- Competitive salary and benefits package.- Flexible working hours and remote work options.- A collaborative, innovative, and inclusive work environment.- Opportunities for professional growth and learning.
jobDetail_html:
Job Overview:

We are seeking an experienced React Front-End Architect to lead the design and development of modern, scalable, and high-performance web applications. The ideal candidate will have deep expertise in React.js, GraphQL, and testing frameworks, along with a strong understanding of front-end architecture and best practices. This role will also focus on performance optimization, accessibility, and team leadership, ensuring the delivery of world-class user experiences.

Key Responsibilities:

- Architecture and Development: Define and implement scalable and maintainable front-end architecture using React.js and modern technologies. Lead the development of reusable and modular components that align with product requirements. Optimize code for performance, scalability, and maintainability, leveraging tools like Web Vitals and React Profiler.

- GraphQL and API Integration: Design efficient data integration strategies with GraphQL and RESTful APIs. Optimize GraphQL queries, caching, and error handling using tools like Apollo Client or Relay.

- Testing and Quality Assurance: Implement comprehensive testing strategies using Playwright, Cypress, Jest, and React Testing Library. Establish CI/CD pipelines for automated testing and deployment workflows.

- Team Leadership: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including backend engineers, designers, and product managers. Mentor and guide developers on front-end best practices, coding standards, and design patterns. Conduct code reviews to maintain high-quality standards and ensure consistency.

- Performance and Accessibility: Optimize application performance, including rendering speed, bundle size, and resource management. Ensure compliance with WCAG standards and implement accessibility best practices using tools like axe-core.

- Emerging Technologies and Best Practices: Stay updated with the latest trends in React, GraphQL, testing frameworks, and front-end tools. Evaluate and recommend new technologies and methodologies to enhance the development process.

Required Qualifications:

Technical Skills:

- 8+ years of front-end development experience, with at least 3 years in a lead or architect role.

- Advanced proficiency in React.js, TypeScript, and modern JavaScript (ES6+).

- Strong expertise in GraphQL, including queries, mutations, and subscriptions.

- Proficiency in testing tools like Playwright, Jest, Cypress, and React Testing Library.

- Experience with modern state management libraries (e.g., Redux, Recoil, Zustand).

- Expertise in front-end build tools like Webpack, Vite, or esbuild.

- Solid understanding of Progressive Web Apps (PWAs), Service Workers, and offline-first designs.

Soft Skills:

- Strong problem-solving abilities with a focus on user-centric solutions.

- Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

- Proven ability to mentor and lead technical teams.

Preferred Qualifications:

- Experience with Next.js or other React frameworks.

- Knowledge of micro-frontend architecture and monorepo management tools like Nx or Lerna.

- Familiarity with CSS-in-JS libraries (Styled Components, Emotion) or Tailwind CSS.

- Exposure to containerization and deployment tools like Docker and Kubernetes.

- Experience in performance monitoring tools such as Lighthouse or New Relic.

- Proficiency in multilingual application support with tools like i18next or react-intl.

What We Offer:
