jobDetail_html:
Role & responsibilities

- Develop, test, and maintain Java applications and solutions based on business requirements.

- Apply mathematical concepts and algorithms to solve complex problems and optimize code performance.

- Collaborate with other developers and team members to design and integrate new features.

- Participate in the full software development lifecycle, from planning to deployment and ongoing maintenance.

- Ensure that the developed code is clean, maintainable, and efficient, with a focus on best practices.

- Troubleshoot, debug, and optimize performance issues within Java-based applications.

- Write technical documentation and ensure that code is well-commented and easy to understand.

- Continuously stay updated on the latest industry trends, tools, and technologies in Java development.

- Work with other teams, including QA, product management, and DevOps, to ensure timely delivery of projects.

- Participate in code reviews and contribute to process improvements for better development practices.



Preferred candidate profile


- 3+ years of professional experience as a Java Developer (Mandatory).

- Strong knowledge of Java programming and frameworks (e.g., Spring, Hibernate, J2EE).

- Excellent mathematical skills, including a solid understanding of algorithms, data structures, and computational theory.

- Experience with object-oriented programming (OOP) and design patterns.

- Strong understanding of SQL and relational databases (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL).

- Familiarity with multithreading, parallel processing, and optimizing performance for high-traffic applications.

- Knowledge of unit testing frameworks (e.g., JUnit, Mockito).

- Experience with version control tools, such as Git.

- Ability to write efficient, reusable, and modular code.

- Good problem-solving skills and the ability to work in a collaborative, fast-paced environment.

- Excellent communication skills and the ability to explain complex technical concepts clearly.


Bonus Skills:

- Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud, Azure).

- Experience with front-end technologies or frameworks (e.g., JavaScript, React, Angular).

- Familiarity with Agile development methodologies (e.g., Scrum).

- Experience with CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices.


Perks and benefits


As Per Industry Standard.



Note: Preferred Immediate Joiners or 15 Days Notice Period.

jobDetail_html:
1. Operational Management

  • Oversee day-to-day plant operations, ensuring optimal production efficiency and output.
  • Develop and implement production schedules to meet business targets.
  • Monitor plant performance through Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) like production rates, yield, and downtime.
  • Ensure compliance with standard operating procedures (SOPs) and process controls.

2. Leadership and Team Management

  • Lead, train, and motivate plant staff, including engineers, technicians, and operators.
  • Build and maintain a high-performance team culture with a focus on safety, quality, and efficiency.
  • Delegate responsibilities effectively and ensure alignment with organizational goals.
  • Handle team conflicts and ensure employee satisfaction and engagement.

3. Safety and Environmental Compliance

  • Enforce safety standards and procedures to minimize risks of accidents and ensure a safe working environment.
  • Conduct safety audits, drills, and risk assessments regularly.
  • Ensure the plant complies with all health, safety, and environmental regulations (e.g., OSHA, EPA, local regulatory bodies).
  • Manage hazardous materials and ensure proper storage, handling, and disposal.

4. Quality Assurance and Control

  • Ensure all products meet established quality standards and customer requirements.
  • Oversee the implementation of quality management systems (ISO, Six Sigma, etc.).
  • Address quality issues promptly and implement corrective and preventive measures.
  • Collaborate with the Quality Assurance (QA) team to ensure consistency in processes and products.

5. Maintenance and Equipment Management

  • Ensure preventive and corrective maintenance schedules are adhered to for machinery and infrastructure.
  • Plan for equipment upgrades, replacements, or modifications to enhance plant efficiency.
  • Minimize downtime through effective maintenance and troubleshooting strategies.
  • Coordinate with the engineering team to manage technical challenges.

6. Production Planning and Inventory Management

  • Optimize resource utilization, including raw materials, energy, and manpower.
  • Coordinate with supply chain and procurement teams to ensure availability of raw materials.
  • Monitor inventory levels to prevent stockouts or overstocking.
  • Balance production schedules with market demand forecasts.

7. Financial and Budgetary Oversight

  • Prepare and manage the plants annual budget and operational costs.
  • Identify and implement cost-saving initiatives without compromising quality or safety.
  • Provide regular financial and performance reports to senior management.
  • Track operational expenditures and ensure adherence to financial targets.

jobDetail_html:
Role & responsibilities

- Front-End Development: Build and optimize user-facing applications using React.js with responsive, high-performance UI components.

- Back-End Development: Design, develop, and maintain scalable Node.js APIs and microservices.

-Front-End Proficiency: Strong knowledge of React.js, including component lifecycle, state

management (e.g., Redux), and modern hooks.

- Back-End Expertise: Experience in developing APIs and server-side applications using Node.js

and Express.js.

- Integration: Collaborate with front-end and back-end teams to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic.

- Optimization: Ensure application performance, scalability, and security.

- Debugging: Troubleshoot and resolve issues across the stack in a timely manner.

-Collaboration: Work closely with designers, product managers, and other developers to create seamless user experiences.

- Version Control: Manage and maintain code repositories using Git.

- Database Management: Familiarity with databases such as MongoDB, PostgreSQL, or MySQL,

including query optimization.

- RESTful APIs: Experience in building and consuming APIs.

- Version Control: Proficient in Git and working with collaborative repositories (e.g., GitHub).

- Modern Development Practices: Knowledge of agile development processes, CI/CD pipelines, and containerization tools like Docker is a plus.

- Testing Frameworks: Experience with testing tools like Jest, Mocha, or Cypress.

- Problem Solving: Strong debugging and problem-solving skills with an understanding of software

design principles.

- Responsive Design: Familiarity with HTML, CSS, and tools like Tailwind CSS or Bootstrap for

responsive design.

- Stay Updated: Keep up-to-date with emerging technologies and implement best practices in React and Node.js development.



Preferred candidate profile

As a React and Node.js Developer, you will be responsible for developing modern, user-friendly applications aligned with the company's objectives and industry standards. The ideal candidate should have a strong foundation in full-stack development, the ability to work independently, and a proactive attitude toward learning and improvement. The candidate should have excellent time management, organizational, and communication skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively in a team.

Previous Work Experience: At least 2-3 years of experience in React and Node.js development, preferably in the e-commerce field.

Language: The candidate should be able to communicate in English/Punjabi/Hindi




Perks and benefits

As per market standards

about_html:
Job Title: Gen AI- Associate Frontend & Backend Developer(US Client) - Expertise in Node.Js/Python/Angular/React

Location: Remote

Position Type: Full-time

Experience: 6 to 8 Years

Budget: 15 PA-30 LPA

Notice Period: Immediate Joiners preferred

About Us: Multiplier AI is India's top healthcare AI firm going for an IPO. This position is for USA-Client. Our clientele includes Abbott, Cipla, Sun Pharma, Glenmark, and Galderma. Our AI-driven products help pharma companies optimize their operations, enhance decision-making, and drive growth.

Job Title: Gen AI - Associate Angular/React Frontend Developer

Job Description:

This opportunity is about working on cutting edge Generative AI projects for life sciences. We are seeking an experienced Senior Angular/React Frontend Developer with 6-7 years of expertise in crafting responsive and intuitive user interfaces using ReactJS or Angular 12 and above. The ideal candidate should have a strong foundation in HTML, JavaScript, API integration, and a keen eye for creating seamless and visually appealing designs.

Responsibilities:

  1. Develop and maintain scalable, high-performance web applications using React or Angular 12 and above.
  2. Implement responsive designs, ensuring an optimal user experience across various devices and screen sizes.
  3. Collaborate with backend developers to integrate API endpoints and ensure seamless data flow between the frontend and backend.
  4. Work closely with UX/UI designers to implement visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces.
  5. Write clean, modular, and maintainable code following best practices and coding standards.
  6. Conduct thorough testing of applications to ensure functionality, performance, and compatibility across browsers.
  7. Stay updated with the latest Angular/React releases and industry trends, incorporating new features and best practices into development processes.
  8. Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to frontend functionality, performance, and user experience.
  9. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand project requirements and deliver high-quality solutions on time.
  10. Mentor and guide junior developers, promoting a collaborative and innovative development environment.

Qualifications:

  1. Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field.
  2. Proven experience as a Frontend Developer with 6-7 years of hands-on experience in Angular/React development.
  3. Proficient in HTML, JavaScript, and CSS.
  4. Strong knowledge of Angular 12 and above, including components, services, and dependency injection.
  5. Experience in API integration, ensuring seamless communication between frontend and backend systems.
  6. Expertise in responsive design principles and implementation.
  7. Familiarity with version control systems, especially Git.
  8. Solid understanding of browser developer tools for debugging and optimizing frontend performance.
  9. Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  10. Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

If you are a dedicated and skilled Angular/React Frontend Developer eager to contribute to innovative projects, we invite you to apply and become a valuable member of our dynamic development team.

Job Title-2: Gen AI - Senior Nodejs Developer

Job Summary:

We are looking for a highly skilled and experienced Senior Nodejs Developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing high-performance, scalable applications using Node.js. As a senior developer, you will also mentor junior developers, lead development efforts, and collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to design and implement new features.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Lead the design, development, and deployment of web applications using Nodejs.
  • Architect and implement scalable, maintainable, and high-performance solutions.
  • Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other developers to define software requirements and system architecture.
  • Optimize applications for maximum speed, scalability, and security.
  • Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.
  • Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code following best practices.
  • Conduct code reviews, provide feedback, and mentor junior developers.
  • Troubleshoot and debug complex issues, providing timely solutions.
  • Implement RESTful APIs and work with databases both SQL and NoSql to ensure smooth integration.
  • Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and frameworks, proposing improvements as necessary.

Requirements:

  • Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
  • Strong proficiency in JavaScript (ES6+), HTML5, and CSS3.
  • Extensive experience in building and maintaining RESTful APIs.
  • Hands-on experience with version control systems like Git.
  • Proficiency in cloud services (e.g., AWS, Azure) and containerization (Docker).
  • Knowledge of database management, including experience with NoSQL (MongoDB) and relational databases such as PostgreSQL and Oracle.
  • Experience with Agile development methodologies.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Excellent communication and teamwork skills.

Job Title: Python Web Developer

Job Description:

This opportunity is about working on cutting edge Generative AI projects for life sciences. We are looking for a Python Web Developer responsible for managing the interchange of data between the server and the users. Your primary focus will be the development of all server-side logic, ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the front-end. You will also be responsible for integrating the front-end elements built by your co-workers into the application; therefore, a basic understanding of front-end technologies is necessary as well.

Skills and Qualifications:

  • Work experience as a Python web Developer
  • Expertise in Python framework such as FastAPI and Streamlit.
  • Knowledge of object-relational mapping (ORM) such as SqlAlchemy.
  • Strong knowledge of database technologies like SQL and NoSQL.
  • Able to write complex SQL/NoSQL queries.
  • Basic knowledge on Gen Ai(LLM) , vector database, embeddings etc
  • Experience working with containerised applications like docker.
  • Experience working in AWS cloud environment.
  • Knowledge of user authentication and authorization between multiple systems, servers, and environments
  • Basic understanding of front-end technologies, such as JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3
  • Understanding of the threading limitations of Python, and multi-process architecture
  • Understanding of fundamental design principles behind a scalable application
  • Familiarity with event-driven programming in Python
  • Able to create database schemas that represent and support business processes
  • Strong unit test and debugging skills
  • Proficient understanding of code versioning tools such as GIT
  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

Responsibilities:

  • Writing reusable, testable, and efficient code
  • Design and implementation of low-latency, high-availability, and performant applications
  • Developing back-end components to improve responsiveness and overall performance
  • Test and debug programs
  • Integration of user-facing elements developed by front-end developers with server-side logic.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand project requirements and deliver high-quality solutions on time.
  • Mentor and guide junior developers, promoting a collaborative and innovative development environment.

Job Title: Gen AI- Associate Frontend & Backend Developer(US Client) - Expertise in Node.Js/Python/Angular/React

Location: Remote

Position Type: Full-time

Experience: 6 to 8 Years

Budget: 15 PA-30 LPA

Notice Period: Immediate Joiners preferred

About Us: Multiplier AI is India's top healthcare AI firm going for an IPO. This position is for USA-Client. Our clientele includes Abbott, Cipla, Sun Pharma, Glenmark, and Galderma. Our AI-driven products help pharma companies optimize their operations, enhance decision-making, and drive growth.

Job Title: Gen AI - Associate Angular/React Frontend Developer

Job Description:

This opportunity is about working on cutting edge Generative AI projects for life sciences. We are seeking an experienced Senior Angular/React Frontend Developer with 6-7 years of expertise in crafting responsive and intuitive user interfaces using ReactJS or Angular 12 and above. The ideal candidate should have a strong foundation in HTML, JavaScript, API integration, and a keen eye for creating seamless and visually appealing designs.

Responsibilities:

  1. Develop and maintain scalable, high-performance web applications using React or Angular 12 and above.
  2. Implement responsive designs, ensuring an optimal user experience across various devices and screen sizes.
  3. Collaborate with backend developers to integrate API endpoints and ensure seamless data flow between the frontend and backend.
  4. Work closely with UX/UI designers to implement visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces.
  5. Write clean, modular, and maintainable code following best practices and coding standards.
  6. Conduct thorough testing of applications to ensure functionality, performance, and compatibility across browsers.
  7. Stay updated with the latest Angular/React releases and industry trends, incorporating new features and best practices into development processes.
  8. Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to frontend functionality, performance, and user experience.
  9. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand project requirements and deliver high-quality solutions on time.
  10. Mentor and guide junior developers, promoting a collaborative and innovative development environment.

Qualifications:

  1. Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field.
  2. Proven experience as a Frontend Developer with 6-7 years of hands-on experience in Angular/React development.
  3. Proficient in HTML, JavaScript, and CSS.
  4. Strong knowledge of Angular 12 and above, including components, services, and dependency injection.
  5. Experience in API integration, ensuring seamless communication between frontend and backend systems.
  6. Expertise in responsive design principles and implementation.
  7. Familiarity with version control systems, especially Git.
  8. Solid understanding of browser developer tools for debugging and optimizing frontend performance.
  9. Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  10. Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

If you are a dedicated and skilled Angular/React Frontend Developer eager to contribute to innovative projects, we invite you to apply and become a valuable member of our dynamic development team.

Job Title-2: Gen AI - Senior Nodejs Developer

Job Summary:

We are looking for a highly skilled and experienced Senior Nodejs Developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing high-performance, scalable applications using Node.js. As a senior developer, you will also mentor junior developers, lead development efforts, and collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to design and implement new features.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Lead the design, development, and deployment of web applications using Nodejs.
  • Architect and implement scalable, maintainable, and high-performance solutions.
  • Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other developers to define software requirements and system architecture.
  • Optimize applications for maximum speed, scalability, and security.
  • Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.
  • Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code following best practices.
  • Conduct code reviews, provide feedback, and mentor junior developers.
  • Troubleshoot and debug complex issues, providing timely solutions.
  • Implement RESTful APIs and work with databases both SQL and NoSql to ensure smooth integration.
  • Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and frameworks, proposing improvements as necessary.

Requirements:

  • Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
  • Strong proficiency in JavaScript (ES6+), HTML5, and CSS3.
  • Extensive experience in building and maintaining RESTful APIs.
  • Hands-on experience with version control systems like Git.
  • Proficiency in cloud services (e.g., AWS, Azure) and containerization (Docker).
  • Knowledge of database management, including experience with NoSQL (MongoDB) and relational databases such as PostgreSQL and Oracle.
  • Experience with Agile development methodologies.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Excellent communication and teamwork skills.

  • Basic understanding of front-end technologies, such as JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3
  • Understanding of the threading limitations of Python, and multi-process architecture
  • Understanding of fundamental design principles behind a scalable application
  • Familiarity with event-driven programming in Python
  • Able to create database schemas that represent and support business processes
  • Strong unit test and debugging skills
  • Proficient understanding of code versioning tools such as GIT
  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

jobDetail_text: Key Responsibilities:Financial Reporting: Prepare, review, and ensure accuracy of monthly, quarterly, and annual financial statements, in compliance with US GAAP.Budgeting & Forecasting: Lead the budgeting process, conduct variance analysis, and develop long-term financial plans.Cash Flow Management: Monitor and manage cash flow to ensure the company maintains adequate liquidity to meet its obligations.Financial Analysis: Analyse financial performance, providing actionable insights and recommendations to enhance profitability and cost-efficiency.Compliance & Audits: Ensure adherence to local, national, and federal regulations. Coordinate external audits and review audit schedules for all entities.General Ledger Management: Oversee daily accounting activities, including accounts payable, accounts receivable, and payroll functions.Tax Compliance: Assist in the preparation and filing of tax returns, ensuring timely payments for all subsidiaries and entities.Process Improvement: Identify and implement opportunities to streamline and enhance financial processes and systems.Investor Reports: Prepare and deliver customized reports to investors on a quarterly/ annual/periodic basis as requested.Contract Management: Draft, review, and negotiate contracts with consultants, clients, partners, and vendors,      ensuring alignment with business objectives.Insurance Management: Review policies, coverage, and facilitate timely renewals for all entities and subsidiaries.Transfer Pricing Studies: Coordinate with third party service providers to prepare comprehensive transfer pricing studies to ensure compliance with local and international tax laws.Bookkeeping & Accounting Management: Manage relationships with third-party accounting and bookkeeping service providers, ensuring effective communication and coordination.Human Resources: Oversee basic HR functions as needed.Legal Activities: Oversee basic legal functions by collaborating closely with the local team to ensure compliance and address legal matters effectively.Due Diligence & Acquisition Reporting: Prepare essential reports for due diligence during the acquisition process, ensuring thorough analysis and documentation. Preferred candidate profile  Qualifications: CA certification is mandatory; a bachelor's degree in finance, accounting, or a related field is preferred.Experience: 2-5 years of experience in financial management or accounting.Technical Skills: Proficiency in QuickBooks, Microsoft Excel, and financial reporting standards (GAAP).Analytical Skills: Strong analytical, problem-solving, and attention-to-detail skills.Communication: Excellent communication, interpersonal, and organizational skills.Collaboration: Ability to work effectively with employees at all levels, as well as with management and external agencies.Independence: Ability to operate independently with minimal direction from the CFO or senior management. Perks and benefits  Competitive compensation package.Opportunities for professional development and growth.Flexible work environment.
jobDetail_html:
Key Responsibilities:

  • Financial Reporting: Prepare, review, and ensure accuracy of monthly, quarterly, and annual financial statements, in compliance with US GAAP.
  • Budgeting & Forecasting: Lead the budgeting process, conduct variance analysis, and develop long-term financial plans.
  • Cash Flow Management: Monitor and manage cash flow to ensure the company maintains adequate liquidity to meet its obligations.
  • Financial Analysis: Analyse financial performance, providing actionable insights and recommendations to enhance profitability and cost-efficiency.
  • Compliance & Audits: Ensure adherence to local, national, and federal regulations. Coordinate external audits and review audit schedules for all entities.
  • General Ledger Management: Oversee daily accounting activities, including accounts payable, accounts receivable, and payroll functions.
  • Tax Compliance: Assist in the preparation and filing of tax returns, ensuring timely payments for all subsidiaries and entities.
  • Process Improvement: Identify and implement opportunities to streamline and enhance financial processes and systems.
  • Investor Reports: Prepare and deliver customized reports to investors on a quarterly/ annual/periodic basis as requested.
  • Contract Management: Draft, review, and negotiate contracts with consultants, clients, partners, and vendors, ensuring alignment with business objectives.
  • Insurance Management: Review policies, coverage, and facilitate timely renewals for all entities and subsidiaries.
  • Transfer Pricing Studies: Coordinate with third party service providers to prepare comprehensive transfer pricing studies to ensure compliance with local and international tax laws.
  • Bookkeeping & Accounting Management: Manage relationships with third-party accounting and bookkeeping service providers, ensuring effective communication and coordination.
  • Human Resources: Oversee basic HR functions as needed.
  • Legal Activities: Oversee basic legal functions by collaborating closely with the local team to ensure compliance and address legal matters effectively.
  • Due Diligence & Acquisition Reporting: Prepare essential reports for due diligence during the acquisition process, ensuring thorough analysis and documentation.

Preferred candidate profile

  • Qualifications: CA certification is mandatory; a bachelor's degree in finance, accounting, or a related field is preferred.
  • Experience: 2-5 years of experience in financial management or accounting.
  • Technical Skills: Proficiency in QuickBooks, Microsoft Excel, and financial reporting standards (GAAP).
  • Analytical Skills: Strong analytical, problem-solving, and attention-to-detail skills.
  • Communication: Excellent communication, interpersonal, and organizational skills.
  • Collaboration: Ability to work effectively with employees at all levels, as well as with management and external agencies.

Independence: Ability to operate independently with minimal direction from the CFO or senior management.


Perks and benefits

  • Competitive compensation package.
  • Opportunities for professional development and growth.
  • Flexible work environment.

name: Tribal Solutions Consulting Services
description: At Tribal Solutions Consulting Services(TSCS Global), we specialize in delivering innovative, tailored IT solutions that help businesses thrive in todays competitive digital landscape. Our mission is to drive growth through strategic technology, ensuring optimized performance and operational excellence.  We offer expertise across key areas:  Cloud Solutions: Seamless cloud integration, migration, and management for agility, scalability, and security. IT Infrastructure Management: Proactive monitoring and management of IT systems to ensure optimal uptime and performance. Cybersecurity: Advanced threat detection, risk assessment, and real-time monitoring to safeguard digital assets. Data Analytics & Business Intelligence: Harnessing data to provide actionable insights for informed, data-driven decisions. ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning): Streamlined ERP solutions to optimize resources, improve collaboration, and drive operational efficiency. Application Development & Modernization: Custom, scalable application development alongside modernization of legacy systems. Consulting Services: Strategic IT consulting to align technology with business goals and achieve long-term success. At TSCS, we focus on building long-term client partnerships by delivering high-quality solutions tailored to individual business needs. Through a collaborative approach, we ensure technology empowers businesses to innovate, grow, and lead in their respective industries.

jobDetail_html:
Role & responsibilities

Job Title: SAP ABAP Consultant

Location: Client Location( PAN INDIA)

Experience Level: 5+ Years

Notice Period: Immediate joiners, max 15 days notice period

Salary Range: 15 LPA to 18 LPA


Preferred candidate profile


  • Participate in S/4HANA implementation projects and deliver high-quality ABAP development solutions.
  • Design and develop technical specifications (TechSpecs) and implement solutions independently.
  • Provide hands-on ABAP development expertise across at least 3 of the WRICEF components:
  • Collaborate closely with functional teams to ensure seamless integration and effective solution delivery.
  • Manage and mentor 1-2 junior team members, guiding them through development tasks and supporting their professional growth.
  • Conduct technical reviews and ensure adherence to SAP best practices and standards.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve issues, ensuring system performance and reliability.

Required Qualifications:

  • Minimum of 5+ years of relevant experience in SAP ABAP development.
  • Proven expertise in S/4HANA implementations (mandatory).

Preferred Skills:

  • SAP certifications in ABAP or S/4HANA development.
  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Experience working in a client-facing role.

Our core objective is to service the customer with long lasting furnishing products at great value in a transparent, compassionate and honest manner. At Furnishka, we bring together the best designs in home furnishing from across India that suit the requirements of an Indian household. jobDetail_html:
Role & responsibilities


Furnishka - A high-growth start up is seeking an experienced and professional Finance Manager to join our team.

This position will play a key role in the organizations Accounts and compliances, month close

activities and reporting. The Finance Manager will have to work closely with the founders and make

sure the books are maintained accurately and on time.

Fresh Chartered accountant or a CA with 2-5 years pf experience, should be very strong in accounts.


Job Description

  • Manage the entire accounts and finance function for the organization
  • Revenue recognition, Deferred revenue and accrued revenue working and reconciliation with

invoicing

  • Vendor management, reconciliations and timely payments
  • All compliances, including GST returns, TDS returns, Internal & Statutory audit.
  • Preparing monthly MIS in time bound manner (within 7 days)
  • Variance analysis
  • Build and Manage team, training of team members
  • Should be able to handle secretarial matters


Preferred candidate profile

Candidates with Big 4 experience, articles ship in Big 4, will be given preference.


  • Willing to work with in a Series funded start up and build solid SOPs and execute them on

ground.

  • Excellent analytical ability
  • Good verbal and written communication skills as the candidate will need to coordinate with

various operation team members

  • Willing to work hard as the reporting activities are timebound and reporting to board and

investors is critical

  • Team Player
  • Proficiency in excel is a must
  • Experience in manufacturing will be added advantage



Perks and benefits

jobDetail_html:
REMOTE WORK: We are currently seeking talented and driven Dynamics CE (Customer Engagement) and FO (Finance & Operations) Consultants to join our expanding team. The ideal candidates will be experts in Microsoft Dynamics CE and/or FO, with a passion for delivering customized solutions that drive business efficiency and growth.


Collaborate with clients to understand business needs and translate them into system requirements.

- Implement and configure Dynamics CE or FO solutions, tailoring features to align with specific business processes.

- Provide strategic guidance and end-to-end support for deployments, upgrades, and enhancements.

- Develop documentation, training materials, and user guides to facilitate user adoption.

- Work closely with project managers and technical teams to ensure on-time delivery of projects.

- Conduct system testing and provide technical support for ongoing client needs.

- Stay current with Microsoft Dynamics updates and advancements, ensuring solutions are in line with best practices. Role & responsibilities


Responsibilities:


- Collaborate with clients to understand business needs and translate them into system requirements.

- Implement and configure Dynamics CE or FO solutions, tailoring features to align with specific business processes.

- Provide strategic guidance and end-to-end support for deployments, upgrades, and enhancements.

- Develop documentation, training materials, and user guides to facilitate user adoption.

- Work closely with project managers and technical teams to ensure on-time delivery of projects.

- Conduct system testing and provide technical support for ongoing client needs.

- Stay current with Microsoft Dynamics updates and advancements, ensuring solutions are in line with best practices.



Preferred candidate profile

- Experience: Minimum 3+ years working with Microsoft Dynamics CE and/or FO.

- Skills: Strong understanding of Dynamics customization, workflow automation, integration, and data migration.

- Technical Proficiency: Familiarity with Power Platform, Azure services, and data analysis tools.

- Problem-Solving: Proven ability to troubleshoot complex issues and offer practical solutions.

- Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with a customer-centric approach


Perks and benefits

- Competitive salary and benefits package.

- Opportunities for professional development and certification training.

- Work on diverse and challenging projects with a team of experts.

- Collaborative and innovative work environment.


How to Apply:

Submit your resume and a cover letter detailing your experience with Dynamics CE and/or FO to careers@azhasystems.com. We look forward to hearing from you!

AZHA SYSTEMS is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

jobDetail_text: Key Responsibilities:Communicate effectively with international      team members and clients to foster strong relationships and facilitate      successful implementations.Quickly understand client business      processes and articulate how our technology solutions can enhance these      processes.Address and manage customer concerns by      providing appropriate solutions and alternatives within designated      timeframes, and follow up to ensure complete resolution.Identify workarounds for technical issues      and effectively communicate these solutions to clients.Maintain accurate records of customer      interactions through detailed documentation.Collaborate with technical teams to ensure      a clear understanding of client requirements and successful implementation      of solutions.Be willing to work in shifts to      accommodate client needs across different time zones.Qualifications:Bachelors or Master’s degree in Computer      Science, Information Technology, or related computer-related disciplines.3-5 years of relevant experience in      medium-scale technology solution delivery engagements.Excellent verbal and written communication      skills in English, with the ability to articulate complex technical      concepts clearly and concisely.Demonstrated ability to work effectively      both independently and as part of a virtual team.Other Details:Immediate joining required.Work from home arrangement available.Interviews will be conducted virtually.
jobDetail_html:
Key Responsibilities:

  • Communicate effectively with international team members and clients to foster strong relationships and facilitate successful implementations.
  • Quickly understand client business processes and articulate how our technology solutions can enhance these processes.
  • Address and manage customer concerns by providing appropriate solutions and alternatives within designated timeframes, and follow up to ensure complete resolution.
  • Identify workarounds for technical issues and effectively communicate these solutions to clients.
  • Maintain accurate records of customer interactions through detailed documentation.
  • Collaborate with technical teams to ensure a clear understanding of client requirements and successful implementation of solutions.
  • Be willing to work in shifts to accommodate client needs across different time zones.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelors or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related computer-related disciplines.
  • 3-5 years of relevant experience in medium-scale technology solution delivery engagements.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English, with the ability to articulate complex technical concepts clearly and concisely.
  • Demonstrated ability to work effectively both independently and as part of a virtual team.

Other Details:

  • Immediate joining required.
  • Work from home arrangement available.
  • Interviews will be conducted virtually.

jobDetail_html:
Job Title: URGENT Opening| Business Development|0 -2Y Exp| Noida 63|Upto 4 LPA|
Location: Green Pista Labs LLP, B-4, Sector 63, Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201301
Employment Type: Full-Time, Work From Office

Salary: 2.5 to 4.0 LPA.


About Green Pista Labs LLP:

GreenPista is a groundbreaking e-commerce marketplace application with unique barter system incorporating globally patented technology (awaiting), revolutionizing your perception of Indian currency. Our application with an advanced AI system can scan Indian legal tender notes, and reveal hidden links to other significant life moments or historical events globally for 100 years. Were seeking a highly motivated and skilled business development executive to join our fast-growing team at GreenPista. The ideal candidate will be responsible for lead generation, driving revenue, and bringing new opportunities for our business growth.


Position Summary:
We are seeking a proactive and results-driven Business Development to join our team. This role requires someone who can drive business growth, streamline operations, and enhance customer engagement. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of business development strategies and be capable of handling day-to-day operations to support Green Pista Labs unique product offering.


Key Responsibilities:

Business Development

1. Identify and pursue new business opportunities to expand the customer base.

2. Develop and implement strategic business plans to drive revenue and market growth.

3. Conduct market research to identify trends and customer needs.

4. Build and maintain strong relationships with key clients and stakeholders.

5. Collaborate with the marketing team to enhance brand awareness and customer engagement.

6. Prepare and deliver presentations, proposals, and sales pitches to prospective clients.


Qualifications:

1. Any Graduate (BA, BMS, BCom), BBA, MBA, or with a specialization in Sales or Marketing.

2. 0 - 2 years of experience in business development, operations, or customer engagement roles.

3. Freshers can also apply.

4. Strong understanding of business development strategies and customer relationship management.

5. Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

6. Proficiency in MS Office Suite (Excel, Word, PowerPoint) and CRM software.

7. Ability to multitask, prioritize, and handle time-sensitive tasks efficiently.


Skills:

  • Strong analytical skills with a problem-solving mindset.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
  • Customer-focused with a keen sense of empathy and understanding of client needs.
  • High attention to detail and organizational skills.
  • Adaptable to dynamic work environments and open to learning.

Why Join Green Pista Labs?

  • Be part of a growing startup with a unique product and a meaningful mission.
  • Opportunity for career growth and development.
  • Work in a collaborative environment where your ideas are valued and impactful.

"Candidates are invited to share their resumes via email at sakshi.singh@greenpista.com."
qualification: B.B.A / B.M.S in Management, B.Com in Any Specialization, B.A in Any Specialization

name: Legion Energy Products
description: Legion Energy Products Pvt Ltd specializes in manufacture of world-class products for electrical power industry. Brand named LE, our products cater to Transmission, Sub-station , Distribution and Telecom ADSS networks. High performance and reliability best describe our product quality. Cost-effectiveness and a policy of “Customer First” have driven us towards a growing customer base of 450+ clients across 50+ countries which include top EPC companies and Government Utilities.Since its inception in 2007, Legion Energy Products Pvt. Ltd. has developed into a much sought after brand for Electrical Power Industry and Telecom Networks. The ever-growing array of products range from Transmission Line Hardware, Conductor/Earth-wire/Tower Accessories and Sub-station connectors from 11kV to 765kV, Distribution/ADSS/Covered conductor things.Our Bangalore, India based unit boasts of ISO 9001:2015 certification and is well equipped with state of the art manufacturing and testing infrastructure. Our in-house laboratory has been assessed and accredited with NABL certification. Needless to say, uncompromised quality is ingrained in our entire work system. The credit for stringent quality control goes to our strong dedicated workforce. Commitment to place Customer needs above everything else has been key to great Customer satisfaction.To summarize, Legion Energy is poised for exponential growth with our exceptional technical innovation, product quality and responsiveness to Customers.

Legion Energy Products Pvt Ltd specializes in manufacture of world-class products for electrical power industry. Brand named LE, our products cater to Transmission, Sub-station , Distribution and Telecom ADSS networks. High performance and reliability best describe our product quality. Cost-effectiveness and a policy of “Customer First” have driven us towards a growing customer base of 450+ clients across 50+ countries which include top EPC companies and Government Utilities.


Since its inception in 2007, Legion Energy Products Pvt. Ltd. has developed into a much sought after brand for Electrical Power Industry and Telecom Networks. The ever-growing array of products range from Transmission Line Hardware, Conductor/Earth-wire/Tower Accessories and Sub-station connectors from 11kV to 765kV, Distribution/ADSS/Covered conductor things.

Our Bangalore, India based unit boasts of ISO 9001:2015 certification and is well equipped with state of the art manufacturing and testing infrastructure. The credit for stringent quality control goes to our strong dedicated workforce. Commitment to place Customer needs above everything else has been key to great Customer satisfaction.


To summarize, Legion Energy is poised for exponential growth with our exceptional technical innovation, product quality and responsiveness to Customers.

jobDetail_html:
Role & responsibilities: We are hiring for the Planning, Tendering, Order Management, Design, New Product Development, Quality and Production departments ( 6 vacancies)


Planning R&R:

Inventory management

Sub-con activities planning & follow up

System implementation for material planning & for other planning related activities

Transportation planning for Sub-con & other local materials collections

Material reconciliation

Material Planning for the production and follow up with purchase department


Design:

3D model creation

Assembly drawing preparation

Drawing submission for approval

Part number & Bill of material creation.

Part number assigning for projects.

Hands on experience in Solid works


Oder Management:

Order Forwarding to Production department.

Part Number & BOM Follow ups with Engineering team, Sharing Bom and Part number pending list Daily basis

Data Entry in SAP, Sending OA (order Acceptance),So Booking, Sending PI, Sap Delivery, PO Amendment, packing request.

So booking and delivery Double checking

Following up for drawing approval/Submission Status With Design team

Sending Customer feedback Form to customers and taking the feedbacks


Production:

To ensure that shop floor personnel follow the organizations policies & procedures.

Provide guidance & direction to the shop floor personnel.

Achievement of set Production targets.

Co-ordinate daily shop floor activities and delegate assignments to shop floor personnel.

Monitor and maintain material / workflow through the facility.

Ensure that material handlers supply the workstations with material quickly & efficiently.

Monitor & enforce the shop floor personnel to use the PPEs & follow safety policies.


New Product Development:

Responsible for in & out follow-ups for allocated new products development

3D Model Understanding and Preparation

Drawings Drafting and Submission for approval

Creating & Updating of Part numbers and BOM

Follow-ups with Internal teams for implementation of new Products / Projects / Process

Process implementation and preparation of document

Testing of new products developed / modified products

Type Test Coordination with laboratories

Type Test Reports Documentation


Quality:

Attending customer issues, decision to on final product release, meeting customer quality time to time.

Supplier quality output, Testing, Calibration, Conducting and scheduling Customer inspections, Processes report verification


Tendering:

Understanding the product, customer requirements and submitting the quotations

Arranging the supporting documents as per the customers requirements

Costing of the products

Follow up with customers for orders

Updating the database for quotes and PO's

Support the marketing team with documents



Preferred candidate profile :

1) Should be able to understand statutory requirements.

2) Good written and verbal communication skills.

3) Good Inter-personal skills.

4) Understanding the importance of soft skills and application in day-to-day activities.

5) Grievance handling.

6) Good Analytical skills

7) To demonstrate required level of discipline.



Perks and benefits

Medical insurance, Incentives, Team outing, WFH etc.

jobDetail_text: Who We're Looking For   • Are you a student or recent graduate passionate about tech?   • Feeling unfulfilled in your current job and craving a career in IT?  What We Offer   • Kickstart your IT career from scratch with:  Dive into a fully 3-month unpaid internship, where you'll explore all facets of testing alongside a mentorship program. Bingo! For those successfully completing the above, welcome aboard! You'll be officially joining our team, working on projects for global companies like Mercedes-Benz, Diageo, adidas, Whirpool, Shell and others.  Who We Are   • A leading player in the QA market with a team of 1000+ specialists.   • All our employees once embarked on the same journey you're about to start.  What You Need   • English proficiency of B1 or higher.   • Availability to dedicate 40 hours per week to training, internship, and subsequent employment.   • Must be of legal age.   • Located in Delhi. jobDetail_html:
Who We're Looking For 

 • Are you a student or recent graduate passionate about tech? 

 • Feeling unfulfilled in your current job and craving a career in IT? 

What We Offer 

 • Kickstart your IT career from scratch with: 

  1. Dive into a fully 3-month unpaid internship, where you'll explore all facets of testing alongside a mentorship program.
  2. Bingo! For those successfully completing the above, welcome aboard! You'll be officially joining our team, working on projects for global companies like Mercedes-Benz, Diageo, adidas, Whirpool, Shell and others. 

Who We Are 

 • A leading player in the QA market with a team of 1000+ specialists. 

 • All our employees once embarked on the same journey you're about to start. 

What You Need 

 • English proficiency of B1 or higher. 

 • Availability to dedicate 40 hours per week to training, internship, and subsequent employment. 

 • Must be of legal age. 

 • Located in Delhi.

How to Apply: 

Please send your resume in English, mentioning your current location and English proficiency level. 

We will contact suitable candidates who meet our criteria.

The ideal candidate will be responsible for researching company profiles, identifying potential clients, and generating high-quality leads to support business development initiatives.Key Responsibilities:Conduct in-depth research to gather information on companies across various industries, focusing on IT, Engineering, Supply Chain, and Finance sectors.Utilize platforms such as Indeed, Glassdoor, LinkedIn, and other web-based research tools to identify targeted profiles and decision-makers.Validate and manage the leads and contacts database, ensuring accuracy and relevance.Build and maintain a comprehensive B2B contact list through internet research, data mining, and strategic identification of potential clients.Generate qualified leads to support email marketing campaigns.Ensure effective communication by crafting clear, well-structured email messages for outreach to prospects.Maintain a consistent, professional tone and adhere to email templates when engaging with potential clients.Job Type: Full-TimeBenefits:Provident FundSchedule:US shift (7pm to 4am IST),For female employees we can discuss Day shift on case to case basisSupplemental Pay:Yearly BonusWork Location: In-Person (on-site only)
jobDetail_html:
Position Overview: We are seeking a detail-oriented and proactive Research Analyst to support our lead generation efforts across manufacturing, IT, Engineering, Supply Chain, and Finance sectors. The ideal candidate will be responsible for researching company profiles, identifying potential clients, and generating high-quality leads to support business development initiatives.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Conduct in-depth research to gather information on companies across various industries, focusing on IT, Engineering, Supply Chain, and Finance sectors.
  • Utilize platforms such as Indeed, Glassdoor, LinkedIn, and other web-based research tools to identify targeted profiles and decision-makers.
  • Validate and manage the leads and contacts database, ensuring accuracy and relevance.
  • Build and maintain a comprehensive B2B contact list through internet research, data mining, and strategic identification of potential clients.
  • Generate qualified leads to support email marketing campaigns.
  • Ensure effective communication by crafting clear, well-structured email messages for outreach to prospects.
  • Maintain a consistent, professional tone and adhere to email templates when engaging with potential clients.

Job Type: Full-Time

Benefits:

  • Provident Fund

Schedule:

  • US shift (7pm to 4am IST),
  • For female employees we can discuss Day shift on case to case basis

Supplemental Pay:

  • Yearly Bonus

Work Location: In-Person (on-site only)

jobDetail_html:
Job Description: Business Development Executive / Senior Business Development Executive

Location: Saidapet , Chennai

Languages preferred : KANNADA , MALAYALAM , TELUGU

Company Website: https://www.egniol.co.in/about-us/

CTC : 2,85,600 to 6,00,000 LPA

Company Description:

Egniol Services Private Limited is a leading provider of business solutions, catering to startups and established businesses alike. We offer a range of consulting and advisory services aimed at helping businesses establish themselves as respected corporate entities.

Role Overview:

We are looking for a dynamic and result-oriented Business Development Executive / Senior Business Development Executive to join our team in Chennai. The Sales Executive will be responsible for generating leads, qualifying prospects, and assisting the sales team in closing deals. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of our products and services, excellent communication skills, and a passion for sales.

Responsibilities:

This is a full-time on-site role as a Business Development Executive / Senior Business Development Executive located in Chennai. As a Business Development Executive, you will be responsible for supporting the sales team in generating leads, conducting market research, analyzing customer needs, and preparing presentations. You will also collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop effective sales strategies and solutions.

Qualifications:

  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills
  • Excellent analytical and problem-solving abilities
  • Demonstrated experience in sales support or customer service roles
  • Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and CRM software
  • Ability to multitask and manage time effectively
  • Bachelor's degree in business, marketing, or a related field.

Should have knowledge of aerospace tech data process. Strong knowledge about aircraft system, aerospace tech data process and airworthiness. Basic knowledge about aircraft manuals like AIPC/AMM/CMM/SRM. Ability to work with illustration team and raise Illustration mock ups with engineering drawings. jobDetail_html:
Greetings from Teleperformance


Job Title: Virtual Relationship Manager - Priority
Company: Teleperformance

Location: Whitefield, Bangalore
Salary Range: 18,000 CTC to 22,000 CTC + Unlimited Incentives


Job Description

VRM (Teleperformance Process)


Contact Details:

Pavan (Recruitment Head): 7559042358




Job Location: Teleperformance Office, Whitefield, Bangalore


About the Role


As a Virtual Relationship Manager, you will support Priority Customers of Axis Bank through the Outbound Contact Centre (OCC). This role focuses on cross-selling banking products, including loans, investments, and other financial services, while providing a premium customer experience.


Key Responsibilities

  • Handle Priority Customer service needs remotely via phone and email.
  • Achieve monthly revenue targets and cross-sell banking products.
  • Deepen CASA (Current Account Savings Account) relationships and generate NTB (New to Bank) leads.
  • Provide assistance with NDIAS (Non-Discretionary Investment Advisory Services).
  • Monitor and manage customer portfolios to identify new opportunities.
  • Maintain compliance with internal policies and government regulations.

Preferred Candidate Profile

Qualifications:

  • Graduate from a recognized institution.
  • Freshers or candidates with 2+ years of BFSI experience are welcome.

Skills:

  • Proficiency in English and one regional language (excluding Telugu).
  • Strong sales orientation and customer relationship management skills.
  • Knowledge of financial products like Mutual Funds, Insurance, PMS, and structured products.
  • Teamwork, resilience, and excellent verbal and written communication skills.

Perks and Benefits:

  • Competitive salary package with unlimited incentives.
  • Opportunity to work in a fast-paced, technology-driven environment.




Contact Details: Pavan (Recruitment Head): 7559042358

name: Narayana Health (NH)
description: History of Narayana Hrudayalaya FoundationsNarayana Hrudayalaya Foundations has come a very long way with one batch of nursing students in 2001 and now has three institutes which deliver outstanding healthcare professionals in the area of Nursing, Allied Health Sciences and Physiotherapy.A brief on the Institutes:Narayana Hrudayalaya School & College of Nursing:The institute started in 2001 with General Nursing Midwifery course, followed by B.Sc (Nursing) in the year 2003. Followed by M.Sc (Nursing) in 2008 & P.B.B.Sc (Nursing) in 2009. The institute is also a Study Centre of IGNOU for P.B.B.Sc (Nursing) programme offered to working Nurses from across the country. With a total of 4 courses, the institute offers excellent facilities & the students are exposed to world class clinical areas during their course. All the courses are affiliated to the respective governing bodies i.e., Indian Nursing Council. Karnataka Nursing Council, Karnataka State Diploma Nursing Examination Board & Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences.Narayana Hrudayalaya Institute of Allied Health Sciences:The institute started functioning with a one batch of B.Sc Perfusion Technology students from the academic year 2002-03 and Diploma course in the subsequent year. Now the institute is functioning with a total of 17 courses (3 Post Graduate, 10 Under Graduate & 4 Diploma), which are the most seeked for amongst the students. All the PG & UG courses are affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences, Bangalore and Diploma courses to Karnataka Paramedical Board.Narayana Hrudayalaya Institute of Physiotherapy:NHIP started a humble beginning from 2010 with a students strength of 8 in Bachelor of Physiotherapy (BPT). Now the institute has grown leaps and bounds with a present strength of 40 students in BPT each year.Masters of Physiotherapy (MPT) commenced from Academic Year 2017-18 with specialisations such as Musculoskeletal & Sports Physiotherapy, Neurological & Psychosomatic Disorders, Cardiorespiratory Disorders, Community Physiotherapy Paediatrics) with 5 seats. Now the institute is one amongst the seeked after for courses of Physiotherapy
about_html:
History of Narayana Hrudayalaya Foundations

Narayana Hrudayalaya Foundations has come a very long way with one batch of nursing students in 2001 and now has three institutes which deliver outstanding healthcare professionals in the area of Nursing, Allied Health Sciences and Physiotherapy.

A brief on the Institutes:

Narayana Hrudayalaya School & College of Nursing:

The institute started in 2001 with General Nursing Midwifery course, followed by B.Sc (Nursing) in the year 2003. Followed by M.Sc (Nursing) in 2008 & P.B.B.Sc (Nursing) in 2009. The institute is also a Study Centre of IGNOU for P.B.B.Sc (Nursing) programme offered to working Nurses from across the country. With a total of 4 courses, the institute offers excellent facilities & the students are exposed to world class clinical areas during their course. All the courses are affiliated to the respective governing bodies i.e., Indian Nursing Council. Karnataka Nursing Council, Karnataka State Diploma Nursing Examination Board & Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences.

Narayana Hrudayalaya Institute of Allied Health Sciences:

The institute started functioning with a one batch of B.Sc Perfusion Technology students from the academic year 2002-03 and Diploma course in the subsequent year. Now the institute is functioning with a total of 17 courses (3 Post Graduate, 10 Under Graduate & 4 Diploma), which are the most seeked for amongst the students. All the PG & UG courses are affiliated to Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences, Bangalore and Diploma courses to Karnataka Paramedical Board.

Narayana Hrudayalaya Institute of Physiotherapy:

NHIP started a humble beginning from 2010 with a students strength of 8 in Bachelor of Physiotherapy (BPT). Now the institute has grown leaps and bounds with a present strength of 40 students in BPT each year.

Masters of Physiotherapy (MPT) commenced from Academic Year 2017-18 with specialisations such as Musculoskeletal & Sports Physiotherapy, Neurological & Psychosomatic Disorders, Cardiorespiratory Disorders, Community Physiotherapy Paediatrics) with 5 seats. Now the institute is one amongst the seeked after for courses of Physiotherapy

Roles and Responsibilities

Teaching
Planning of the teaching programme including an orientation programme in consultation with the Principal/Vice Principal
Planning for students practical experience, ward assignments and vacations in consultation with the Principal/Vice Principal.
Planning of ward teaching programme with the cooperation and collaboration of Principal/Vice Principal

Periodical visits to students rooms to make sure that they practice personal hygiene.
Organizing recreational and social programmes.
General
Participating in the selection of students.
Supplying time tables of classes to Ward Sister.
Maintenance of library, requisition of new books and journals.
Inventory of class room supplies
Inventory of class room equipment.
Arrangements of functions for prize distribution lamp- lighting ceremony.
Any other duty that may be assigned to her from time to time relating to nursing education.



Perks and Benefits

Salary as per industry standards

Job Description:

Swagat Jewellers is seeking a highly motivated and customer-focused Jewellery Sales Executive to join our showroom team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for engaging with walk-in customers, understanding their jewellery preferences, and assisting them in making informed purchasing decisions. name: AM NS India
description: AM/NS India is a joint venture between the world's leading steel companies, ArcelorMittal and Nippon Steel. Established in December 2019, post-acquisition of Essar Steel, we are an integrated flat steel manufacturer - from iron ore to ready-to-market products. With over 600 steel grades - many substituting imports, we serve an array of contemporary industries (agriculture, automotive, infrastructure, defence, energy, etc.) and contribute to an Aatmanirbhar Bharat. Our portfolio encapsulates hot rolled coils / sheets / plates, cold rolled coils / sheets, galvanized coils / sheets, pre-painted galvanized coils / sheets, pipelines, etc. We ascribe to advancement with sustainability and envision creating 'Smarter Steels, Brighter Futures'.Our vision has nestled in empowering communities by providing employment to more than 1.6 Lakh individuals and enriching millions of lives across the country through our CSR interventions. We are inspired by ArcelorMittal's XCarb programme and Nippon Steel's Zero Carbon initiative and stand in alignment with India's vision to be carbon-neutral by 2070. Our recent partnership with Greenko for renewable power and storage facility is a notable step in that direction. Our MoUs with National Small Industries Corporation and National Skill Development Corporation are devised to bolster the MSME ecosystem in India. We prioritize health and safety and foster a culture of innovation by placing research and development at the heart of our operations. We are a committed partner to the nation, and our avid growth story will be purposeful, inclusive, and sustainable.

AM/NS India is a joint venture between the world's leading steel companies, ArcelorMittal and Nippon Steel. Established in December 2019, post-acquisition of Essar Steel, we are an integrated flat steel manufacturer - from iron ore to ready-to-market products. With over 600 steel grades - many substituting imports, we serve an array of contemporary industries (agriculture, automotive, infrastructure, defence, energy, etc.) and contribute to an Aatmanirbhar Bharat. Our portfolio encapsulates hot rolled coils / sheets / plates, cold rolled coils / sheets, galvanized coils / sheets, pre-painted galvanized coils / sheets, pipelines, etc. We ascribe to advancement with sustainability and envision creating 'Smarter Steels, Brighter Futures'.

Our vision has nestled in empowering communities by providing employment to more than 1.6 Lakh individuals and enriching millions of lives across the country through our CSR interventions. We are inspired by ArcelorMittal's XCarb programme and Nippon Steel's Zero Carbon initiative and stand in alignment with India's vision to be carbon-neutral by 2070. Our recent partnership with Greenko for renewable power and storage facility is a notable step in that direction. Our MoUs with National Small Industries Corporation and National Skill Development Corporation are devised to bolster the MSME ecosystem in India. We prioritize health and safety and foster a culture of innovation by placing research and development at the heart of our operations. We are a committed partner to the nation, and our avid growth story will be purposeful, inclusive, and sustainable.

jobDetail_html:
Role & responsibilities

Job Summary:

The Loss Prevention Officer is responsible for protecting company assets, preventing theft, ensuring a safe shopping environment for customers, and maintaining the overall security of the premises. The officer will perform surveillance, investigate suspicious activities, and implement security protocols to reduce losses due to theft, damage, or fraud. This role requires proactive monitoring, customer service, and collaboration with law enforcement when necessary.

Key Responsibilities (safety part)

  1. Fire Safety Inspections:
  2. Fire Safety Training:
  3. Fire Prevention:
  4. Emergency Response:
  5. Documentation and Reporting:
  6. Regulatory Compliance:
  7. Safety Equipment Maintenance:
  8. Fire Drill Coordination:

Key Responsibilities (loss prevention part)

  • Surveillance & Monitoring:
  • Loss Prevention:
  • Investigation & Reporting:
  • Customer & Employee Interaction:

Preferred candidate profile

Experience in conducting safety inspections and training programs.


About us :

Gurukrupa Exports

Gurukrupa Exports was etablished in the year 1997. We are the leading Manufacturer, Supplier & Trader  of Gold Bracelet, Gold Ganesha Diamond Pendant & Waist Diamond Belt etc. Our rich industrial experience of several years enables us to deliver an immaculate range of Gold Bracelet in the market. These products are designed and developed at our in-house production unit, which is equipped with modern tools and instruments.

jobDetail_html:
Role & responsibilities:

Provide support in Sales of Life Insurance business through bank customers at bank branches across assigned locations.


Key Accountabilities:

  • Assist /help SP to generate leads and log in prospective applications
  • Driving and motivating the bank SP, logging in applications sourced, through operations department
  • Tapping the right database of the branch and ensure authentic documentation
  • Build relationship with the business partners and ensure self and SP targets are met effectively
  • Adhering to PNB MetLife policies and providing need based selling support.
  • Ensuring that customers are well informed of the product features sold through SPs/ Bank
  • Acting as a team player and reporting the number of applications logged in for the business everyday to the reporting manager without fail
  • Ensure high level of Persistency & Customer Service to the customers

Relationships:

Internal Business Relationship: Training, HR, Key stake holders, MIS & Operations External Business Relationship: Channel Partner - BMs of assigned branches & SPs


Required qualifications and experience:

Graduation/ Post Graduation Degree/Professional Degree


Preferred Experience: 1-4 years


Knowledge and skills desired :

Technical/ Functional Essential: Knowledge of insurance sales; Excellent Interpersonal Skills; Basic knowledge on Computer Operations Desirable Knowledge about the insurance industry; Should be high on initiative; Well groomed and confident.


Thanks & Regards,

Avinash Gupta

name: NOVARTIS
description: Novartis Healthcare Pvt. Ltd.
about_html: Novartis Healthcare Pvt. Ltd.
jobDetail_text: Summary   The Sales Representative is a leading driver of our customer interactions and sales performance They are the face of our customer experience approach and build deep relationships that deliver value for customers and patients in order to drive sales growth in a compliant and ethical manner.      About the Role    Key Responsibilities     Drive Competitive Sales Growth -Identify and prioritize high-potential customers through data analysis (HCPs and stakeholders) who influence prescription decisions -Drive sales performance through the skillful orchestration of positive customer experiences. Engage and Build Relationships.    Engage in value-based conversations (in-person and virtually) to understand critical customer challenges, decision-drivers, pain points and opportunities    Personalize and orchestrate customer engagement journeys for target HCPs by reflecting customer preferences, leveraging available content and multiple engagement channels -Build engagement by working in partnership with HCPs to develop a sustained collaboration over time for Novartis. Deliver memorable, customer-centric experiences beyond clinical differentiation by listening to their needs and understanding their healthcare environment    Establish effective working relationships with opinion leaders and top medical influencers (at territory level) and challenge current behaviors in order to improve the patient journey (right patient, right time)    Develop Deep Customer Insights and Understanding -Gather insights on the customer s business to uncover what is important to them -Follow up on customer feedback and translate responses into actions that create additional value and exceed expectations    Leverage available data sources to create, dynamically prioritize and adjust relevant territory, account and customer interaction plans -Share customer insights with relevant internal stakeholders on an ongoing basis to support the development of product-and indication-related content, campaigns and interaction plans    Deliver Value to Customers and Patients-Collaborate compliantly with cross-functional teams to design and implement solutions that address unmet customer and patient needs act as a trusted partner to the customer for the purpose of helping them run their business; listen to learn; strive to deepen the relationship in a compliant and ethical manner; position themselves to create value-add solutions.    Act with integrity and honesty by treating customers and colleagues in a transparent and respectful manner with clear intent. When facing ethical dilemmas, do the right thing and speak up when things dont seem right. Live by Novartis Code of Ethics and Values and Behaviors.    To be populated at local level, based on the guidance that will follow from IMI Field Engagement Performance Management Council outcomes.      Role Requirements:      Established Network to target Customer Group desirable.      Cross-Functional Coordination.    Able to understand changing dynamics of Pharmaceutical industry.    Market Knowledge and Network is desirable.    Pre-launch activities.    Sales in Healthcare / Pharma / related business.
jobDetail_html:
Summary
The Sales Representative is a leading driver of our customer interactions and sales performance They are the face of our customer experience approach and build deep relationships that deliver value for customers and patients in order to drive sales growth in a compliant and ethical manner.
About the Role
Key Responsibilities
  • Drive Competitive Sales Growth -Identify and prioritize high-potential customers through data analysis (HCPs and stakeholders) who influence prescription decisions -Drive sales performance through the skillful orchestration of positive customer experiences. Engage and Build Relationships.
  • Engage in value-based conversations (in-person and virtually) to understand critical customer challenges, decision-drivers, pain points and opportunities
  • Personalize and orchestrate customer engagement journeys for target HCPs by reflecting customer preferences, leveraging available content and multiple engagement channels -Build engagement by working in partnership with HCPs to develop a sustained collaboration over time for Novartis. Deliver memorable, customer-centric experiences beyond clinical differentiation by listening to their needs and understanding their healthcare environment
  • Establish effective working relationships with opinion leaders and top medical influencers (at territory level) and challenge current behaviors in order to improve the patient journey (right patient, right time)
  • Develop Deep Customer Insights and Understanding -Gather insights on the customer s business to uncover what is important to them -Follow up on customer feedback and translate responses into actions that create additional value and exceed expectations
  • Leverage available data sources to create, dynamically prioritize and adjust relevant territory, account and customer interaction plans -Share customer insights with relevant internal stakeholders on an ongoing basis to support the development of product-and indication-related content, campaigns and interaction plans
  • Deliver Value to Customers and Patients-Collaborate compliantly with cross-functional teams to design and implement solutions that address unmet customer and patient needs act as a trusted partner to the customer for the purpose of helping them run their business; listen to learn; strive to deepen the relationship in a compliant and ethical manner; position themselves to create value-add solutions.
  • Act with integrity and honesty by treating customers and colleagues in a transparent and respectful manner with clear intent. When facing ethical dilemmas, do the right thing and speak up when things dont seem right. Live by Novartis Code of Ethics and Values and Behaviors.
  • To be populated at local level, based on the guidance that will follow from IMI Field Engagement Performance Management Council outcomes.
Role Requirements:
  • Established Network to target Customer Group desirable.
  • Cross-Functional Coordination.
  • Able to understand changing dynamics of Pharmaceutical industry.
  • Market Knowledge and Network is desirable.
  • Pre-launch activities.
  • Sales in Healthcare / Pharma / related business.

As safe as a bank; a plethora of home finance products prioritizing speedy turnaround time, personalized services and flexible approach. 


Transparency in process


Absolutely no hidden charges; every minor detail is laid-out before our customers.



Custodian-like approach


State of the Art storage facility for safety of title documents; custodians of not just our customers wealth but also of their trust.


Legal assistance


Legal and technical appraisals are carried out by qualified in-house personnel saving precious time of our customers.


Consistent support


Always by our customers side from the beginning  of loan till the end of loan tenure; from timely reminders to issuance of statements and facilitating direct contact through mail.
